Comment:
Ordered food on a Sunday noon!
#1 Delivery- You can actually go to market, get groceries, cook food and have rather then ordering and expecting quick delivery from this restaurant. Delivery was 40 mins late from the "promised delivery" time, even though the restaurant is hardly a km away.
#2 Food quality- I think the restaurant gets oil in subsidy, you can actually strain the oil from food and use it to fry pakoras. Food freshness, quality and taste dont even meet below average rating. Except food packing(if ur fascinated about packing), everything seems bad!

And, the tagline,"jab hungry, kuch accha khao", i would say Starve, than thinking of having from this restaurant.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One day was very busy with work do decided to order from outside and the mood was for biryani. Thought will try from Ammis for a change and ordered through Foodpanda. We got the parcel within 60mins. Had ordered for one veg hyderabadi biryani and one egg biryani. I was impressed to see the packing but once it was in the mouth all impression vanished. It was like as though someone who is learning to cook had prepared, it was so bad. Curd raitha was just watery and gravy was like oh God I don't even have words to describe it .....so pathetic. Will never ever order from here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst food ever had today afternoon. Ordered for mutton Hyderabad biryani family pack . But they provided with spoilt biryani ,I think it was left over from yesterday's food . I recommend , ppl not not have any food from them & spoil u r HEALTH . We never ask for any sort of bargains , but they compromise with our health .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Biryani given is not prepared hot in the restaurant,they get it and just provide making it hot.
Taste is also average ,even the salad and starters are not as expected.
Do not buy after 9.00PM.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A very modern approach to biryani, hardcore biryani lovers with lots of previous biryani experience might not find the kick in the biryani served here. For the rest of us who wants to eat biryani with some mint and curd, this is a perfectly decent restaurant, don't know about ambience as I never visited the store, order online for quick delivery
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Okay okay for quick meal. Biryanis here are nothing special, but the quality is good. It is just that their quantity is less. So if you are super hungry, one portion of their Biryani may not suffice. Even the portions of their side dishes are less.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I am getting bad reviews and also cost is more quantity less so I am not feeling taste by seeing this reviews so I hope it will improve ....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A really terrible experience! Had ordered 3 Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani's tonight. Firstly, the person on call tells me that nothing else is available on the menu tonight and that the Dum Biryani was the only thing on offer. We still decided to give it a try. And what a bad call on our part. The rice was hard and very cold. The chicken was not cooked properly. The biryani was absolutely tasteless. This is NOT a Dum biryani from any angle. It felt as though they had kept the biryani out in the open all day long for the flies and the weather to do their worst. What a pathetic experience. There was a time (years ago), when their biryanis were delivered piping hot and were good to taste. But now, it feels like we are eating crap. This review is for the Ammi's Biryani brand as a whole and not one single outlet. Please avoid this brand and their offerings at all cost!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Review for the food that was never delivered.
After accepting the order and confirming, it took around 30 mins for them to call and say that due to some issue, the delivery will take one more hour.
I cancelled it. I was already hungry at the time of ordering, the least they could have done is inform me immediately after receiving the order. Not interested in doing business with such unprofessional establishment anymore.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very basic biryani, not that great a taste either. Oh, and the quantity that you get for THAT price...it's just hurtful.  Was a big mistake reading the book by it's cover.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Very good customer service, good presentation and packaging.
The food was hot and delivered on time.
When the food was delivered came to know an item was missing. Called the restaurant, the quickly apologised and made sure I didn't have a bad experience. The made sure they deliver the item and even compensated.
They know what is customer service, satisfaction and especially customer retention.
Will definitely reorder only for their right attitude.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Is it just me or has the quality of Ammi's gone down the drain?
Fine Basmati rice - not even close!!
Fresh meat & veggies - sure if it were a week earlier!
Exotic spices and herbs - ok if you say so!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Odered a biryani, what I got wasnt even close.I dont recommend this place.if u come across this place turn around and find a better place to have food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The only good part about this place is the cheap prices.
It's good enough when you're starving,Pretty filling.
But, This is a long way from other great Biryani places in Bangalore.
Biryani can me overcooked & They need to improve the taste ,A lot.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered Haleem, what I received was cut chicken pieces in boiled spiced wheat, nothing like haleem, I don't recommend having Haleem here....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
After seeing a Veg Hyderabadi Biryani, decided to visit for a lunch at Ammi's. But the Biryani is no where close to Hyderabadi Style. The Biryani Tastes alright & ideal name would be Just a Veg Biryani. However, Aam Panna was top notch & must try! The service was quick & pricing is pretty reasonable. I recommend Ammi's ðŸ˜Š

bangaloreepicure.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had amis biryani the other day! As it wqs most disgusting biryani i have ever had. Looked like the cook had a haircut before preparing biryani as it had 2 strands of hair in it! The salan was ice cold.. Over all not at all hygenic..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Hair in the food.
Need I say more?â€¦....â€¦...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I always order from here. The Biriyani is inexpensive - I really like the packaging, Had harimirch murg biriyani.2nd time am having this biriyani.i liked it and it was very spicy today. Overall you can eat lunch here when you are craving for biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I will give a 0 but zomato will not allow .. I went there for lunch was really hungry .. ordered chicken biriyani and the rice looked fresh and good .. was really excited to eat .. the moment I had 2 spone I was about to vomit .. the food is really pathetic .. the food was actually old one I guess .. pls don't no try ..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: There is no comment posted.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Like any other outlet they have the same menu. I tried chicken biryani here. Quantity was good but the taste wasn't that good. They need to improve taste and come up with mor items in the menu
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This place is not that good to sit and have food but we can order the food. The delivery is pretty good not that bad. Only thing is it's not cost effective.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Doing a review today, but have ordered a few times before as well. Always liked the biriyani at ammis, good food and unlike a lot of other overpriced places in blr today, light on the stomach and wallet. ;) Saw the new offering today, Alfredo rice! Cheesy veggies and basmati rice didn't sound like a great combination, but was curious and craving something different and went for it. It was combined well and was quite nice. Only grouse if I had to find one was at end of it all, the bottom of the container seemed to have quite a bit of oil on it, which gives you the feeling that it's unhealthy. And the website didn't seem to be working properly. If not for that, will rate a 4.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: For the veggies its a no go place as its only meant for the non-veggeis and even my non-veg friends dint like it so much...before it was good but now the quality has gone down drastically.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Again this people proved that they are the worst... I had ordered executive Hyderabad biriyani which includes raita, salan and one sweet. Which is mentioned in their official website. When I got the order sweet is missing. When I called the agent he said we have removed the sweet 20days back. Guys please tell me how a guest user will come to know about this?? It is ur duty to update ur website when there is some changes in ur menu. Worst ever...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I am from kolkata and i am not used to the south indian style of biryani. I dont like it that much. Ammis boryani was different though. Its not south indian preperation. It was really tasty and a biryani that people from north india would find good. A definite must try. The packaging was really good.
I would definetely wanna point out two negetive points.
1) I would like the quantity to be increased.
2) The delivery person should be better. I had to explain him the direction atleast 10 times and he still did not understand. They should hire people who have a knowledge of the area.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I always order from here. The Biriyani is inexpensive - I really like the packaging, But the delivery time should be improved. The last I ordered was on Wednesday - The Biriyani came 20 minutes late - (Roadrunner Delivery)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I always get home delivery from ammi's biriyani. The biriyani is average and is pocket friendly. The combos are really good. Good service and always in time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammiz biriyani is not tasty as much as their brand hype!

Their food is not so much tasty

Average hyderabadi style food!
Cost wise okay!

Happy eating :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: These guys are super cool. I've always got a home delivery. They are prompt in receiving calls, extremely polite in talking and bang on delivery.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: finally bsk 2nd stage gets its ammis biriyaani!!!the hotel is aptly placed,but 50% of the items in the menu is never available hence i find this place deserted.the food and service is good.they give home delivery too.not bad!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not a fan of ammi's biriyani but i heard they have improved a bit.so went and had harimirch murg biriyani.2nd time am having this biriyani.i liked it and it was very spicy today.they are having lot of types in biriyani but i guess there wont be much change in taste and flavour.main thing they are adding only service tax.so price wont be much differ from the menuðŸ˜Ž
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: They are my go to people for ordering biryani. The portion is decent, the size of the pieces vary. The best thing is their packing. It comes nicely sealed with everything inside including plastic cutlery and tissue paper. They once messed up my order but the management was courteous and gave biryani complimentary. If you are ordering make sure you tell them to give you good pieces.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered for home delivery from this place today; it's my first experience with them, and I must say I was pleasantly happy with the delivery time and the food too.

What I also liked about them was the fact that they have worked on creating the first impression by working on their neat packing. The delivered food too was hot and could be consumed immediately.

I ordered for Hyderabadi Veg Biryani and the quantity was quite good, however little more vegetables can be included in the same which otherwise tasted quite bland. Considering that it's supposed to be Hyderabadi Biryani, the spice quotient was not as high as it was expected.

But if you're not in a mood to step out of house to eat, ordering from here is quite a good option.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Great place to eat in and a very helpful team ur mutton hydrabadhi biryani is delicious. Loved ur lemonade. Wishing to drop in again. ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Its too bad service and east of money.,not recommended

I have orders for veg but I got non veg pieces in veg biryani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Mutton Biryani at  exotic taste. Loved it. Authentic taste. Good Biryanis.Go for mutton hyderabadi. Very Nice.! Have some patience on weekends but be assured they will deliver hot tasty biryani.

Will order again!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A small outlet near bda complex. Service was quick. We ordered a hyderabadi murg executive biriyani combo. Food is good. Not very expensive.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Veg biryani was good enough.. Worth money and too much was served. Very easily a single plate would serve 2 People. It was little too spicy than expected but was tasty and yum
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Horrible food!
Ordered home delivery of panner soya biriyani. The biriyani was spicy, but not tasty. There were chunks of masala lying underneath.

The delivery was on time, packing was good. But the food tasted baaad!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
We all friends had planned for home delivery and one of my friend told... lets try the Ammi Biryani n i thought why not a try...n name says it ... I've seen this place before...while passing on..it comes extreme beside the BSK BDA Complex......We could'nt get time on Xmas to celeberate ::(( ...so planned t get together on weekend....

Hyderbadi Biryani is never they say.... :((

But its was bad day..... so yuck to eat it and very surprising n ..when i tasted two or three spoon... i found small stone ..i felt may be vegetables..i felt crackling sound thank-god., i save my teeth and its stone .., so terrible...

I had a try in other restaurants ...which are very hot and yummy with lot of spicy in it and taste so well and i feel the aroma of it....but here its too bad and worst ever had it
....

Waste of money and spoils name of Biryani :((
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: ordered a small chicken biriyani. Chicken was either reheated/over smoked. rice was tasteless. I dont know how u guys managed it but it was tasteless, literally.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst customer service. Food is also heated at the last moment. Half cooked . Nothing good other than free home delivery and good packing........... A
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have Heard too much about it.
So tried it. Nothing great about the taste as well. This is not the place to have biryani if your expectations are
high... Highly NOT RECOMMENDED...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Osum food but a little spicy they offer a wide variety of Biyanis to choose from .
Not many varieties of appetizers.Ambience is good also a nice place to binge on biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good quantity good taste... full paisa vasool :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Poor hygiene, good service though.
Cheap prices for filling food. Worth going for snacks. Not recommended for lunch or dinner.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Dropped by around 730 in the evening to pick up few biriyanis for home. It was quite like the microwave food I have at home. They just reheated the biriyanis and packed it. Once the food goes cold then it's old. Terribly disappointed with this outlet. :( btw nice advertising on the radio guys. But Ammi's biriyani ain't yummy biriyani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Totally not a recommended place. Bloody rip off. Hated the place nd FYI my first biryani place I hated. Apparently There s some executive biryani as well also knows as half biyrani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have not visited the place but ordered food for delivery. Very nice service of
free delivery, even if you order a single biryani, that will be delivered to your
door step, without any delivery charges. To top it all, on time delivery.

Now, coming to the food, The quantity is good enough for a single person.
The taste is not spicy Andhra, but enough to make your taste buds happy.
Could have made the curry better.

A special mention for combos, they turn out to be cheaper, specially the
family packs and party combos. Try it out.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Unless you want to grab Biryani that is less than ok on flavours I would suggest this place. This place was a complete disappointment when it came to starters and sub par flavours on Birayani. Am guessing they are trying to set a fast food standard Biryani Style.

There isn't anything special about their Biryani, the Hyderabadi Biryani is quite ok in flavours and served at luke warm temperatures which is a turn off. Biryani's are meant to be served hot!!

At all costs please avoid the Mutton Seek Kabab's they are complete joke, zero on flavours and not appealing at all.

They do have interesting combo deals and family packs which sound interesting but unfortunately Biryani's are disappointing. Biryani lovers even if you skip this place, you wouldn't miss out anything. Look elsewhere. The prices are not justified for the Biryani they serve as well.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biriyani, according to me, is over hyped. When it comes to Biriyani, I am a Meghana Foods loyalist. So, when my friends wanted to try Ammi's, i was hesitant and with due reason. When we went there, there was nobody there which made me more apprehensive.
We ordered a Chicken Boneless Biriyani and a Chicken Hyderabadi Biriyani. With it, they give raitha, gravy and a sweet. The raitha had only cucumber, the gravy was watery and the sweet was quite fine. Now coming to the most important.. the Biriyani. Well, both the biriyani's tasted almost the same with hardly any difference in taste. The boneless chicken was extremely bland and the Hyderabadi chicken tasted like rubber.
For this extremely unsatisfactory meal, we had to pay around 450 rs which was just not worth it.
Maybe we ordered the wrong stuff, but i was disappointed. Not going back.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Great biryani and very convenient packing and value for money
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not good, Waste of money ... Expected a lot here but damn ...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Didn't live upto the expectation. The ambience was good. But selection of biryanis was very bad. Only one kind was available - murg hyderabadi biryani. The chicken was properly cooked and spices were properly in place to tickle one's taste buds. Service was brilliant but don't recommend this place coz of high rates and poor selection availability.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I am a regular customer of Ammis Biryani whether its in RR Nagar,Konankunte cross.
Biryani at reasonable price& exotic taste, totally a fair combination.
Murg shaadi biryani ,egg biryani are my favs.
The home delivery is very quick and i just love the idea of packing they use to do...

instagram.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not many varieties for vegetarians. Biryani is good and tasty. Food was not so spicy. Would have been better if it was.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
There wasnt a ammi's biyani, kumaraswamy layout so i am posting on the banashankari outlets review section. .. The worst nightmare for a vegetarian!!! There is nothing ... Absolutely NOTHING for a vegetarian!!!! DO. NOT. GO. THERE.
Its written on the wall "a tribute to the ever so inspiring taste of any mother's secret ingredient" mothers make vegetarian dishes too. The limited range of one or two dishes in the menu isnt available for order. Also my non-veg friends got some very disappointing chicken biryani combo !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: During my order, I was hungry & ordered chicken hyderabadi Biryani with guntur chicken....of Which I got lemonade & sweet tied with order like a combo order. I looked the Biryani & chicken is good.... And guntur chicken is not upto my expectation... And a sweet box which I got in order is so good. After finishing the dinner I tried lemonade, WOW- it's so worst lemonade that spoiled the feel of chicken Biryani. Not so fast in home delivery...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Just don't go to order food from here. Quantity of food doesn't match the price and forget about the quality. Biryani was totally dry.

Paneer dish was cooked with kadi pata which gave a taste as if eating from local dhabba.

Just avoid going
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's has deteriorated in taste over the years. The biriyani lacks the flavor that entices people who truly love this food. Tasted too bland and the much anticipated kheer was a disappointment too.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This branch is also no less than the other ones around in bangalore. As mentioned by me for their shanthi nagar branch, not a place for real briyani lovers.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Poor quality food, tasteless & worthless. The only good thing about the order was the minimum value of Rs.100, yet I hit more than double that value. Packing was really impressive. But the food matters more than the packing. Serving it clean and neat, doesn't makes it all. If the food was tasty, I would've said: "This is the place to dine..."

Not recommended personally.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I was kinda skeptical to order food from here after reading the reviews. But I was really hungry and thought o giving it a shot. I'm so glad I did! They delivered food on time. I ordered Executive Chicken Biryani and Murg Guntur Kebab and it just cost me 167 bucks! Cheap, ain't it?! The best part is the min order they need for home delivery is just Rs. 100. Makes sense to me when you're ordering for only one person. Biryani and Guntur Kabab was delicious, and the Guntur kebab was something new I tasted. I felt the portion was a lil less, I guess I was too hungry. But, hey! I'm not complaining! The biryani costs only 109bucks, worth it! I definitely recommend Ammi's biryani to all the biryani lovers. Too lazy to cook or to go out? This is the place to order from!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The only good thing about the ammi's is the lead time taken for the food order is less but the taste is avg and no much options are available
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Not so tasty but saves your time when you are looking for something quick.

Since last 4.5 years I have been ordering at Ammi's biryani (at different outlets) when I feel lazy to go out and have food. They do prompt delivery but really tests your patience at times. If you place COD order and don't keep exact change get ready to give some tip to the delivery guy.  And also now they are giving SHARBAT-E-NIMBU in combos which some times will be spilled all over when you the order delivered.

Mostly I ordered Veg Hyderabadi Biryani, Veg Executive Combo and Paratha Combo.
Biryani tasted ok ok. But for the amount you are paying its definitely not worth. Sometimes it tastes too spicy and sometimes no taste at all.  Aloo achari which comes along with their combo is bad at times. I felt spoiled smell and taste. Dessert tasted nice. Parathas and Paneer curries tastes ok ok provided you are quick at eating

Ambiance - NA
Food - 2.5/5
Service - 2.5/5
Price - 3/5
Packaging - 4/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: price is toomuch tasts good..  not very fast delivery food look good staff ware friendly over all its a good experience for me people can order from here
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Well, still I am thinking as to what made me to enter this place. Ammi's Biryani is one criticised place for Biryani. I went inside, the place was as silent as a graveyard. I ordered biryani. It was microwaved.. Taste was ordinary.. The curry (salan) tasted like pickle. I gave point five for service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Owsome place n AC ???????????? the only place I have completely filled stomach is this place lovely taste
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Buy only biriyani and nothing else. I ordered paratha, butter chicken and guntooor chicken.
All pathetic in taste. The paratha was so hard that I got crams trying to chew them. The butter chicken serving was so small I first thought it was pickle
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biriyani here tastes nothing like eating roadside fast food. I had been to other Ammi's Biriyani places several times but never felt so disappointing, the taste here was consistently poor. Wouldn't waste my money anymore here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have never eaten such horrible food in my life. Staff was very rude. It was too horrible that I felt bad taste for hours. Please don't ever order.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I never been to this place. We always ordered. Never quite really liked their biriyani much. It wals taste like a plane rice mixed with a tasteless gravy and added a piece of chicken to it. Most of the time chicken also lacks the basic taste like salt. The only good part of Ammi's biryani is their packaging. They pack the food really well. Neatly and in a very customer friendly way. Their delivery system is superb with the SMS tracking. Delivery is always timely.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Worst delivery ever seen, irresponsible staffs . Staffs are not receiving our phone call when we are asking for the updates on our order .
Not sure whether these reviews will bring any changes to your service because I see many bad reviews which are not yet acknowledged .
Please never order anything from Ammi's Biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered Chicken executive biryani combo and Chicken Thalassery biryani. I got a call saying thalassery biryani is not available so we can give hyderabadi biryani. When the order arrived it was cold and felt little stale. Lime sharbat was given instead of aam sharbat which was ordered. Seekh kabab was also cold and did not taste good. I had tried Ammi's Biryani earlier at the Koramangala outlet and the experience was good so ordered from this outlet but was disappointed. The management should maintain the quality of all the outlets.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered executive biryani on Monday for dinner. Here are the ratings :
1. Quality 1.5/5
2. Quantity 2/5
3. Service 1.5/5
To the management : Kindly improve quality and service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Horrible service. First , they delivered family pack in three small executive containers and not the usual family pack , second, quantity was very less ,biryani was cold and they didn't give the softdrink which comes along with the family pack until demanded. Biryani was below par...
Better to shut this outlet.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Dont order, worst service,worst biriyani ever. They given me room temp. Cold drink and food which was not even warm. Took 1 and half hour to deliver
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I was ordering for the first time from this place. Although I got a late delivery (almost 2 hours after I placed the order), I was looking forward for a good Biriyani. But I was completely dissatisfied with the quality (greasy) and taste. I won't be ordering from this place again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Heard a lot about ammi's biyani. But not upto the expectation. Biryani was good but the spicy chicken chatkara was not spicy.. if you are looking for only biriyani its good place. Not sure about other side dishes. Overall a good place for Biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered veg Hyderabadi biryani for delivery. Delivered on time.
Biryani was very tasteful.. Thank You!
Quantity of biryani was ok, enough for 2! But quantity of sides (gravy and raita) was less. Gravy was tasty.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had ammi's biryani before but this was not at the same level. Taste was okay, the vegetables were over cooked. Achari aloo and mango sharbat were not that impressive. Expected a little more.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered hyderabadi chicken biriyani family pack tonight, got three boxes of biriyanis of which one was spoilt, bad experience. Pls improve.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Delivery was very swift
Ordered aloo achari and paneer kali mirch
paneer was like rubber and extremely spicy
aloo achari was also very spice but tasted good
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Food was delivered within the promised time. Biriyani was very bad :( Chicken was not tasting good. Wife got nauseated just by looking at it. Definitely not going to order from here again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I think in bangalore they make the best Hyderabadi biryani the price line is just reasonable n the packing I really good . I lived in Hyderabad for a long time I know how it should be closest thing to that is ammi's biryani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
We love the mutton biriyani and the restaurant is not that great. So we prefer the home delivery.
You folks should delivery better raita. Your raita is very watery. Once I got chutney for my biriyani instead of salan. Wth!!
Cheers! I'll keep ordering anyways!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place being close to my work place was the sole reason i gave it a shot on a late weekday evening. My expectations were low but i guess they should have been rock bottom.

As i entered the place, i was surprised to find noone inside. Not even anyone from the restaurant! A lady peeked from the kitchen and that was a respite and i tried ordering 2 or 3 different type of biryanis, none of which was available. I was told that only one type of biryani was available, it was so forgettable experience that i don't even remember the name, probably it was just a regular chicken biryani.

I was served in quick time, which i guess was the only upside about this place. The taste was bland and i really struggled to find pieces of chicken which seemed to be hidden away in abundance of rice. There was a side undelightful dessert served as well, which was as forgettable as the main course.

The price is too hefty with taxes for whatever is served at this place. Not even worth trying, zero mile punjab is just next door which is better than this any day.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Bravo...Biryani...
Canteens in hospital are always kept in hygiene but the food served here makes you real sick..bland idli cold sambhar, watery milk, semi cookedcurries gives a feeling that its better to stay with hunger rather than indulging in this kind of mediocre fare..
The scenario is same even in world's renowned "Narayana Hrudayalaya"..So ordered lunch from Ammis Biryani..I got delivery well in advance than mentioned time..Hyd veg dum biryani was awesome, starter gobi kasundhi tasted awful and gave a vomit kind of feeling..it caters more to the tastes of bengalis and oriya people as we dont like huge quantities of mustard in our food..Phirni was just ok.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Miserable Experience ,  They have such a wide menu but only 1 type of chicken biryani was available .I do not understand why some one would have such a big menu and then say only one biryani is available .Delivery Time - 1 Hour and 45 Minutes ...Food - Biryani is decent , But what is the point if you cannot eat what you want when you want .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: As they serve good quantity of Biryani rice with every order, I tried the independence combo on 15th of August and that too for just 170 INR. It included Veg Biryani, my favorite Matka Phirni and 300 ml Aam Panna. Awesome taste. I will give 3.5 only as they did not pack the biryani in a container but in just a small paper pack.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had ordered a Veg Dum Biryani. The biryani was not that great. The biryani was not cooked properly and no vegetables were found in the biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammis Biriyani used to be one among my favorites , but lately the authenticity  of the taste of the  biriyani has gone down tremendously! The last time i ordered from here , the rice wasn't well cooked and the taste was almost bland without any of the spiciness which was what i loved here at Ammis! I seriously hope that the next time i order , i get a taste of the old Ammis instead.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One of the many biryani eateries in HSR. I ordered a veg biryani combo. The rice was partially cooked while the spices were patchy and not mixed properly. It was also one of the drier biryanis that I have had recently. All in all a place you can avoid.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I think your Hattrick chicken is the best-seller. Though, when I went this time, the manager said it's not available. I hope you have not discontinued it. Thalassery Biryani I like the second best and the rolls. They are good. You should work on the ambiance a bit more. The staff was very friendly but then, I was mainly there for the takeaway. Great experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good experience. Nothing bad but they can improve the taste. Compared to other biriyanis I had Ammis is different that's unique taste. Taste and quantity good. Unfortunately the leg piece which I got in my meal box wasn't well cooked. Please do take care of this. I was in absolute happiness got a leg piece and yakk after a bite.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place is next to the MK ahmed and shiva optical center. I was here to try their biriyani. I was surprised to see no people on a sunday afternoon in their store. I realized that one of the reasons could be the poor ambience and low hygienic conditions in the restaurant. I was unsure whether to have my lunch there or get a takeaway. I however decided its much easier to have it there.
I went for a combo where I got a side, juice and biriyani. I have to say, I liked the biriyani here more than the mani's biriyani.
That said, the place needs to be maintained well to regain any chance of survival. The service was decent here.
My tip is that if you like their biriyani, get a parcel. I've done that the last time and wasn't disappointed.

buttertheory.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Really disappointed with the kind of taste they offer. Packing is nice but biryani is not so good. Avoid this place. It's slightly oily and despite of warm biryani it doesn't taste good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Food is fabulous.. Home Delivery was on time in fact before the time.. Nice service.. Recommended to all.. As I stay in HSR Layout.. This branch is good.. :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I'm writing on this branch because of the fact that I'm unable to find the Electronic City Phase 1 branch, to write a review.

The reason for giving a low review is solely based on the quantity of serving. It was too less and insufficient to fill someone for lunch. At the same time price was too much for the quantity provided.

You need to improve on this.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Delivery. They came late and there was no reason for the delivery boy to claim that he's gonna reach within five minutes. Food was at best ok. A little oily and not really worth it
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One of my favorite biryani's from ammi's. Home delivery's fine although rarely the order's delayed but it's worth the wait. If anyone has not tried ammi's i would recommend them to try chicken zeera samba biriyani as it is my favorite biriyani of all time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Such an over rated place . The Ammi has forgotten the recipe, tastes like fresh from the microwave . Bad service , I heard these chain is still expanding , I wonder why. Go there if you feel like having a bad biriyani day
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered chicken biryani and murg tikka.. When the parcel arrived everything was messed up.. The chutney and the curry spilled out.. Biryani rice tasted good.. But the tikka tasted as if it was not fresh and was uncooked.. Non veg should be served fresh because if it isn't it can causes serious health problems.. Not sure if the chicken I ate today was fresh or not.. Also the chicken pieces in the biryani were uncooked and hard.. The chicken pieces are supposed to be marinated for long so that the masala goes deep inside making them soft and delicious.. Sorry but very disappointed :(
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered veg hyderabadi biryani. When the order arrived I was disappointed with the packaging. The salan, chutney etc.. spilled out. See the attached images.

Biryani was good in taste.

Will order again if their is service is improved.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Its been 2 hours since I ordered for home delivery, still not received it.
I was so hungry at 2:30 I placed the order now it is 4:46 an still no show.

THIS IS ABSOLUTELY PATHETIC SERVICE!!!!!!!

DONT LIKE IT!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Pathetic service

Delivery took close to 2 hours

Customer service is very bad. Behaviour of person answering calls is quite aggressive

Briyani quality is not at all worth the price they charge
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
If ur friend says he ordered biriyani and 2 hrs later u get a wrong cover, it had to be from ammis

Useless delivery. Biriyani 3/5
Delivery - 3/5
Overall 0/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I went to the ammi biryani outlet located at HSR layout to get a parcel, the ambiance is not greatest at all (i am not criticizing/complaining  here). Its a place were you can eat and move.

I got my parcel and left the place. To my surprise the biryani was so cold that the excitement and crave for having a biryani was completely  dead.

I would never appreciate a food that is served directly from fridge. 

Here I would only suggest to serve the food hot and fresh, thats what customer expect from a very good and huge chain to resto.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have been here with a bunch of friends ordered a lot of biryanis and almost all of them were good and fresh in taste. The Mirch biryani was quiet spicy as I like it to be. I didn't like the kebab. Ordered some desserts too from which the phirni was good and cooled down the spice levels.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had been a great fan of Ammis biriyani, but lately the food have become pathetic.  The quality have come down to lowest standard over last 1 year period. And i have decided not to order further after my latest order two weeks back.

Ordered one Hyderabdi Murg Biriyani and two murg guntur kabab through phone. The delivery took over 90minutes, even though they promised delivery within 45minutes( it was not on weekend or public holiday).   The food received was worst to the most possible extent. The rice in Biriyani was tasting raw, the chicken was feeling uncooked, and overall the was tasting some bad oil. I hope they have reused the oil endlessely to get this stinking flavour. Even with kabab it was same, bathing in pool of oil( the burned smell of oil was hard to ignore).

I will not order Ammis Biriyani anymore, even my friends have same experience.

They have forgot customers in their zest to grow.

Regrdas,
Viv
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
When you think of eating Biryani, this is one of the definite brand which you will consider before shortlisting the final option. I should say that these is a refurbished branch opened up again in HSR layout. Earlier they were located besides Mcdonalds towards other side and they have reopened it again just besides MK retail near BDA complex. During this gap of 6 months, this was the only brand missing in this area.
There isn't much to talk about the ambience as it is just a tiny place with attached kitchen. For me it didn't look like a restaurant where we can spend sometime and eat properly. So I opted for the take away option and had ordered for normal chicken biryani and executive mutton biryani. Being Sunday I expected that the waiting period might be more than expected but to my surprise they came with the order within 12 min. The container option was real good as it is being served as ready to eat, with spoon and raitha inside it.
Taste wise the biryani didn't taste that much convincingly but shud be OK to ash down our hunger for Biryani. As it is not a service oriented restaurant, so cannot comment much on the service.
Ambience - 3/5
Service - N/A
Food - 3.5
Cost - 2.75/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The worst biryani I ever had in Bangalore. Stale and very salty chicken biryani. As expected from an instant ready to eat kind of place. But biryani take lot more effort to be made properly.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have been impressed by the concept of biriyani on call. Being a bengali, always had a genetic affair with biriyani and thanks to ammi's biriyani. .. I can get biriyani delivered sorting at home. They have an online portal where you can order and make payment. Service is prompt and delivery on time. Coming to the biriyani, I have had better. But keep in mind the convenience factor which will allow discounting the taste to some extent. Quantity of raita is on the lower spectrum given the quantity of rice. But as a package deal with gone delivery and loads of combo choices. Its a great place to order from to date the biriyani craving.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's biryani is my favorite place for the comfort of getting delicious biryani deliverd to my home. The biryani tastes very good as compared so other places nearby. Just a few suggestions, first is please include a proper gravy with the order instead of the tomato gravy, maybe a chicken or mutton stock based gravy for non veg and something on the veggie side as well. The 2nd would be please add more options for the side dishes as well. The current menu is satisfying but has scope for improvement.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The Egg Biriyani (in veg rice) is awesome. The quantity is perfect for a hungry adult. I really like the tomato curry, raita and the yellow sweet dish that they give with the biriyani. The option of having Egg Biriyani in veg rice makes Ammi's my favourite Biriyani joint. I have ordered this Egg Biriyani over half a dozen times in Chennai and Bangalore put together. The taste is consistently the same.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had ordered. Executive combo which had a Biriyani and 2 piece kabab for 130 bucks and it was so yummy and I loved the kebab which had authentic taste. But I was not much satisfied with Biriyani though. I have earlier tasted their other varieties of Biriyani and they are just decent to good. The texture of rice in Biriyani is not right and it gets little squashy. If they work on that I guess they can be better. But I loved what I got for the combo and it was totally worth for it. Totally worth for the money.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Nice place for biryani, service is updated with current technology, excellent customer service.

Would like to order again :-)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani is a decent and quick option to relish on some good biryani as they are spread all across Bangalore.

Shining star: Murgh Hyderabadi Biryani was yummy and thankfully, the chicken pieces did not put up a struggle i.e. the chicken was well cooked and the gravy that came along enhanced the overall taste really well.

Murgh Harimirch Biryani was also good but a lil spicy for even a chilly lover like me which forced me to gulp down the only sad part of the entire meal, Kheer. It was extremely watery and definitely an embarrassment to the decent biryanis.

Worth a try sometime :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Food taste was pathetic...the rice was not boiled properly and it was uncooked. The chicken was uncooked as well. No tenderness in the chicken. The so called seekh kabab also looked uncooked and tasted bad. Couldn't eat anything complete. I don't think they really know what is biryani. Only positive is the packing.

I will never recommend it to anyone.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Its a problem with all Ammi's biryani as I have tried 3 places unwillingly due to peer pressure(Look it lasts till midlife also)They just dont know how to get the taste ..

Putting lot of garlic will not create good Biryani. Somebody send them to Bhopal or Lucknow to learn to cook basic biryani. With min seen spices how the flavors needs to be created. They suggest that the taste is consistent as it gets prepared at a single location and then gets delivered to various franchisee !!!! ha ha so as I said they are consistently horrible.

Apologies for such a bad review but if you brag about being a specialist then better show some signs of the same.

Packing and service and ambiance should not be rated for such places as it is more of home-delivery joints rather than restaurants.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This Sunday we have decided to have brunch and bought one veg biryani and egg biryani from Ammi's. The taste was so pathetic and for sure it doesn't taste like biryani. Morover we have experienced chicken pieces in egg biryani. It was the worst experience. One thing is for sure, they are not experts in biryani making. They are just trying to cash on the name "Biryani".
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Being a biriyani lover... ordered hyderabadi mutton biriyani... the taste was good and it was spicy and it what meant to be... as it was Hyderabadi biriyani. The mutton smelled and was not properly cooked...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One of the worst biryani i have ever had. Taste is not good at all. It was not like biryani at all. They really need to improve the quality of biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Stupidest restaurant. Ordered a paneer tikka masala and they sent me chicken. What kind of operations do you guys handle. Don't have have slightest decency.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst biryani ever had, quantity too less,compared to price. Tasteless.Had to order from other restaurant after eating. Regretting after receiving the order. I would rate it zero, but no option. Thanks!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic experience.  I ordered a Chicken Executive Biryani for home delivery and asked to not give chicken breast pieces, and they make it bad usually, hence they gave only a single leg piece and nothing else in the whole biryani. Even the taste of biryani is not upto the mark.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered Veg biryani combo. Tasty and Yummy .But nonetheless quantity is a bit less.With same price ,their should be better quantity.Please take this suggestion.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic is the only way i can describe the chicken biryani. No flavor at all. They just reheat the thing and give.. I don't know when it was actually prepared
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I'm giving 1 as this is the only option for food near Nagasandra
Needless to say that not only the food sucks in terms of taste and looks
I ordered online through Zomato
Food served after one hour was cold
I specifically asked for extra raita and amazingly they forgot to provide Raita at all
Then I ordered for an Achari aloo, which was not available, so they sent me a chicken tikka roll
Amazing!!!
Had this been Koramangala, I would have created a lot of noise
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Never ever order from this place...The food is awful..They dont know how to cook..You will fall sick..Never ever place online orders. The call center folks  will not do anything...Worst experience ever..Go to hell..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Quantity is not sufficient for a hungry youth. Not great in taste either. Packing is decent. Side dishes are too spicy and comes in miniscule quantities. Not worth 200 bucks per individual.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The food is good. But the place is not upto the mark. The kababs are lipsmacking. If you want to have full satisfaction in the economical way then buy a chicken Biryani executive meal.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
from the menu things sound delicious and inviting but as you get the food it's nothing great..
not a value for money this place.. charging more for the amount of quantity they provide
they don't have enough seating space as well so ordering take away is best.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have ordered chicken biriyani from this place, its good and  very useful when we don't carry our lunch due lack of time. Packing and food is good. One suggestion if desserts and fruit juice varieties are increased will good to pick. Aam sharbat is not good look into it.

do not close online option!!!!!! 
its very helpful...... Thank you! Keep it up!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Serving a bowl of rice with veggies is not called biryani. It needs to be delivered hot and fresh. I had ordered combo meal of hyderabadi biryani + aloo aachari + aam rass from their so called recommended menu. All items in the order were stale and cold. And icing on the cake was the delivery man. Home delivery turned into pickup for me. He just could not understand a word. Finally I had to go the nearest point where he had reached and get the delivery. Packing was good wish food would had been too. Waste of time!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have ordered chicken biriyani from this place which comes in excellent packaging and an eco-friendly carry bag. Since, i was staying up in a student's hostel as a guest for few days, i had no plate or spoon and was worrying about the mess i will create while eating. but thankfully, the biriyani comes in a plastic bowl inside a cardboard box with separate bowls for the curry and the raita and they also provided spoon. the biryani tasted good, like the usual hyderabadi biryani bordering on the spicey type. too much of garam masala, specially the cinnamon was making a bit difficult to gulp after a few spoons. the raita was very good which saved my meal. they gave two big pieces of chicken with it, though i felt small and multiple pieces would have tasted better. Pocket pinch was 200. In a whole i like the eating experience, and a special 'like' for the packaging.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered a home delivery @ 8.20 and confirmed delivery time 9.17 But received @ 10.10 that also i had call customer care ten times. Worst service ever
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One of the worst biryani to see... no taste nothing... looking at the so called biryani u can make out its atleast 24hrs old....never visit this... nothing good - quantity, quality, ambiance, taste... except the posters they've stick in
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The briyani are just too overpriced. The quantity is also so less served. The combo feature saves you money, not actually. The interiors are good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The quality and taste of biryani was good. But the quantity was less. And price is affordable...on the whole it was good experience...Hoping that you people will increase the quantity of the biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Used the online ordering feature of Zomato to order dinner from Ammi's biriyani. Ordering on Zomato was quick and easy. So was the order, they delivered in time and did call to confirm the order. That was when I gave instructions which I had missed out to fill whwn placing the order. Executive egg biriyani was well cooked and tasty, but the quantity was less. Wondered what will the regular size be if executive is so less. If you are a light eater or are ordering for a kid, then the quantity suffices. Dum chicken chettinad was finger licking( A little sweet and hot). It came packaged well (they forgot to pack the spoon though) and delivered in time. Good experience would order again using the online order feature of Zomato. While making the order got in touch with the online support of Zomato who were quick to respond. Thanks team for this experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered Veg Biryani without expectation and yes, it was Good. The delivery was little late, beyond 45 minutes. But Hot Yummy Biryanis made up for it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We ordered biryani from this place once and completely regret our decision. I am not sure how these guys survive with this kind of quality. They are no where near authentic dum biryanis. Based on my experience,I will not recommend this place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Twice the delivery has been delayed by more than 2 hours since order was placed. Good food is of no use if it's not delivered. Be prepared to wait endlessly if you're ordering.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The place is small but the combos are worth the money but a foodie like me will always find the quantity of the food served to be less..and I think the price is bit more when the quantity and quality is in consideration
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This was good food option but now it turned to FRAUD,  three times I got worst experience and now FRAUD .. I order 2 Biryanis, 2kabab & 2 Matka Phirni.. ended up receiving 2 Biryani, 1 Kabab & 1 Matka phirni.. delivery boy did not told and took the complete money. By the time I realize he went .. called customer they are like super man "sir 15 mins your order will come" till now it has not reached .. I think superman lost his chaddi on the way :P ...Forced Charity I did
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
One of the finest biryani in the locality, I would say. But my experience with the seekh kebabs was not very pleasant. I even took a replacement, but in vain.
But overall it's a small good place with courteous staff.
Thanks to #Zomato, for allowing me to speak my heart out to the world.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very arrogant people. Send me used and repacked open biryani after threatening me to not to complain Extremely cheap service. Stopped ordering immediately. Will definitely make a complain.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I like their packing, but that's not all I expect out of an old in fact a very old biryani outlet.

They get 3.5 & not 5 because - they do not have more options I mean u do not get anything more than Biryani & kababs.

I guess being in the market for so long, Ammi's Biryani should go for more items listed in their menu.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good home delivery service in our location you people delivery till night 11 to our shoba apartment . ur harimirch biryani was nice spicy .ur delivery also superb n fast
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Wen ever I feel hungry I il prefer ammis because of der commitment of timing at any moument of the day and desert its Tammy matka pirni , biryani also not too spicy its good to eat
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A nice place for biriyani....frndly staff but need to improve their rolls which they make using paratas instead of thin roti....ambience and service is good. No comments for biriyani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Wonderful timing. boys r excellent. What a service super I did not like it. I love it. Great keep it up. Cheers. We expect more delicious food from u guys.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nice food and good service but no parking in the place .Service is very fast and we got hot n nice food ,good good good good at all the point
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had tried ammi's at BEL road and never made me try them again. Years later home delivery from jalahalli cross branch proved me wrong. The speaker on call was quick n sweet enough to take down n give me enough info. The chicken biryani was spicy enough for this andhra  palate. Delivered within 30 mins and packing was impressive. Well packed in small neat containers and desert was something i din expect. Thumbs up from me n would surely return.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The Biryani served are good. The higher the cost of Biryani the better its taste gets.
Food is good.
Not really spacious. More space and more decoration would have been better experience.
Good service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nice place been there for dine in wid family and take out as well.... Place is not too big... But mostly no waiting as mostly people are opting for home delivery.... Food is good... Service was very good. Price is little high still affordable.... Overall a nice experience....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Food is good but not hot on dine-in though the service is prompt and attentive. Settle for the non-hyderabadi biryani if you want it to be completely flavored.

This place has a parking issue due to the busy connectivity and would suggest to use 2 wheelers to commute here as you can park it in some bylanes close by.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: It's good for non veg food. .. But the veg dishes are not good. ..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Murg hydarabadi birayani it was very tasty.
Thanks to ammis
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered seekh Kabab ,however the kababs were cold and soggy and it was really costly for the quantity that was given.Giving 2 stars just for the timely delivery of the food that was ordered.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had ordered food from Ammi's via Swiggy. Had ordered an Executive Egg Biriyani, Executive Mutton Biriyani and Nimbu-Pani. The Biriyani tatsed good - not too spicy us the way I like it. The mutton pieces were not good; it had a lot of fat portions in it. Raita was nice. The Nimbu-Pani was too sour - lacked a bit of sweetness. Buy overall, I was happy with what was delivered to me.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
When it comes to 'biryani', there are many who serves awesome biryani in Bangalore, still we thought giving this one a try, because of the sentiments we keep for Mother's food.
We ordered a Veg and a Chicken biryani, we found it full of spices, all kind of, that smells so rich and heavy but the taste was disappointing, lot of red chilly powder and salt.
You won't find much difference between Veg and Chicken biryani except chicken pieces, initially I thought they sent 2 chicken biryani. My vegetarian wife denied to eat it.

Few weeks later, I ordered the Chicken biryani again, surprisingly same smell and taste, with extra chilly and salt.
I have never been to the restaurant and always have it delivered so no idea about the ambience and all but their packaging is good.
I don't think I will try it again or recommend it to anyone.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Whenever you try to order something from this place, they wouldnt have it. The taste is average. I am so pissed off by their delivery though.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I find this place a good place to order from and have a quick meal. I like the Executive Biryani in particular, for those who dont want to eat too much. I like the Rolls they have on offer as well. The new additions of Chicken Tikka Biryani, the Andhra Biryani certainly make it an interesting place to frequent. The service is quick and the folks manning the joint are cordial and friendly. Good place overall.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Who doesn't love biriyani !!? And when it is extremely delicious and is a destination for your taste buds, one wants nothing more ! Being an ardent lover of biriyani and a regular customer of Ammi's Biriyani, Kaggasdaspura need no explanations. I have tried out all of their biriyani variety and one thing which makes Ammi's stand out is their "overloaded flavours". The flavours go deep inside the dish so that the meat and the rice, both dwell in flavour and spices. My favourite is SPICY ANDHRA CHICKEN BIRIYANI, beware it is truly very spicy and is a pure heaven for Spice lovers. Each biriyani comes with a brinjal curry and minted curd. The minted curd is a trademark of Ammi's. Quality is a win here and so as the quantity. It is generous. Family packs really suffice a family. The packing is compact and no less.
Go for it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Horrible service. Declined order after 45 mins after placing the order... declined it at 11 in the night. No communication from the restaurant, just got a call from the call centre...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I never had great expectation from this place but it used be last resort when food was not available elsewhere. This time it reached a all time low, the chicken biryani was spoilt. Pls don't go to this place even if u have no where else to go, you are better off staying hungry
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I don't like this place..first day I had biryani here, I didn't like it. It was too dry and chicken felt stale. But since my friends like this place, they convinced me to give this place one more chance, I'll tell you, I still didn't like it. No tenderness in chicken pieces, biryani too dry and the masala curry that was served with biryani also not that good....something was there which should be curd, didn't feel like curd.I don't know why my friends like this place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Just amazing. Worth it. Gets delivered way to quickly, packaging is upto the mark. Biryani tastes good, slightly over priced, rest everything is perfect. Would highly recommend.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Total waste of money. I ordered executive veg biryani and two rasgulla's, after an hour they delivered egg biryani and dessert which was cold. I called and complaint about this , they took around 20 minutes to replace the wrong order. Veg biryani was salty though. Quantity was very less for this price. And ordering dessert was the biggest mistake of mine today. I ordered rasgulla's with rabri but it felt like it was cold hard rasgulla's with dalda. It tasted odd and I didn't even eat it fearing what it was. Sometime back someone warned me not to order from here..God knows what I was thinking while ordering from here. Never going to order from you people.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Never been here ....but only ordered online....
Food taste : 3.2 stars out of 5 stars..
Veg biriyani is quiet salty....
Good packing of food( home delivery)
Recommendations: yes....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Good food and quick delivery!
The chicken biriyani is delicious and filling! The chicken staters is not up to the mark!
Food-8/10
Delivery-10/10
Value for money-9/10
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered for d 1st tim realy vry Gud taste biryani vas 2 d expection..delivered vry early also..â˜ºâ˜ºwanna try out again less cost
.clean enjoyed it
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst biriyanis.. you can get better biriyanis at those road side ambur joints. I have had authentic hyderabadi biriyanis, these are nothing compared to them. Also there packings are worst. If you tilted the box even just a little, all your raita, salan, phirni everything spills.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Too bad... dont dare 2 try also...wrapper/packaging was only good...rest is horrible... some of the boxes were empty... no taste... chilli chilli and lots of chiÄºli...all types of chilli in all items..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Horrible....spoiled my dinner.1st tym i tried with ammi's biryani...and i ll never try again...i orderd chicken keema  roll  its too spicy...its like the main ingriedient is green chilly only.....and i ordered chicken biryani also not good...not at all tasty.....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
On 7th Sep 2015, we placed an order for 2 hyderabadi murg combos. We placed the order at 8:40pm. We kept calling the customer care to know the whereabouts of the parcel. Ultimately we were told at 10:40pm that the delivery was canceled by the delivery person. He seems to have called just once and decided on his own to cancel the delivery. Customer care fellows are not aware of what the delivery guys do. No coordination. Yesterday was our 4 month marriage anniversary. All screwed in the end.

A big no no to Ammi's biryani Kaggadasapura
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I'm absolutely in awe of their service quality. Ordered biryani at around 2 and it was delivered in fifteen minutes! And it was also packed very efficiently. The food is fine and cost effective. But have to say, brilliant service! :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Quickest home delivery ever! Placed my order at 9.45 and received my biryani at 10 PM sharp. First thoughts. Lovely packaging and uber quick delivery. I was pretty impressed. Having heard not-so-great reviews about Ammis, I was a bit skeptical going in, but decided to give it a shot anyway. Tbh, the executive chicken biryani was actually tasty, though the raita was pathetic. The chicken pieces were juicy and aromatic and the quantity of the rice was enough for just one person. The hot meal cost me just 112 bucks and left me satiated.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have been using this for Biriyani delivery for the past one year. They are very consistent with their quality. Prompt delivery and they are time sensitive. Besides the Biriyani, I like their sheek kebabs and phirni. Their Biriyani is a of a very distinct taste. So, drawing comparisons with other Biriyani joints is not going to help.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ok biryanis , sometimes the biryanis is just to oily .... There only thing I like is
Matka feerni ............:...............................
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst taste. Only taste you get is "oil" and burnt leaves inside biryani. We should avoid going there. Eat at you own risk. I made mistake twice.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Buryani is really goos although takes time to deliver. The packaging of the food is good systematic and worth the price. 1 downfall is there kababs...not upto the mark with the quantity for the price
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I dont have less than 1 to rate ur food. Its waste of money, packing is just well managed, nothing else. this was my first and last visit to this restaurant. yesterday rice was mixed with chilli pwer and packed, its not even full packed, half packed and sealed so that can open it when take away. its not basmati rice, its low quality and yesterdays rice not fresh also. I will recommend my friends/family never ever visit this place.it worst than ever.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Been here approx 4 times and last time I visited was when I came to know they just reheat the food in microwave which was a letdown. never managed to go there with a mental block after that
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I was there to try out the executive chicken briyani. the briyani was tasty infact (I am not great connoisseur of food though) but the quantity is very less, even a person with average appetite cannot be fullfilled. too costly for 99 es.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very average food priced highly to cover the fancy packaging.. Sometime its stale food too. Depends on your luck.:)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place mainly concentrates on home delivery, so you'll find it vacant most of time.
Pros: Cheap, decent quantity, you get offers.
Cons: Okay quality, bad service*,okay ambience*.
* if you choose not to get home delivery.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Always empty this place is and I should have understood why right then. I did go in and the biryani is one the worst tastes I've ever tasted. Please go somewhere else or cook biryani at home. Even Empire is better.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Yes, the biryani served here is really really special. Last week on Sunday, 05/11/14, I had ordered, Veg. Subz Biryani, Family pack, for home delivery. The delivery took 35 min. They claim that family pack serves 3-4 people, but it is for 2 people only. Me and my wife had stomach full of biryani and voila...it was over.

The biryani was very good in taste. It was cooked with traditional basmati rice and I could smell the aroma of biryani as soon as the pack arrived. It was served with raitha and veg.kurma. And 600ml Pepsi was complimentary for family packs.

The price of Veg. subz biryani, family pack is Rs.420. I would definitely try the other veg. biryani's as well, next time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ate at this branch (Indiranagar) for the first time and the biriyani was good but the next time ate at Kaggaasapura it was way too tasteless. Looks like they are changing their taste and price from branch to branch. The chicken was smelly inside the biryani and the gravy awful. You do not feel like eating at all and the rice chews you back. The only thing good is the packing and the way of serving. Better prefer the Hyderabad biriyani on any of the branches.
Seriously needs improvement.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have ordered for ammi's Biriyani a couple of times - from the outlet closest to my house.
I find the food so- so and little overpriced - for the amount they serve.

I have also had it in office during a couple of business - quick lunches.

This is a good option for a take-away - in case you are travelling.
Everything is nicely packed. You dont need to worry.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Normal taste and very few options
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have ordered from Ammis Biryani 3 times! 1 time the biryani was good and the rest 2 times it was just awful! Looks like they are charging all the amount on packing and not the actual biryani. The chicken is smelly inside the biryani.. You do not feel at all eating it and the rice chews you back.
If you want to go for the packing, Go for Ammis biryani!
Else eat a vada pav opposite to it!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place is located near the SCT college, so not that hard to locate the place.

Ordered food from here a couple of times and to my expectations, it has fallen short of it. The Egg. biryani and Veg. biryani were not cooked properly and not very tasty. It cannot be termed authentic in any way ..can be useful to fill your stomach.

The only point I appreciate is the service delivery of this location. I ordered couple of times and the home delivery has been very good around 30-40mins. The biryani was hot but unfortunately not very tasty.

In terms of kebabs, did not find much either to complain or appreciate, just for filling, that's all.

Overall, If you need a quick service and wanted to have biryani on a urgent basis and were not in a mood for anything else, then go for it !

Ambiance 3/5 nothing much, average.
Taste 3/5 Average
Service 4/5 impressive in my case. Very prompt biryani executives.
Value for money 3.5/5 Reasonable pricing.

Cheers,
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is really nice ...I like the Biriyani a lot........................
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Good place for the some one desperately craving for authenyic hyderabadi Biriyani..

Ever since I moved to Bangalore from Hyd. I was in search of,some asli hyderabadi Biryani.. And ammis almost touch the spot.

Biryani could be a lil more masaledaar.. The Basmati is good and of premium quality, could be generous with the chicken and mutton pieces..:) And awesome kebans

Note to all hyderabadis in bangalore.. This is not even close to our Paradise or Ruman or Alhamdulillah,, even by a few thousand miles.. But certainly one of the decent alternative..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Tried for the first time an it was waste of money i ordered  one executive mutton biryani , An it was only rice i dint find any mutton piece an the quantity of the rice not even a single person can eat an u charge INR:169 will never visit ammis biryani again if its free of cost also. its better i can have from some other local hotel comparing to your taste an quantity.
I Would Say Waste Of Money & Taste,Good For Nothing "AMMI'S BIRYANI".
REST IN PEACE.

Thanks & Regards  
Mohammed.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Before 2  months biriyanis are very good, but now a days biriyanis become tasteless and less in quantity.  Parceling also pathetic in paper cover.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had ordered 2 Veg Biryani and they delivered me only one biryani labelled as Veg. When I opened it, it was Non-veg. It was really shocking for me as I am pure vegetarian person. The delivery boy went back and came after few minutes again saying sorry for what happened, here is your veg Biryani. Considering earlier one as human mistake, I accepted and opened another order, and to my surprise IT WAS AGAIN NON-VEG CHICKEN BIRYANI.

I immediately cancelled my order and informed them I can't trust them anymore for my food on them.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Used to be one of the good Briyani outlets. But couple of times their delivery was disastrous. We like both their basmati aswell as the jeera rice Briyani. Rice pherni is good. Quantity sufficient. Price sky high....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: They should rename the Chicken Biriyani to chicken bone Biriyani as bones are the only "pieces" of chicken they provide.The most impolite and arrogant customer service I have ever come across.First they serve cold substandard food and then offer a 50 percent discount on my next order(As if I'll order again from them). The worst ever eating experience in Bangalore till date.Such an outlet should be banned from selling food altogether as they are a disgrace to the upcoming and impressive culinary scene of Bangalore. Read my rating as negative infinity instead of a 1 as they do not even deserve that.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic. Too slow delivery. I had to wait for 90 minutes to get the food delivered. Briyani is not even the standard of road side Briyani. Never ever try this food joint.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: decent place to order biryani for home delivery but dont try checken items. The family pack is good enough for 3 adults. They deliver on time and hot.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had ordered veg regular combo .

Veg biryani was mildly spiced ,dry. nothing good about it .Phirni was not at all good and the aam sharabat was mildly sweetened jaljeera !!!!.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A decent option for ordering food online..it delivers yummy biryanis..one thing i like abt the biryani here is the quality of rice they use is very good..the mild spicy flavor gives it a subtle touch which i like..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Terrible biryani! Over spiced, overcooked, with dry pieces of chicken. The andhra biryani had enough Green chillies to leave me with burning insides for hours and should probably come with some kind of disclaimer.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered from ammis earlier and it was pretty decent. However this time the chicken biryani was pretty pathetic today as was the side dish - leaves a lot to be desired. There is some random white rice on topmost the biryani - and the whole taste was awful with barely any chicken pieces
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I wouldent say I had the best biryani ever, I have tasted better biryani very ok and very limited options in the menu. Well if you have no other place to go then you must go.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: There is nothing wrong with the biryani here. Its as good as it can get. The low rating is accreditted to the specially trained staff who think that they are giving the food away for free. The "promptness"and "politeness" is one of its kind. Customer experience is the least thing thats taken care of. And if u plan to order for home delivery make sure you have enough food stocked up till they arrive.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had Ammi's biryani in other outlets also but this place is horrible. They wait for the customers to approach them for the order. They not even bother whether the table is clean or not, tissues are there or not. The reception guy always busy with his local friends (chit-chatting). Food is horrible. We ordered for one regular and one executive biryani, the quantity what other outlets give in executive biryanis these people give for the regular biryani.
Overall experience is horrible. If zero would have been there I would have given zero as a rating. Thanks to this app that they got one.
Please don't visit this outlet, you will lose the faith from Ammi's biryani totally.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Consistency is a major issue with this outlet..there are times when their food is lip smacking however there are also times when the food is stale dry and tasteless... Their harimirchi biryani is great...also executive chicken and mutton biryanis are also good
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I was a regular customer of ammis biryani. Stopped ordering long back when i found a hair in it and when i got old food. Then again, i ordered after long back today through their website and this is my last purchase from them. Those foods they list in website, are not available with them. and i got cheated many times while paying online. whenever i order veg biryani, i gets a call from them saying can we replace with non veg biryani? this happens everytime and no money return is available with them. Never reccommend this. the way they treat the customers is worst !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: 2 hours and no sign of the delivery guy. The guy whose number came with the order confirmation stops answering his phone. Pathetic experience at the HRBR branch. No more ordering here. Done.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is my 2nd review and guess will be the last. We ordered for 3 Exec Chicken Biryani for lunch yday, 1st up the call center guy who took the order told us tat it'll take 45mins for the order to be delivered which we didn't object to, after 45 mins we had to call and remind them about tat order not being delivered 2nd call the advisor was very rude and straight away said tat there's nothing much he could do coz the delivery was outsourced to some road runners and finally we asked him to cancel the order which he said he wld but didn't finally when the food arrived it tasted pathetic at tat time the feeling was Ambur Biryani was much better, to add to our misery one of our frnd found two strands of hair in the biryani finally we had to throw all the 3 packs half way through. I'm very sure tat we will not be recommending Ammi's to anyone atleast to the people we know.  Been a bad experience not worth it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Today (30-08-2015 12:21 PM), I have ordered for 2 Hyderabadi Subzi Biryani which is promised to be delivered by 1:10PM.
However, the delivery is delayed by more than 40 mins.

Much more interesting fact is that the delivered biryani was expired on (29-08-2015).
Attached the photo also for reference.  Bill dated 30-08-2015 and Delivered biryani Use by date is: 29-08-2015. Purposefully, the batch number is teared off before delivery.

When, I have contacted the store on their landline number: 080-25717777 and I got a response that the store manager will contact me. And the manager has informed me that he will replace the order within 10 mins. I have waited for around 45 mins again and still there was no response.

Better, be careful with these kind of sellers. They are selling stale food at premium prices putting people's health at risk.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: All ammi's outlets food is good, but this place food taste is not up to the mark, i ordered for some veg combo( contains veg birayani, aachari aalu n nebu pani). But the aachari aalu was not at all gud.I think they preserved that for more than a day..so the taste is really pathetic.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Great variety in biryani's as well as Kebab's ! The Zeera Sambhar Biryani is a must have . Chicken adraki kabab is something definitely worth trying if you want to explore more . The quantity though in my personal opinion should be increased in both kebabs and biryani's ! Packaging of food is really nice . The service quality is extremely poor . Ended up having a quarrel with the spokesperson whom I talked to on a phone call after registering for a complain . If they're telling you 45 minutes it's a hoax . The actual service time is 60 minutes which is never said in the text delivered to you . Try and always opt for the service guarantee to get your order delivered on time ! P.S. Ammis BiryaniIncrease your delivery staff and train them properly on how to interact with customers ! 9/10 ðŸ‘ðŸ½ for food, 1 for service !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
