As per its other twigs it also comes with minimal service, decor and ambience... As they have 30+ outlets in Bangalore they are following almost the same recipe for all outlets... Upright with locality... Serving personnel very caring and self-effacing for service... The platingâ€™s are not countless as always... but they use a very well-ordered and decent technique for packaging the takeaway food which I like the most... Their menu is almost nothing for the vegetarians... So not a good choice if you are in lover with veggies...

For ramzan they are running a new menu you can... But my favorite is always the combos... They are good at quantity and quality also... You will not feel like Hyderabad because they are using that much of spice as compared but you will enjoy your biryani because of their balanced recipe not too spicy not too bland. I will say an average biryani...You can try their haleemâ€¦

Bon Appetite @ Chef BB

chefbb.in
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: If you aren't environmentally conscious, you'll love the packaging. If you are, I'd suggest you don't do home delivery. The amount of packing and wastage for even a simple order is quite excessive. It's almost as if they believe this planet has infinite resources. That apart, pretty good for a quick biriyani. I wouldn't call it the best, I wouldn't say it's bad either. That it will satisfy your craving for biriyani is about it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Only good if you plan for the office lunch, for a reason that it comes in box which doesn't cutlery or plate. Rest nothing exciting ...one regular biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I stay in horamavu road. Initially when I tasted ammis biryani, I really liked it and ordered couple times and got the good biryani. But recently I ordered ammis biryani and got delivered in 45 mins. I received at 8:30 pm and opened the box 8:45pm and found the biryani is sticky sticky and smells too bad..  looks like they delivered previous days biryani. This was my worst experience I had with ammis. I called them and complained about it. They replaced it around 11PM in the night.. but overall they should concentrate on the quality check before delivering to the customer.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Yummy Biryani and roll.
But the matka phirni is pathetic,it comes for 50 Rs and useless.In my office Ammis Biryani they give it for 34 Rs and better quality.So should improve the sweets.Otherwise yummy and delicious dishes
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Amazing food... The best biryani I have ever tasted... It's so yummy... I love the detailing in packaging..... Tasty food, super quick delivery., and clean kitchens..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Lately the biryani has become yummy. I really like the Hyderabadi biryani and Shaadi biryani. The packaging is superb.

I don't like their Salan and Phirni that come with the biryani. I just throw them. They should improve it or dont give them at all.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biriyani has an authentic taste. They bring out the best in the combination of chicken and rice. Its one of my favorite biriyani destinations. The phirni served at the end just relaxes your taste buds because yes the biriyani is spicy.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: They started out good, but recently I have found their chicken pieces dry and overdone. Also the rice tends to be too spicy for my palate. I hope they work more on quality now instead of just opening more stores. I am looking elsewhere for a good Biryani...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We had a employee get together and we have ordered 2 family pack hyderabadi chicken biryani. Honestly it was horrible. I really don't understand why there is so much hype. It was only pepper powder not red chilli, which was unpalatable. Totally disappointing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Nice taste and good serving
For reasonable fare
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered Veg Biryani + Achaari Aloo over the phone and was promised delivery within 45 mins. Order number received via SMS can be used on their website to track the order!
Got my order within the promised time (1 pt) and the delivery boy was really polite and had a smile on his face (1 pt).
I was really surprised by the packing, very similar to the pizza boxes. The package had Biryani, Raita, Tomato gravy and a cup of sweet too! Another small packet had a toothpick, tissues and a spoon; really impressed.
The Biryani tasted good with good amount of perfectly cooked vegetables and the achaari Aloo was tangy and I finished both in a jiffy. Quantity is really good for a filling lunch/dinner.
Packing - 4.5/5
Delivery - 4/5
Food Main - 3.5/5
Food side - 3/5
VFM - 3.5/5

I would definitely recommend this place if you are really hungry and have no other decent options.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The worst biryani makers in town....Ambur biryani tastes better than Ammis
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had a normal Biriyani. Quantity is low compared to other hotels. Basically I didn't like the place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: My general thumb rule is you don't get great veg stuff at places which primarily serve a non veg cuisine . This one is an exception . The Veg biriyanis are good and wholesome . I usually go for their combo which comes with tawa veg and some dessert . Very recently they have upgraded their menu to have more veg options . Another new addition is their executive Biryani which is supposed to be 3/4 the regular quantity but is perfectly enough for a person and fits in within 100 bucks . Do try it - you won't be disappointed .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
(I presume this is the same Ammi's outlet which is located on the Kasturi Nagar main road.)

I was in Kasturi Nagar area one weekend when I spotted the Ammi's Biryani outlet. Seeing that I was planning to go on "no-outside-food" diet starting the very next day (which ended up unsuccessful anyway :P), I got tempted to try some Biryani one last time.

This outlet is like any other of theirs, so I am not going to write about the ambiance and all. My takeaway order was very simple because there are hardly any vegetarian choices. The subz biryani combo is basically 3 packs of biryanis, with a free 1 ltre soft drink thrown in for free. Even after 30 mins post packing, the Biryani was quite hot. Their neat packing of course is something I have always liked. And luckily, this time even the Biryani tasted very good. Made of Basmati rice, it had lots of well cooked veggies such as potato, cauliflower, beans, etc. Even the spice balance was quite right, in that it was neither too spicy nor bland. However, the quantity was too much for three adults. We had to store almost half of the order in the fridge to consume later.

Overall, I was pretty happy with the food which came as a pleasant surprise, given that we've had some not-so-good experiences in the past (when we'd ordered from my office). The meal cost 390 INR which is quite VFM.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Most of the time, you wont get vegetarian food...they say out of stock
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biryani is just below average here... Lacks flavours, aroma. Only the delivery is quite fast. Wouldn't order again for sure... Disappointed!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered something else. I got something else... Asked for refund.. and I got 100 rs refund for the order of 370... We had to skip the lunch and the food was wasted we could not have it...
There is a system glitch.... Which they are not admitting... The screen shot shows the order is not delivered even after one hour of the scheduled delivery time...
End result .. by ordering on zomato.. I loose 300 rs and skip lunch....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Dear Bangalorean if you want to have spicy Andhra Chicken biryani.. then its time for you guys to order from Ãmmi's. Good taste. :)  
mast biryani thi yaar...theekha theekhaaa :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Today's chicken hydrebadi biryani was really aromatic , good texture and the taste was incredibly yum
I've been ordering from Ammis and the taste I'm very nice
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have ordered a Chicken tikka biryani,It was not looking or tasting as chicken tikka biryani,were they will give only Raitha not gravy.
All food of ammis will taste same flavour as it is same masala.
there is no difference between Executive biryani and regular biryani.
i will not suggest any1 for these food.totally waste of money
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have ordered biryani from here many times not beacuse the food is great but the delivery is very fast.If you are very hungry and want to get food delivered fast this is the place or else do not order beacuse the biryani is not that great.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: If used tobe my favorite but lately, the quality and taste of biryanis have gone down too much. I hate the packing material now. Gives it a low qulity store feel. Its high time things are changed here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Poor Food Quality!  They've gone from bad to worse. Will not order again. Paradise makes much better biriyani. Save your money and your "tongue" from this junk.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered 2 parathas and a panner curry. Unfortunately, the parathas were cold and hard. However, the curry was warm enough to eat.

Really disappointed with the delivery, took them 1 hour 30 minutes to deliver and the number provided was switched off.

Zomato, provided the same number to contact. When I called Ammi's customer service, they told they would check and callback which never happened.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered hat trick chicken briyani and chicken sheekh kebab. Both we're very good. Briyani was come with chicken and omelet. It was very tasty. Kebab was very good perfectly cooked. I am little surprised to see their rating its below 2.5 . but food was very good. May be it because of there service. Delivery was little late.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Went there only to have their newly launched trio biryani.. they call it hatrick biryani.. it consist of biryani, chicken and omlette for a pocket friendly cost of Rs 75.. well I kinda liked it coz you can't expect much for that amount.. I have no idea about other biryani served here..
Happy fooding
Cheers!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
My 1st experience was really bad, we ordered one chicken biryani at 9.15pm and it arrived at 1.30am, we had to wait because we had already paid online. By the time the biryani reached us it was icy cold but it was tasty. We had ordered via foodpanda
My 2nd experience was good when I ordered through swiggy. The executive chicken biryani reached me within an hour. It was delicious and sufficient for one person. They don't serve raita but some watered down green chutney , it tasted okay.
They pack the food really well.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered two executive veg biryani ... At around 12:50pm ... Delivery was supposed to happen by 1:50 .. After waiting till 2:20 , had a chat with zomato ... Then got a call saying it will reach in 10 mins ... Never mind received it at 2:45 ... And when we open the box to eat the biryani to our shock it turned out to be CHICKEN BIRYANI .... Both the boxes were chicken biryani ... We being pure vegetarian were quite disgusted and sad ... A restaurant can't handle a delivery and packing of different biryanis are not fit to be in this industry .... Highly not recommended eatery
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have ordered few times from ammi's, experience was good all the time as they have good delivery service. Biriyani isn't so bad and not that great either. Starters are tasty, but quantity wise less. Overall a good restaurant, prices are little high for the taste and quantity of food served in ammi's. But it all depends on taste and preferences, so trying once won't hurt.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Overpriced for the quality, quantity and freshness of food.
The food was served oven heated!
Definitely not worth it.
Honestly the egg biryani at railway stations are much better!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Looks like they make the biryani at one place and distribute to their outlets. They heat it up and given when we order. I hope they don't serve the old stock. But I didn't like it
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I dont really understand how the hate is growing for this franchise.
I accept that their service is horrible but honestly i liked the style of their biryani. Though they have an expensive prices for their starters with very less quantity i'd recommend it.

However the quantity of executive biryani can be improved.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Horrible biriyani,  I ordered biryani at 13:05 & they confirmed us it will reached on or before 14:00 but they delayed like anythings & hashing the customers, its reached us after 15:00  I must say if they don't have capacity to delivered on time should stop delivery services.  waste of time and money.

Waste
Waste
Bed Services
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The service is just horrible n the call centre just sucks, the inconvenience caused to the customers it's just not taken care of. When u call the call centre they just keep transferring your call n just don't give solution
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Horrible biriyani, they have it stored In a refrigerator and just heat it to serve. The price to quantity ratio is bad . This place is a waste of time and money.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered biryani couple of times from here and I must say the food is really good. Though once they sent nimbu pani instead of aam pani (don't remember the exact name now). I'll definitely try going to restaurant because of the food.
Edit: I tried ordering from them again and this time they nailed it. Fabulous packing. Good taste. They didn't miss out this time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very low quantity and taste is average. We had ordered biriyani and it was really disappointing. Dint like anything over there. Highly priced for the poor qty and quality
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Don't understand why it has such average ratings, but then again different people different views eh ? But I have had food from this place almost 5 times now and it has never disappointed me ! And always the Biryani is very good ! Delicious. Chicken is also very good no doubt about that. Succulent and tender. Have had it delivered twice and it comes in a very neat way with good packing. People must try out from this place, I would surely recommend it to everyone !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have been ordering from here since long time there non veg biryani are Pretty decent but did not like the beg biryani it was full of spices and tasteless, try there executive biryani if you like to order biryani in a box and do not want to use any vessels
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I would gove this place a 4.5 coz its a ssta+tikaao place...that means value for mone...the quantity is good for the price it is offered at...and it implies to all the dishes...overall a nice place to order from...thr outlet is rather small so wouldn't suggest dining in...but the food won't disappoint you...try it!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Food was good, especially liked the gulab jamun with rabri. The exective meal was good, not too heavy and light on the pocket too. Always the best option on the lazy weekends.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered a Egg Briyani online. And it was worst Briyani ever. It shouldn't be called Briyani in fact. It is just colored rice with 2 eggs. So no next business with Ammi's Colored Rice.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammis biriyani plays a vital role on the days you get lazy to cook. We need Ammis biriyani in kochi too!! Fast and prompt delivery. have felt the biriyani is spicy still do order as they deliver at home. Recommended!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biriyani is good here. Always prefer to place home delivery of a family pack of biriyani using food panda. You will get it for very less price and you will get more quantity along with a 750ml Pepsi and payasam. Don't try visiting the outlet.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Being a vegetarian, I had only 2 options to try here - Hyderabadi Veg Biryani and Achari Aloo. The Biryani is average, tasty but not exceptional. One biryani is enough for 2 people. They serve it with gravy, raita and a sweet. The Raita is more like runny chutney. The Achari aloo was lower than average. It was almost bland, tasted like a boiled potato rolled in masala. Overall, an average experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had ordered mutton biryani and it was delivered in a very neat easy to eat box. The quantity was sumptuous with 3 pieces of mutton in it. The sides had a tomato chutney (not great), raita and kheer(wasn't too sweet so was good). It wasn't too heavy on the pocket either. Overall, a good experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Finally decided to go this to much hyped biriyani place .. We ordered the Hyderabadi chicken biriyani ... First of all it was way too spicy ... De quantity was sufficient in terms of rice .. Juz 2 small piece of chicken in it... De rice was juz too dry ... De chicken masala cudnt even be tasted... N to add to misery the side gravy they provided was horrible it tasted sweet with much tomato sauce used .. N instead of curd salad they gave chutney type ... All in all it ruined my total experience .. I have tasted much better biriyani in local street shops ... Never goin here again ...ðŸ™ðŸ»ðŸ™ðŸ»ðŸ™ðŸ»
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Thooo...the rice was too hard to chew and the meat was stale(Dark coloured) Photo attached. I will never never again visit your lousy restaurant. (Chandra Layout Main Road)..................................................................
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: hi, i love the taste of biryani..... is it possible for me to order and pay online.........        i want to send it to my mom n dad as a suprise treat.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Recently had a home delivery.. They had this combo pack of biryani , chicken Fry n soft drinks.. The delivery took 45 mins.. And the biryani was a treat with tasty chicken fry..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have tried their executive chicken biriyani a couple of times. What i really like about their biriyani, especially since both times i ordered home delivery, is their packing. It is very easy to eat and discard without much hassle. Especially it is a very good packing for travelling. Coming to biriyani per se, it was average. Nothing great nor it was too bad.

srirelishes.blogspot.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I quite love this place. And while people have bitched them out I loyally continue to stand by them and be a patron. Even though they serve some disgusting chutney which they're passing off as raita with the executive biryanis. I'm glad though that they now serve raita with some of the full size biryanis.
Executive biryanis are a great option though for the light eaters. I generally get the egg or the chicken biryani. I tried the chicken tikka biryani too but that was a tad too spicy for me.
They do have gravy options as well but I haven't tried those.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's used to taste great when they launched and for a long time after that. For the past few months, their taste and quality of ingredients used has definitely gone down.remember ordering for home delivery long ago from this outlet and it was always a pleasant experience. Becoming disappointing of late.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have to say that this outlet is somewhat better than others, both in terms of space any quality of food. The place offers a very limited menu. If you wanna have only biryani you should come here. We ordered chicken biryani regular n executive and it left a good impression. Biryani was cooked differently than what we get usually in Bangalore, topped with golden brown onions and spice level was just perfect. Overall it was pleasant biryani experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This was my second visit and I was quite impressed this time... I like the way biryani was cooked and served. Service is quick. Only thing is the place is a bit cramped up so sometimes there is a long line of people.. Overall satisfied with it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Quality and taste is good... Quantity is less.. Service is good...combos are not that good. All they offer is a Pepsi always. Prices are pretty decent.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Veg Subzi biryani tastes good..lots of subzi though. The side - aachari aalo- okayish. Raita was a bit too sour and had no veggies. Aam sharbat way too sweet. I wouldn't recommend combos. Moderate pricing. Value for money 4/5. The food was delivered quickly and it was steaming hot. I loved the packaging.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I couldn't understand what is there to like it. less than average. Quantity is good. I had tried chicken biryani and didn't like it. Spice levels are ok.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Biggest positive: Quantity of biryani.
Negative: Ordinary taste
Recommended dish: Biryanis.

Located near corner house. You place the order downstairs, service will be to the seating area on 1st floor. Ambience is ok. Service is quick.
The choice is mainly among biryanis and biryani combos. All biryanis are served with some raitha and a sweet, which are pretty decent and different from ordinary. The biryani as such is of standard taste. The quantity is decent. Pricing is fair.
On the whole, an option for a quick biryani lunch not expecting any extra ordinary taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani serves average biryani and it's service and ambience makes it below average.
I visited here with my friend and we had CHICKEN BIRYANI COMBO and VEG BIRYANI COMBO.... all the dishes in combo meal... starters.. biryani... desserts... taste average...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biryani is pretty good according to the price... but it wont be a biryani lover's 1st choice. The quantity is also finem but it has Poor ambience and slow service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Asked for home delivery and they are pro in it. They promised 70min delivery and delivered it by 45 mins. Well the Mutton Biriyani and Firni are not the best here, but Biriyani is not a Bangalore dish and there are very few places in Bangalore which can offer you a better Biriyani than Ammi's.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I went to their Koramangala outlet. As was referred by a friend, I went to try their biryani. It tasted good but the quantity was really less. Overall, an okayish experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Pretty average fair. The biryani is good but there isn't anything that sets it apart from what you would have eaten elsewhere.
I tried their ginger kebabs and the meat smelled foul and stale. When I debated this with the head chef he said that's how it's meant to be but agreed to reverse the order.
On the contrary. They make a wicked take away box. Perfect for lunch at work with sealed and compartmentalised curd and curry. That's quite a neat packaging idea they have.

3 on 5 for their biryani combined in take away packaging.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
You are in Kormangala ...its late ...just need to rush home and looking for an take away. 

Ammi's Biryani is a good option.

Will insist to take away then having dinning as ambience is not that great.

Considering price the quantity is not bad and taste is above average.

If you want to take some side dish with Biryani starters are good at good price.

A good place for students were time and money is constrain..

Rating: 3.5/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Definitely not ur first choice if u are a great fan of biriyanis... i ordered a hyderabadi murg biriyani combo ...except for the biriyani noting is good in the combo
Even the quantity they serve is not proportionate to the price
N coming to the biriyani its very oily n it masked the biriyani's taste
Rest everything in the menu is not even worth mentioning.

I personally think these ppl have to improve a lot.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Got a executive combo take away from here. It had plain biriyani, chicken curry and lemonade. Food was hot and good. There is not much place to dine inside. Better to get a take away and enjoy at your place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This is a place where you can stop and eat Biryani at a reasonable rate without regretting.
I tried almost all non-veg Biryanis from there menu .
Hyderabadi  murg and gosht biryani is the best thing in there menu .
Quantity is fine . There salan is also nice .
hari mirch biryani is just ok . 
There kebabs is not good .
Overall you can go for biryanis .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Really very bad experience I didn't like Ammi's really very bad service for home delivery............? Food was also very cold & it was not fresh at all..........
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nobody picked up my order! Ordered from this place at 2:20 pm... even at 4 pm, I kept on getting the message that the vendor has not picked up the order yet. Had to skip lunch all thanks to this place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammis Biryani
I have been having it for the past 4 years.
The Food is Great the service is punctual and the packaging Very Good. Keep up the Good Work.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Super Biryani fantastic packaging love to visit the place often binge on Ammi's Biryani would advocate all bangaloreans to to have a taste of great biryani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I love the fresh taste of the biryani they serve every time and the side. The chicken pieces where also good and tender. Service was okay. I liked the kebabs too.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I just loved the fresh and light Biryani. The quantity was just right and the packaging was truly unique. Will definite try often. Must check home delivery also .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had not had Ammis biryani for quite sometime. Last week I decide to try and was pleasantly surprised to see that their quality has gone up a notch higher. When I mean quality, I like the rice they use now, I liked the aroma and the taste. I even liked the packing with which it comes , and hence I had a great eating experience.  Keep it going guys.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's biryani made my Sunday. I had few visitors from Mumbai who wanted to eat in Ammi's Biryani as they had read something good about it. I ordered few Chicken Biryanis and Kebabs. I was awed with the food quality, taste and freshness. The guests enjoyed it.. I strongly recommend this for all the Biryani Lovers..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered chicken Biriyani and kebab to be home delivered . Was pleasantly surprised when it was delivered in half an hour. The food was hot and fresh.  The Biriyani was delicious. The kebab nice and tender.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is the best option to get fast biriyanis which is tasty and spicy. Not that expensive and taste also good. But If you are gonna Compare with kerala thalassery biriyanis , this is not a choice for you!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Love the biryanis u serve its simply super.enjoyed the food overall and service was outstanding ............would recommend my friends too....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The quantity they serve is very limited. But they don't compromise on the taste of biryanis. It was fresh and tasty. Their service is extremely quick too.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
After seeing the new sign quite a few times of the outlet of Ammi's Biryani at Koramangala, I decided to try it. I ordered for a few dishes through home delivery; chicken keema, achari aloo and 4 parathas. Parathas are 25/- each.. a bit costly I feel. They are white colored, layered ones which turn very chewy if kept out for few mins. The achari aloo was for 60/-. Taste was fine. Around 5-6 pieces of wedge shaped potato pieces, with achaar tasting masala. The chicken keema was for 115/-. But came in a small dabba and was salty and had strong garlic flavor.

My expectations were a bit high when I chose this place for ordering food. Sorry to say..but I was disappointed. Maybe their biryanis are good(just going as per the name) but otherwise..can be skipped for lack of taste and of course uneconomical pricing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered chicken Biryani combo today.

It was not fresh. I guess it was yesterday biryani which they delivered it.

Rice was crispy like kurkure. Chicken pieces was so tight and stinking.

I had to threw all my order.

Never had this kind of order in my life.  Never order from them guys. They will spoil your mood.  Don't trust them.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Once a good place for Biriyani but that's all once upon a time. The Binge biriyani lost it's touch and the kebabs are even worse than the biriyanis. My advice to Ammis is stop focusing on increasing the branches in the places where lazy IT employees wants some crap food delivered in just a call and start focusing on having at least one good restaurant in the city.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Located right next to Aalishan, you are always left in a dilemma on which one to visit for your biryani cravings although I feel both have almost similar tastes, ambience or hospitability so you cannot go much wrong with either.
I found the eating place to be a bit too small and cranked up though.

Update:
Ordered some food from this restaurant for the past few weeks and the response was very swift and fast.
They also gave me coupons of 20% off on the next order home. The murg ghost biryani @Rs.225 is quite delicious and has been a must whenever I order from this outlet.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Earlier also I never liked their Biryani. They have introduced recently Keema Pao and sulemani Tea. Quite interesting in the city. Had today. 1st disappointment its chicken keema not mutton which is absolutely no no  among meat lovers. The preparation was horrible tasteless and also the meet was not proper keema. I paid Rs.130/- for the same and Aam Panna which not good again. Not worth going to Ammi's Biryani for any reason.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
After a long time of anticipation, me and my friend finally decided to give this place a shot. Had heard about it's biryani from many friends.
The taste of the biryani was good. But, I felt that t he quantity was too less compared to other places famous for biryanis. The money you pay, and the quantity of the food you get is somehow not satisfying.
The good part is that along with the biryani, there always comes curry and raita, but, these people give a sweet dish too, that is, phirni or Kheer. Dessert is always a must after a happy meal.
All over, a decent place with good taste of food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Tried Biryani here. I would say / nothing special. Can feel only the taste of Cinnamon . May be they put extra Cinnamon powder.. / or may be masala not cooked well. 

 I have tried biryani in many places and Bangalore is now known for biryani. You can get biryani each n every street. If I compare Ammis biryani with other / i would say not one of the best.. that includes price as well. 

Less quantity / Biryani rice is dry . Lets hope they work on this soon. 

I gave second chance and went to marthinagar outlet (madiwala). Same taste . Will think many times before i go to Ammis.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammis started first in Koramangala and which is opposite to Sai Baba Temple.
I remember it was in 2008.. This is near to my previous work place as well.
After noticing so many adds and publicity decided to visit once and went on the same day during the time of dinner.
There was a decent crowd in that outlet and menu is quite decent with Veg and Non Veg Biryanis.
Especially in Veg, they have only Subz Biryani and served with Raitha, Kheer, Gravy, Spoons and Tissue Paper in Beautiful Box.
Honestly being a Spicy food lover i did not liked the masala they use to use. I guess Ammis is the only restaurant to use BRINJAL in Biryani.
Going here is good if you dont have option and the best part is, they have modified the menu by adding lot of starters like Achari Aloo and other dishes too.
Service is really quick and price is affordable with their special offers everyday.
Overall:
Quality: 3.5/5
Taste: 3/5
Ambiance: 3/5
VFM: 3/5


bangaloreepicure.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Got a home delivery from Ammi's biryani and it was pretty easy to order the food through the call center.
They usually have schemes going on and it turns out to be quite reasonable. Their food was packed hygienically and was delivered hot. The portion size was also very good but the biryani was just not good enough. I can only speak about the veg biryani but it didn't stimulate the palate that much. It lacked salt and had excessively spicy.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very good home delivery but off late they never seem to have a lot of biryani's in stock. Its understandable on weekdays but its ridiculous if most of the items are out of stock on a Sunday afternoon.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Terrible Terrible Terrible!! 
Wouldn't advice dine-in at all.. The utensils were not clean and the food is not worth it.. I ordered the combo i couldnt even swallow a bite of the starter , the biryani was ok.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I don't know what I would do without them. Best biryani on the planet. The only problem I have is that some of the salan/salad may be leaking by the time the box reaches you. Please ask your delivery boys to drive carefully :D
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Hmmmm. Where do I start.

Saw the advt. for the executive pack started by them yesterday. Thought to order a takeaway.

The experience for online was not that great so I called the CALL CENTRE. The wait was long but did manage to place an order. To add to it the Bengaluru rains delayed the delivery. However once arrived the wait did not seem worth.

The Hyderabadi Biryani ordered did not come near the taste of authentic Biryani. You can skip this. Especially after it affected my digestion.... :(
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's is become so boring. nothing new to try. quantity is so less. most of the times rice will be dry by the time we get the food. ( cooked well, but due to multiple heating and  again freezing , reheating makes the rice dry and so hard to eat. tate so artificial these days.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have heard a lots of hype about them from colleagues & friends but did not find it that good. Actually this place is only for good Biriyani nothing else which was really good, well balanced, meat was really tender, balanced spices distributed equally every where. Will give them 10 on 10 for Biriyani.

Other than Biriyani we had chicken kebabs(boneless), which was quite usual. There was nothing special about it. The service was damn slow. I noticed waiters serving your food to someone else. 7 up came to us after we completed with food and extra raita never came up.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Very small dining area. Not even close to expectations. Biryani has very poor taste and the dips/rithas are bad too.
Seekh kabab lacks spice and its authentic flavour.
Only positive point is that the chicken is tender, well-cooked with masala infused thoroughly.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I always take home delivery.. never went to their restaurant.. The home delivery doesnt take much time.. Packaging is very good and provide you with napkin, spoon and even a toothpick.. I like their Chicken Harimirch Biryani a lot.. It has a unique flavour..other than that the hyderabadi variety is also good. Its an average place to have Biryani.. could have been better..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
They added a new item on their menu last year : boneless chicken biryani. Would have been a nice concept if actually executed. Sadly it remained only on the menu and never reached kitchen or the customers. I have personally tried ordering the same several times, but I am told that it's not available today.

Taste wise, the hyderabadi chicken biryani seems be the best. Rest are average. The service, especially for take away is super quick.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Writing this review solely based on my one time experience for a home delivery by Ammi's Biryani.

I called them for home delivery to Wilson Garden on a Saturday afternoon to place an order for Egg Biryani. Customer executive asked me if I preferred veg rice or chicken rice for the biryani which was really nice. The order was delivered to me within 30 minutes. The biryani they served was decent enough in quantity and tasted pretty OK. Packaging is really good. It also had a small bowl of sweet.
If you are at home and lazy to get out of the house to eat but want to get something to your doorstep ASAP, then I would suggest you Ammi's Biryani.
Price is decent. Egg biryani costed me 153 Rs. I would not say it was worth the money but considering the fact that not many restaurants give an option of 150 Rs. minimum order for home delivery it was ok.
Service is great : 4/5
Taste : 2.5/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had the worst experience here. I would advice nobody to ever go there. I had ordered an Achari Aloo, it was a take away.
I had traveled for half an hour before opening the parcel and after opening the site was just gross and horrible.
There was a strand of hair in the food and additionally a cockroach which was still alive and moving.
YUCK!!!! It was so disgusting. And when I called the customer care people they were least bothered about it and were acting as though it was an everyday event for them. Later on the manager called me and apologized only after I told him that I would upload it online.
They were really taking everything so lightly that I was shocked. I was also told that they had pest control going on so may be due to that the insect had gotten in the food. The manager did come by to give me a full refund but that doesn't really solve anything or make it ok.
I would request everybody to avoid this place and to let everybody know about it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have told many times in my earlier reviews about my appetite towards chicken biriyani. I would prefer any kind or flavors as long as its chicken biriyani. But as many of us know, only few will touch your taste buds.

We were damn hungry when we were looking for a good hotel in koramangala and Google brought me here. We could not resist for so long. But that was not due to the taste there. It was one of the most horrible biriyani I had in my life. My wife ordered a different food and the condition was the not different. Honestly, I thought of giving 2.5 when I start writing this, but then when I kept writing, that horrible taste comes to my mind and am ending up with a 2. :-)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One day we wondering what to order for dinner. Then one of my friend told that lets try ammi's biryani. We ordered for home delivery. We called and ordered mutton biryani, chicken biryani and chicken Hyderabadi biryani.. Mutton biryani was wonderful and was properly made. Along with the biryani we got raita and kheer which was very tasty.. Its was a nice experience..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Tasty Briyani at a reasonable price.
The briyani pack with salan, raita & kheer were compact and take away friendly.
They always maintain the delivery time as promised on home deliveries.

Good to order when feeling lazy and want of a tasty briyani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Poor Service . I will recommend to avoid at all cost. Quality over the period of time has come down,
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The taste of Ammi's biryani is upto the mark. Good work guys. But not worth the price tag.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
we were really hungry when we landed up here n biryani being our all time favourites, we couldn wait to place our orders and dig in.
Unfortunately, this did not turn to reality.. well, far from reality.. firstly, they donot have a big spread menu and the portions of biryanis will just make u frown! the hyderabadi biryani is bland which comes as such a shock. the portions of raitas are bad too. lastly, the food is not at all value for money. its quite expensive considering the not so good taste and the tiny portions. so I'm quite sure I'm not revisiting.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: horrible service.. there were 20 people waiting and the only guy in service shows his hand and says 5 mins to just take the order.. very bad experience and a waste of time.. bad franchisee for ammi's
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
went to this place one day n got fedup by the taste of the biryani served here. went to take biryani as v had a get together party. The photos of the biryani displayed on d walls gave me an impression that it wud be yummy... n ordered 3 biryani's. l'm a big fan of hyderabad dum biryani. The moment i tasted d biryani, it was too bad. These people dont know how actually a Hyderabad dum biryani luks lyk n tastes!!! And they serve biryani in their name. Really shame on you guys.... No importance is given by servers over here.

The Dum Biryani served was worst, half boiled chicken, less tasty, no aroma, no flavour and totally a waste for money. They have around 15 branches in bangalore. I dont know how they run.

I request you to have biryani in some gud places lyk Hyderabad house, hyderabad biryani restaurant, meghna n many more. but plz dint visit ammi's biryani ever...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: It's a small place. Basically a small eastery with just a few tables,but they serve the Best Chicken kebabs. Combos with kababs various biryani and soft drinks. Its good that they even have home delivery done in a less price and also they are quick enough and they would be definitely still hot. There are various types of biryanis made of various types of rice. They are in koramangala near sweet chariot please do visit the place. Yummy, good quantity and faster service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Being a biryani lover i thought of giving Ammi's a try. I opted for home delivery as the dine in was not very impressive. I must say that they delivered the parcel real quick, and their packaging really made me think WOW!! for a moment. The biryani, pickle, salad, and kheer was very well packed so that they don't spill. But i was depressed when i opened the pack. The biryani was missing its aroma and flavors, even the chicken lacked flavors. For the price that they charge, i think the consumer deserves much more.
I don't think any food lover will try something just because of its packaging, it is the content that matters. As there are many more places offering much better biryani at lower rates.

I would rate this place as:
Ambiance: 2.5/5
Service: 3.5/5
Food: 2/5
Value for money: 2/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
With a tacky yellow interior and a pathetic theme song, I'm still at a loss as I'm not sure why on earth i went there. A friend and I who were familiar with the place and had moved away recently thought we'd give it a shot between our salon appointments. Not one of our pleasant foodie ventures.
Finesse- none
Flavour- falls short
price- nothing to blog about
amount- well that's the only thing one would come here for
The non vegetarian biryanis are stingy with meat and the one vegetarian one have the flavour profile of saw dust. They are all dry ant disappointing. Well the only thing one would learn from here would be "where not to go if you have a craving for biryani"..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Just average tasting biryani

POSITIVES-
+Nice delivery service
+Courteous waiters

NEGATIVES-
-Not very tasty biryani

The biryani they serve here is okay. Nothing special about it. Their Hyderabadi biryani is not really 'great'. You'd rather walk some 700 meters and have nice Hyderabadi biryani in Hyderabad house. Their Harimirch biryani is spicy, and worth a try. The one time I ordered mutton biryani, i got rubbery mutton meat. They serve a portion of complementary sweet dish with every plate of biryani. Many reviews of this place on Zomato state that they have really nice packing for delivery, which is true. They deliver in a cardboard box that holds 4 containers, one each for the biryani, saalan, raita and the sweet, and also has a fifth compartment for tissues and spoon. The chicken boneless kebab is pretty tasty.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I heard its lots of advertisement on FM radio and thought to try its biryani. Once while passing through kormangala, I stopped there and saw the menu. I decided to take Hyderabadi mutton Dum biryani as I asked for reccommendation which is highly saleable at the outlet. Packing was really impressive. They served hyderabadi mutton dum biryani with raita, salan and one small portion of kheer. Price is also very competitive. Texture wise biryani was awesome. It was really made on dum style of cooking. mutton pieces were three and succullent and flavourful. The only thing which could be better was the garnish of biryani with introduction of some brown onions and some flavouring agent like saffron/itra/kewra water. But overall it was good and immpressive in comparison to its price.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good food and good taste but in biriyani very less chicken quantity and in boneless kebab also ...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
What the hell... If you had ordered online from Ammi site and waiting for your biryani then ...
Ha ha ha . Just keep waiting no body will come .

I just ordered two egg biryani and website says thank you sir ... Your ordered is placed, But nothing was visible online .. So i just called to them for confirmation ... What response i got you know.. Sir we dont have egg biryani today.. Why They are having a website if they dont know how to serve through that. Spoiling online retailing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Since we stay in Koramangala, there is no dearth of decent biryani places nearby, especially Meghna which has become our default restaurant of choice whenever we want to try some good biryani. So when on one such occasion, Meghna was overflowing with people and a long waiting queue, we decided to give Ammi's a try.

I'd say the biryani is a disappointment, both in terms of quality and quantity. It's as good(or bad) as any random place you would order from, but not as cheap. The chicken pieces too are comparatively lesser and some were not even cooked properly.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered a home delivery of Biryani. Very quick service, arrived at home within 25 minutes! Good Biryani! Enjoyed the portions!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Located about 200mts from Forum in an area filled wits lots of eateries. The biryani as-such is average but i like the payasam (Meetha). The service is quick. So for a quick bite, worth a visit.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Quality & Quantity both not up to the mark. Very less option for starter and that also some dishes were not available! If you are a Biriyani lover like me, this place may disappoint you.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Real Hyderabadi Biriyani !!!! tasty and home made preparation . Yummyyyyyyyyyyyy
I would like to thanks AMMI............
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: There is no masala you can taste in the Biryani, it an absolute waste of money ordering Biryani. You sleaze on kebabs, you give 4 small bony pieces and rip us of INR 85. Never to order from Ammis.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Pros:
1> Very fast and good service.
2> Lovely packing (in case of home delivery).

Cons:
1> Not much to choose from.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered chicken and mutton biryani hydrebadi and it was simply yum..enjoyed both and t packing was awesome. Meal wud be complete if they had paan too :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered 3 different Biriyani's from their RT Nagar branch. IT WAS SIMPLY PATHETIC. I think AMMI would do good only boiling water. Advice: Stay Away
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst Biryani I ever had! I wish I could make them eat it. The only good thing was the packaging, full marks to that. The masala tasted weird and the potatoes were long and uncooked. Felt very bad after eating it. I had ordered Veg and my wife had the chicken one. Both were bad, surprised to find good reviews for Ammi here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have just ordered once from this place, the Biryani was awesome. What makes this different from others is the packaging of delivery... just try once.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I got addicted to Ammis Biriyani.
Well we all have our own taste and fondness towards a special style of Biriyani. Like I'm an Bengali,hence I simply love the long grain , saffron flavour light color biriyani with an egg , ALU and a chunk of mutton. All other style of Biriyani seems to be ok , good , fine until I tasted Ammis biriyani. Unique taste . Must recommend for home delivery as very nicely packed.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Famous place for hyderabadi Dum biryani. Ordered home delivery. It was prompt and good packing.
Tastewise the biriyani was balanced with two pieces each.
One for one person
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered biryani.The quantity was good but it's not so specie and dry items which I ordered it was awesome and very tasty I loved it. I hope so they add some more species.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We ordered for hyderabadi chicken biryani and guntur chicken. Tastes good. Guntur chicken is slightly spicy. For those who love spicy food, this is the best.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: You can also be used to be a good time to time and money to pay for the first time in the morning and evening of the most important thing is that the company is a good time to time and money to pay for the
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: It was my first time with Ammi's but food was very good. Awesome veg biriyani !! loved it..! Chettinad chicken ...i had asked to give boneless but gt jus 3 LARGE pieces.. Taste-wise i really loved it..AND packing was really sophisticated nd compact. Enough for light lunch :) Thnq
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Just ordered 5 executive biryanis.
Supposedly each biryani (130 bucks each) is just abt 340 gms for light eaters. That's light???ðŸ˜ðŸ˜‹.

Ammi's biryani always has good packaging of food.
Coming to the taste: Biryani was quite nice, lightly spiced and had 2 medium pieces of chicken accompanied with spiced raitha.

A good light meal indeed.

The portion of food was indeed satisfying.

noorinfoodistan.wordpress.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Always been my first choice for a quick dinner plan. The combo of biriyani with a veggie starter and nimbu has always served my craving. That too at affordable prices. Quite the catch.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This was the first place where i took biryani in Bangalore just went by the name of restaurant. But the biryani is not at all taste like biryani. Instead looks and taste like chicken puliogare rice without tamarind :( :( not liked.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Generally when I am having a house party I call for food from these guys ...Good biryanis...the quantity is really good ...the service is quick ...reasonable pricing ...definitely worth a try
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Quantity: more oil, less rice.
Quality: had not such disgusting biriyani ever before.
Delivery: good, in time.
But what is the point of having bad food in time?
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: First time home delivery. Got the delivery within 60 minutes and it was good quality. It was Ramzan Special that day and we ordered Combo for 3 for 800. Good value for money. However, I did not like the Aamras. I expected it to be Mango juice but ir was type of raw mango. Haleem was good, not sure coz it was my first time. Second time overall from Ammis. Good packaging. Decent experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: My 1st experience at Ammi's in Bangalore, started from this outlet in the year 2012. I love their rice quality and packaging. Request you people not to use such a big Plastic Bag for home delivery because plastic is harmful for the environment. Love the Murgh Hyderabadi and Guntur Kabab. Overall a good place to dine in.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered Biryani online and got the delivery almost within 30 minutes. Food comes hot with good packaging. But the quality( with respect to taste and rice used for biryani) was really bad. it almost like they made biryani with normal rice and there was no "salan" in the pack also. Only sweet was above average.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Reheated frozen biriyani's, No prorper hospitality, No proper service, very bad cleanliness, Heights is when your having your food their delivery boys will be chatting in the next table.  Even their website will allow to send feedback's. The Order No is 58454, Bill No: 138636
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: If you want to have biryani with no compromise in quality and quantity in pocket friendly price, I think this is the place. The food delivery system is also good and quick. I give it a 4.5. :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very close to my home and very good service. They might be a bit slow, but the quality is superb. But they give very less quantity of raita with the Biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: There is nothing to complain about their food. First time home delivery within 30 minutes and it was excellent quality. I feel it's slightly better quality than more polished and higher costing outlets around this.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's biriyani is no longer ammi's.
This store is exactly 100 metres from where I stay but I have ordered not more than twice since the time it opened. Why??? Cos they warm the biriyani is what I felt both the times. It is never fresh!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's Biryani has been a lifesaver on more than one occasion. The home delivery is reliable, quick and food comes hot. Biryani is quite decent.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have ordered from this outlet a few times. The order is taken by a central team and not by a specific outlet. I always mention that I don't need the sweet, it can be substituted by raitha or Salan, last 3 times they have kept the sweet and given extra raitha. one time they gave extra sweet instead of raitha and I had to eat with curds at home.
The quality is not consistent. Sometimes its good, sometimes it is spicy and gives a stomach ache and sometimes it is bland. The Achari Aloo and Tawa vegetable are very oily and spicy and limited options for vegetarians. 
Its nice that they have introduced Executive Biryani to avoid food wastage.
Specific instructions - Don't want sweet, carry change for 1000/-, Call before starting to confirm order etc. is not maintained.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hyderabadi biriyani tastes awesome !! Highly recommended...from my side!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good restuarant..good quality food with readonable pricing
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Heard a lot of about Ammis Biriyani. So went to try. I took chicken executive Biriyani and Matka Phirni. Quantity was very less and made of normal rice at Rs.99. It may sound stupid that at Rs.99 what extra. For those please try chicken biriyani at Durbar restaurant in ashwathnagar they make with basmati rice at Rs. 100. Coming to the Phirni, the taste was so so. Will not recommend this restaurant to anyone.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Never order food from this restaurant, they call it biryani when its just rice with garam masala and a huge piece of chicken. LOL
they dont even know what a biryani is called. The other day i ordered Pindi Cholle biryani, wanted to try veg. I had 2 spoons, thats all, the cholle wasnt even chew-able, had to dump it in the dust-bin, i can get a better veg fried rice with chicken for 90 bucks in street. The cholle were so hard as if they didnt even cook it, the quantity is worst and they charge shitload of money for nothing. And they have this sweet dish , which tastes so weird i felt like puking. Only good thing is the packing. LOL.

Screw this..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is the worst place to have biryani. Please dont waste your money , better eat idli from sagar.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I've always been a lover of ammi's biryani...however today's was a pathetic experience....I ordered mutton hyderabadi biryani which was delivered wellahead of the committed time (45min)...the quality of the biryani was so poor and hardly 2 small mutton pieces.....I was very dissapointed.....
Request Ammi's to maintain the quality else I'm afraid they'll lose customers...
Very dissatisfied. ...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Take away iS good. Really attractive packing style. Tasty food too. :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This Biryani Sucks, In Home Delivery they serve very less amount of biryani, Home Delivery takes Ages to Deliver......
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered Mutton Combo yesterday (25.05.13) ... In that they offered me a pack of Mutton Biriyani, 2 Kababs and 500 ML pepsi which costed me Rs 266 inclusive of taxes.

First of all the packing was excellent. But I don't think they have to pack like what a Pizza outlets are doing.

Let me come to the taste.. Kabab tasted good. But the Biriyani was pathetic. Generally I used have only Mutton Biriyani, but this one was the worst ever biriyani I had in my lifetime.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Even though only few veg items are available , the dum biriyani here is excellent.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Pathetic Home-Delivery Service!!!!!!!!! Stay away !!!!!!!!! On a wednesday night, they didn't deliver in 1.5 hours on New BEL Rd... After calling them twice and after promising me to deliver it in 10 mins, I lost it and cancelled it. They had the audacity to call back and say the guy had an accident (LIE) ... this they couldn't tell us after they said the food was dispatched an hour ago (sms received).

Will not order from here ever!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had heard so much about Ammi's biryani. Had to try it some day! And I did couple of days back. Got it home delivered.
The biryani was so-so. I always like a spicy biryani. This was really bland.
Chicken pieces in biryani were small .. Price of the biryani was not reasonable either.
I wouldnt say it was inedible, but they were certainly not great on my taste buds.
I loved the sheer khurma which was served in a small bowl. And, yeah the packing was great! :P
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: dabba place.. bad tasting biryani... they have only hyderbadi and kabab almost all the time.. then why give a menu at all... super concept.. need to work on the food taste and options.. heavy on the pocket too
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pocket friendly place...thy tak long time to provide the ordered food....biryani was good....kababs are tasty here....service was just ok ok....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This place is an ultimate destination to order food!!! Pocket friendly good service proper packing and the evening is set!!! When you have guests coming over or feeling lazy to cook order food from this place!!! The biriyani is good... However I personally do not like anything else from their menu but the biriyani the Andhra and the Tikka Biriyani is just great!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The quantity has reduced drastically. My wife ordered 2x regular hyderabadi biryani for home delivery tonight. The quantity has been getting reduced to such extent that we were hungry even after having 1 full plate of biryani. This is bad since the money charged was Rs.339 and qty was poor. Very unhappy.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have order family pack mutton Biryani for 750. when we opened the pack we got doubt they have packed left over Biryani as complete rice was smashed when we started eating the doubt got confirmed we did not put the bhurta given with biryani but Biryani had bhurta taste . The unsmashed rice was very little  and rest most  of the rice was smashed and with lots & lots of masala we four in our family where not able to have even quarter of our family pack order . It was Sunday night and almost 10:30 we did not cook as it was 1jan2017 we wanted to have something outside so again have to go out and get the dinner from small road side restaurant as Ammis biryani was so bad this time road side biryani of Rs.160 for 3 pack was far far better then Ammis mutton biryani of 750....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Shockingly small pieces of chicken and matching packaging in tiny boxes. I feel like I've been thugged and it looks like as if they haven't paid the delivery guy for the mobile coz he was giving missed calls for twenty minutes standing outside my house. And I have attached the pic of the SUPER SMALL servings with the bill so that you guys don't get robbed. Please order elsewhere. You get four tiny pieces of check for 210 bucks. That's 50 bucks a piece and all four pieces will ultimately fit in your palm. That's including the bones, yes.
The food is packaged in what seems to be a box smaller than my palm. The pieces taste ok. I've been legally robbed. Save yourselves.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Oh my god save me...
The small god forsaken place I stumbled by chance and ordered shaadi ki biryani.Took ages to come and guess..definitely not the wait.A great disappointment.Always empty with limited customers...
Meal for 2 costs Rs 350/- and not worth it
Limited parking available
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: It used to be my first choice for briyani. now, quality has become very bad, they have cut the contents. Don't order for home delivery, they supply bad quality.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Placed an order for a Hyderabadi mutton biryani and Andhra style spicy chicken biryani. But both the biryanis smelt weird and tasted really bad eventually figured out that they was stale and were just reheated and delivered. Ammi's Biryanis quality and standard is deteriorating and is no longer worth giving a try.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have tried all their biryanis n desserts.
This time wanted to try something new from the menu.

1. Chicken chettinad:
The price was reasonable, 85 bucks.
But I guess now I know why - 2 of the 3 chicken pieces were something that u won't consider buying or eating! All bones n parts of neckðŸ˜’!
It was a semi gravy n overpowered with garam masala! I know chettinad cuisine is spicy but this was way over!! So spicy that u can't finish it without gulping down some water or soft drink frequently.
It was still edible n it would go well with nice hot dosas.

2. Aam sharbat (Aam panna):
This came in a nice bottle. This drink is made of raw mango with some spices.

U expect a nice soury or tangy flavor from this juice. Sadly, there was no hint of such flavor. It was sweet, watery n tasted like a light tonic. Had heard so much abt this, but it turned out bad. Was it my bad luck or is this the quality of the drink, only AB will know!

noorinfoodistan.wordpress.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: one of the pathetic place to taste food. I ordered online twice to taste mutton biryani , guntur chicken, chicken biryani, veg noodles. the quality is below average. the biryani is looking  like rice fried in ghee : the quantity also was very less..( . total waste of money for me. guntur chicken somehow is ok. all the good online food vendors should release it from their list.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have been trying out this place since the last one year (once a month basis) and their best is Mutton Biryani. WOW!!!The staff is courteous, friendly so is their store Manager named "Piyush" being a great guide in helping me choose an item (when I am too bored to select). I have never tried their 'home delivery' so not going to comment on that. But overall the food is great. My family enjoys this place when they come to meet me once in 6 months and the Mutton Biryani FAMILY PACK is awesome. Great quantity too.Good Place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had ordered chicken biryani and i felt the quantity is good. I feel they need to come up with more items in the menu. Nothing much to mention about ambiance as it was below average. Service was satisfactory
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had ordered two items... hyderabadi chicken biryani and hyderabadi mutton biryani... the delivery was done within 30 mins... chicken biryani was better than mutton biryani... the quantity was enough for one person and quality was better than average not very good but satisfactory...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biriyanis are decent. That's it, don't try anything else. Almost all the starters and side dishes are really bad. But one thing I really like about this place is they pack the food really well. So when we are travelling we almost every time order an executive chicken biriyani from there.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The one and only time I tried this place, the food was so bad that I've never tried Ammi's ever again. 
We ordered the Chicken Biryani and a Chicken starter. I don't remember the name, but it was a distinctive green color, and inedible. 
Now being a hard core non vegetarian, I'd never thought it was possible to mess up chicken, but they did it.
Never again!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Decent place...calm..not so crowded..
Very hygienic...
Gud decent biryani...but nothing really great or wow about the food...
Quantity wise-decent
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Visited yesterday for dinner. Had Hyderabadi mutton biryani. It was a gud biryani and quantity is gud . however taste wise nothing great or wow to feel. Its ok for the amount u pay.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hi, today I ordered the Hyderabadi Gosht Biryani from Ammis Briyani, Thakur Village, Kandivali E, Mumbai ... Can you believe how many pieces of Mutton was in it ?? only ONE small piece... horrible .... Never will I ever go to Ammi's....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Small place, smaller than its other outlet. nothing too fancy. Best Biryani in R. T. Nagar. Can't say that about the Kababs. Delivery is always on time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have been to almost all the outlets in town! They serve one of the best biryani's in Bangalore! The starters are bad! I would go back there just for the biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Spoil Chatni with Biryani.I will never buy nor recommend anyone to buy from them. Not worth spending upto 1000 rupees for a single order. They should have taken care. I had ordered for a friend as gift for Ramadan Iftaar and found myself in embarrassing situation!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Biryani as the Restaurant's name says ,should be the Best as it's what they think they specialise in. So had been there quite a few times.
Once i ordered a Biryani and a Pepsi.
So they gave me Biryani and the Pepsi bottle.
I asked for a Cup and they gave me a dirty cup.
I didn't like their service.
Dine-in is totally not meant for this Restaurant coz they don't know what an actual Dine-in means.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: super fast delivery service and yummy biryani! My favorite is the Hyd Chicken biryani. the rice is cooked perfectly, spiced enough and good piece sizes. My daughter too loves the taste and makes for a perfect saturday dinner!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Super quick delivery .... Awesome Biryani and complete value for money !!!!! Rolls are a great addon to the existing menu .... Their kabab plates are so apt for a person and aptly priced.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The delivery is as promised and the taste is awesome.the only hitch for not giving full rating is that the quantity should be increased.Anyway enjoyed it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
It taste awesome, service is excellent. They Deliver on time, actually before time, really good on ramzan times...
The service is quick. Always new food items. Fresh and healthy.....always price is also good not too expensive
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pretty decent biryani. Quick service. Okayish value for money. A frequently visited biryani place. Amazing dessert recently added to the menu-Matka Phirni. They many a times run out of stuffs from the menu which is a major disappointment.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not that great.. Had been here with friends and had asked for family pack biriyani which they show in pictures and ad. They told they don't have it there and its only in pictures.. They bought steamed rice and steamed chicken stuffed in rice. That's biriyani after all.. Disappointed.. Not up to mark as they advertise..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
really bad food.. i absolutely hate this place ...dont like the service the place or the food...

very bad service and least bothered guys..i woudnt go here again .. im wouldnt recommend this to anybody else
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Not the best place to have biryani.
Great offer will alway attract u towards the store.
130 rupees min for one person.
Quality wish it is good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic for a Biryani Lover and absolutely no value for money, it's just relies on the branding and photography skills as a franchise... The package is only good thing here. I ordered the Mutton Shaadi Biryani and they have pieces which is definitely stale and could not eat. The worst ever Biryani provider in Bangalore

The glasses that were plastic stank. The pepsi we ordered with our meal came after a long time after much reminding.
Coming to the biryani (which no ammi will be proud of). Dry, under-cooked rice, some monstrous gravy passing off as salan and the very watery raita. Also had ordered a starter that was half decent( Guntur murg something). All in all a bad experience. Yet to find a place in Bangalore that will do justice to the " Hyderabadi Dum biryani" I have grown up eating in hYderabad. Welcome suggestions for such eateries in Blr.

Comment:
Ammi's Biriyani is an attempt to become a mass player, in the mould of a Pizza Hut or McDonald's, in the ever burgeoning Biriyani scene of Bangalore.

This outlet is fairly big, neat and with functional interiors that leave you with no doubt that this is a fast-food restaurant chain. The counter, with a large menu displayed behind it, is staffed by a friendly bunch of people, who patiently answered my barrage of questions regarding various items in the menu.

My order being a take-away for one, I decided to keep it simple and hence, ordered a Hyderabadi Chicken Biriyani, although the staff tried to goad me into shelling out "just Rs.20 more" (in their words) for a Combo that would've included 2 pieces of Guntur Chicken Kabab as well.

The biriyani came packed in a plastic container along with plastic cups of Raita, Salan and a Meetha. All of these, along with a spoon, a discard box etc, come neatly packed in, literally, a pizza box.

The biriyani, despite it's name, was as un-Hyderabadi as it could get. It wasn't exactly one of those bland ones that we come across in many places but it didn't have that zing of a true Hyderabadi biriyani either. The accompaniments aren't much to speak of either.

Service :- Quick. Home delivery, if required, is for a minimum order of Rs 150.

VFM :- Not great, for the quality, taste etc that one gets.

Verdict :- Recommended ONLY for a one-time try or for lack of better choices. The attempt to be a mass-player, rather than a quality provider, has clearly seeped into their fare.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
One more addition at sahakarnagar  list of restaurants , the food is good but not great . since they have combos starting at 150/- for nonveg... its good for single person.

the place is clean and well maintained , mutton biryani at ammis is definately not the same as what it was initially, 

they also have home delivery , service is quick & good.

meal for two 500/-

quality 3/5
service 4/5
cleanliness 5/5

Comment:
This review of Ammi's Biriyani is based on the experience of their Snack Box which was launched a couple of months back. One of the things we all face is the snack time hunger, and a lack of options to order in, or pick up from. Ammi's Snack delivery is an initiative to address this. We got an assorted set of veg and non veg items including their achari aloo roll, chicken keema roll and ammi's special roll along with veg and chicken keema pav. They came in neat packaging like tiffin boxes.

The keema pavs were really good and filling. While the chicken keema was not too spicy, the veg was actually better in this. The achari aloo roll and ammi's special were also pretty different, and quite filling to consume. With chicken roll there are a lot of options, so nothing noteworthy there.

It's a pretty good option to order in at work or even home. Liked their presentation and quantity.

Verdict: STAY away if you really want to eat Biryani...

Not spicy but just right for us.

Comment:
Tried the Gosht Hyderabadi Biriyani as takeaway.
First thing I noticed was the packaging . It looked like a pizza box , very neat stuff.
On opening , I was surprised seeing each item neatly packed and labeled , with the biriyani , raita , mirchi ka salan and rice kheer for dessert.
There was even an empty container for the bones, and a package with a tissue,spoon and toothpick .
The hot and spicy biriyani was very yummy , and the mirchi salan and raita just added to the flavor. The kheer was just ok, but rounded up the meal nicely.The quantity was also pretty substantial . Overall , we enjoyed our meal and looking forward to trying the other items on the menu .
For review with pictures visit :
drool-eat-blog.blogspot.com

drool-eat-blog.blogspot.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had never tried the food at this biryani chain before and was presently surprised. They make such great biryani! We had Mutton Keema and regular mutton biryani(Hyderabadi) along with chicken kabab for sides. The Biryani was consistently spicy and flavored just what you would expect from the Hyderabadi Dum variety. The chicken kabab was boneless mini chicken pieces in semi dry mint/pepper masala and perfectly compliments the biryani if you look for a spicier meal. I would compare the quality here to any other good biryani in town(Richie's, Meghana's, Lazeez etc.) and they certainly combine it with good overall packaging and friendly service in dine in. Highly recommended.

Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A very typical ammis biryani... no thrills... u get what u ordered for. But definitely not sumthn il consider for a hungover Saturday afternoon.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I usually order home delivery from this place, and never ever they disappointed us. Amazing Biryani, especially the Veg option is also good, as my dad(vegetarian) is fan of their's Biryani.
Nicely packed and amazing flavours. High on recommendation for Biryani lovers.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: You could never find all the food options available in this particular outlet. The staff here is always clueless and the biryani is not good. I've tried Ammi's biryani before but I don't know why i always feel that this outlet gives away the worst load. I would suggest that you rather go to Hyderabadi Biryani which on the opposite side of the road.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: taste and condition of the biryani was very bad. When delivered biryani was totally not hot. And taste was also not that much good. Achaari aloo was good in taste but not hot. overall not recommend.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered a Thalassery Biriyani last day. Actually this is not how the famous Thalassery Biriyani tastes like, But to be very frank it was really delicious. The outlet is a small one with 3 tables but looks okay. Quick service and the packing was also good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I think the main reason Ammi's Biryani survive is because there are no other major biryani restaurants who do such wider home delivery across bangalore like they do and have so many outlets. Unfortunately with all required infrastructure in place , their quality of food leaves a lot to be desired.

When they had launched the Thalassery Biryani , I ordered it once and it was really good. I was impressed so much that I ordered it again and then it turned out to be horrible. Ghee, Masala all were uneven and it even seemed not freshly made the same day. After that terrible experience, I have not tried Ammi's biryani again.

Great idea for a biryani delivery franchise but poor execution !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Horrible service. Left me with no dinner tonite. Said they would take 2 hrs to deliver only to tell me that they cannot deliver after almost 3 hrs of placing the order.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Tried a few times and pleasant experience as well. Their service and packing are outstanding. Food tastes ok but not offers a consistent taste :). Their Guntur Kebab is too good!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Tried veg biryani couple of times. Its just ok. Nothing GREAT. Aroma of rice in biryani seems to have lost. It was not much spicy(i like less spicy food).

For parcel: Their packing was good. For dine in, outlet is clumsy and because of wash basin inside sitting hall some insects and mosquitos were there. AC was running properly.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Mixed opinion about this place...ordered their biriyani a couple of times,and the taste is not similar most times... At times it has been lil bit on the oily and spicy side,at other time light and flavourful..not that i did not like it much,i did like it,but lil unsure how it would be the next time. Although quantity wise it's fine and yes their packaging is also good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I don't know if the reviews written praising the quality are genuine or not (sorry, if I'm hurting any one, it's just an expression not to demean any one). For the first time in my life, I've seen a restaurant which delivers Chicken Biryani with Chutney that is supplied with breakfast! Ordered once and never looked back to order again. I would not eat their Biryani even if offered for free, literally. No spicy, no authentic taste of biryani, served with breakfast chutney, I would rate this zero.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered biriyani from Ammi's today for the first time. It was a good experience. We ordered veg and chicken biriyani, both were decent. Their delivery service and packing deserve a full score. Quantity could have been more.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: It was the First order. Experience was good, Food got delivered as expected without any delays. Food was very nice but i felt the quantity was very less.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had Chicken biriyani more than twice , but the taste was totally different every time . Content was ok but the gravy items doesn't suits well .


Ambiances - 2/5
Taste - 2/5
Services - 3/5
Value for money - 3/5
Parking - 2/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
In ammi's I like the service. Service is at its best. But the problem is non availability of the enough veg biryani, they have limited good and that too they bring it from the there kitchen which is located some where. Usually you have to visit the ammi's for early lunch or dinner or else you will not get the veg food.

Coming to the food, biryani is good and tastier. They operate in limited menu.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not that great not that bad okay.......
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
In the two times I have ordered from this place, I have always received excellent service. Though today is Diwali, the order still came in at one hour.
Their chicken biriyani is pretty good, the â‚¹199 plate is enough for two people. The kababs are as usual, standard.I am yet to try the continental dishes they have launched.
