On an overall I like their food both In terms of quality and quantity. Keep it up you guys.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Was really disappointed since Ammis have removed Harimirch Biriyani from their menu. This was the only dish i usually ordered frequently from them. Since this is removed, I would never order again from them.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have ordered biryani a couple of times from this place. The packaging is excellent I must say, they also give a mini disposable box for throwing of bones. The biryani is decent and comes at a decent price. Quantity is just right. There is a lot if scope for improvement in the delivery time though.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This outlet of Ammis is the worst In whole bangalore. Staffs are completely unprofessional and i never satisfied with the biryanis available there. Last time i got chicken biryani instead of mutton biryani as i paid for mutton. Unfortunately there is no response from these guys. And of course u will not get that aroma of biryani ovr here. Tasteless and the quality is like a cheap street side biryani. Yuck.. I got fried rotten chicken biryani instead of dum mutton biryani. Dont go for this outlet.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have made home delivery orders twice from this place and I have to say I had a really good experience with respect to their packaging - Everything packed neatly in separate sealed containers, a small use and throw cardboard trash can, a plastic sipper for the juice, etc.

The Executive Biriyani combos are compact and is a good option for a meal for 1 rather than going for a Biriyani as such. I tried the Murgh executive biriyani combo in which the Murgh chicken was extremely oily (Management, please look into this) and the biriyani was good, though not great. This combo comes along with lime juice which was up to standards.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i know these people are amazing with their foo. But i need to add this feedback about their service, after a very long tiring day a friend and me dropped to their shop and ordered for our food. We requested them that we haven't had a chance to eat anything since morning and if they can hurry. and the person said he would try his best and would get it in 10 mins, and you wont believe when he walked out with the food just after 5 mins !! thank u guys. we appreciate this gesture :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
one uselsess branch... utter waste... they deliverd me wrong order.. i ordered for two paneer kalimirch.. the manager called me and said he has only one in stock and he will send me one paneer kalimirch and one achari alooo.. but he has send me both achari alooo.. and almost for one and a half hours that idiot manager made me wait and first of all i dont even understand what he is speaking... he is one useless.. and ammis u guys are loosing ur quality and customer service.. this is the third time i am facing such issues with varthur branch.. hate it and am never gonna  order anymore with ammis and as far as i can am gonna only spread a negative word of mouth about u guys..  u guys have pushed a loyal customer to this extent...

thecrumbstashdeepa.blogspot.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had high hopes because I had heard from. Friends that the biryani that is been served there is really great. But unfortunately it wasn't as expected. Biryani was hot but the rice was not that soft. Guess they freeze the biryani and then heat it in oven and server. That might be the reason I did not like the texture of rice. However it was just a experience to have biryani there. Will try there once again just to try my luck.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had a terrible experiance got a piece of stone in biryani and when contacted they put my call on hold for 5 min
Don't order from here because hygiene is very questionable
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered from Ammi's when they were offering the Haleem during Ramzan week. Haleem was awesome! The Biriyani however, was just ok - have had much better stuff! I wanted the Hari-Mirch Biriyani, which they did not have. Ordered the Murg Zeera Samba instead, and a Hyderabadi chicken option. The accompaniments - especially the dessert (meant to be phirni I believe) was very very sweet - couldn't have it. The Salan was not nice either. 
Service wise - decent, delivered within 60 mins as promised.
So yeah - don't think I'm going to have Biriyani from Ammi's again, unless I am left with no choice. But Haleem - will definitely order it one last time, before they take it off their menu :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's Biryani you had be running to a doctor. The haleem I ordered this afternoon was promptly delivered, only it was rotten - proper rotten. Withing 15 minutes of the delivery and tasting the rotten stuff delivered, I did what any civilized person would do - call customer care and inform them. It took 3 hours for someone to call back and offer to send someone to collect the boxes of haleem from me so they 'could track the batch number'. Have not heard from them since. Since i saw no attempt to 'track the batch number', I would like to know how have you ensured no more of your rotten muck has been delivered to other people?
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Taste of all types of biryani,allo achari
and service was very good and it's worthy for money.
I and my room mates tried almost all tyPes of biryani
Only thing is delivery service is somewhat slow.
Will visit again and again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Very bad experience,I went to Ammis on 07.07.15 to take a parcel,I asked the server what u have special in Mutton,he said Mutton Hyderabadi..I asked him to make it dry as I thought its a gravy item,I asked him do you have paratha he said no,so I bought paratha from outside to have it with my mutton dish.
When I came back home and opened the parcel I found its a biriyani.
Trully not satisfied with the miscommunication.
I informed Mr.Manju(Manager-9731035976) regarding this,trully disappointed.
I often take home delivery but now I have to think twice.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I went to Ammis on Tuesday and asked the server that what special you have in Mutton,He replied Mutton Hyderabadi.
I told him to make it dry as I thought its a gravy item,while I opened the parcel I founf its a Biriyani,trully not satisfied with the miscommunication
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered Guntur Chicken , Chicken Haleem and Aam sharbat.
Nothing was upto the mark.
Chicken Haleem was the worst part. It was bland. Had to throw it away.
Aam sharbat looked like was prepared using some powdered packet and had no taste at all.
Very bad experience. Would suggest people to skip this chain of restaurants.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I live in Whitefield and like your mutton biryani that i ordered a couple of times. Delivery were always on time, and this is so important to me.  Looking forward to having more family and office getogethers, and with ammis supplementing my other home cooked foods.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammis biriyani for office lunch or team outing is an excellent choice. the food is great and delicately spiced which is great for foreigners as well! they love the biriyani every time we order. The orders are also very prompt.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We have ordered couple of times for home delivery. Delivery is quick and prompt. Only area of improvement is the Biryani quantity even if you just order Biryani they give you the order like a combo with sweet which is awful. The mirchi salan is oily and more like tomato paste. Pl start offering just Biryani and provide authentic mirchi ka salan.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hi Ammis.Really im very very disappointed day for yesterday. I order 2 to 3 people that is a IPL Offer mutton biryani.I was place the order at 6.07pm there are informed me that it will take another 45mins time to reache my gate but my order was reached at 7.45pm then i cancelled my order this is not fair outlet for home delivery i like show that red flag.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
OMG what can i say yummy, yummy, yummy, thanks to Ammi s Biryani for making me recollect my memories of the Biryani i used to have in Hyderabad. i have tasted each and every biryani corner in Bangalore trying to get that taste of original Hyderabadi Biryani,
finally got the original,
this Place was insisted by a friend of mine, i m a vegetarian and i ordered a veg Biryani, the quality of rice and the taste was impeccable.
Please try this place once, i m sure you will enjoy the treat.
one more thing i would like to add is the Ambience at Ammi's Biryani is very neat and clean, not over crowded, all in all a good place to hang out.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hey Guys, Just now got Ammis Sabzi Biryani and Achari Aloo as a takeaway order. Guess what! It's stale. Both biryani and the side dish... Really disappointed!!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered from this place during my stay at Whitefield. The Biryani was a liâ€™l spicy for my taste but I loved the mutton biryani for its flavours and the perfectly cooked mutton. I am not a mutton fan bt I could eat this biryani. If you are having some biryani craving, this place is certainly not going to disappoint you, at all.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
One word ! " Chaos "
Too spicy and everything is filled with elaichi ! I rarely order from here ... And when I do ... I regret after having the food ! I suggest foodies to explore other options and please keep Ammi's as a last resort .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Well if you are looking for a place to fill your biryani craving or you are just starving for a meal that won't disappoint you, then this a right place. Biryani here is good but you shouldn't expect too much. This place has its unique style and taste so don't look at it for replacement to any other biryani place. New takeaway packing is very good and thoughtful. And they have lot of other things to offer apart from just biryani. Toh Kuch Accha Khao!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Just d right place for just the right biryani ....want a delivery n ull get it in a good packing box with all the needs ....never have eaten at their place but the chicken biryani is just as simple as u want it ....nothing extra special but the normal n tasty fashion
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Excellent biryani .. Just go for it..
Recently me and my friend ordered biryani from Ammi's it was very good in taste never had such tasty biryani in Bangalore..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
this could be so much better. Underwhelming taste, mediocre ambiance, they need to get their game up if they want to stay relevant with the competition around. Biryani zone is only a mile away if u are very particular about taste.

instagram.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: To me, the Biriyani here is not as good as elsewhere. But the packing and delivery are good. The sides, as they call it - aloo masala and a few chicken dishes are ok (low quantity , low priced). I would choose this only if I have to take away something quickly. No other Biriyani restaurants do the packing so well. Packing - 4.5 Rest - 2.5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not a fan of Biryani, but since I had no option I thought to try the Chicken Executive Biryani + Guntur Kebab combo at Ammi's Biryani. Overall pretty decent biryani with one piece of succulent chicken. The two guntur kebab servings were also mildly spiced. The raita portion could have been more. Overall decent food experience at 130 rs.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good Biryani to take away! Reasonably priced
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Coming from Kerala, I hopped in for a quick spicy hyderabadi biriyani. The service was prompt. Served me in 2.5 minutes. However the food was way below average.
Firstly the rice was bland, the chicken was lifeless and for something that was named 'hyderabadi', it did not have any authenticity. The salad was mere water and yoghurt.
Overall, one of the worst biriyanis I have ever encountered.
And to make things worse, there were a lot of insects on the floor. So thumbs down on the hygiene part too.
Avoid the place, unless desperate. Cheers!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The taste is very good. It's better to order than to go for dining because the space for dining is small. I had mutton Shadi biriyani... taste is good but pieces are less and that too they are bones!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Though biriyani is not one of the dishes I look forward to, I still ordered for a home delivery for a chicken biriyani and kebab from Ammiâ€™s. They are prompt in taking the order and the delivery was also well in time. The packing was nicely done. You get raita, salan and a sweet along with the biriyani. The biriyani tasted good but the sweet was very average. The kebabs were too spicy and oily. You will get the taste of mostly the black peppers and nutmeg. Itâ€™s taste was just average. Can be tried once if you are a biriyani lover.

ipsitafoodjournal.blogspot.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Needs to buck up.

This place used to be good an year back.
But now it is not the best place to order from.
The chicken biryani's rice was not well cooked and had excessive masala in one portion rendering that portion inedible.
The chicken was not great either as it was partially uncooked.

I would definitely think again before ordering from here, hereafter.

Food-2.5
Service-3.5
Overall-3
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biriyani has became one of my favorite food place for biriyani. The Biriyani taste great in a reasonable price. I am ordering once in every two weeks from here.

The mutton biryani was one of the best I had in Bangalore till date. Rice was rightly spiced and the meat just fell off the bones :) I didn't like the sweet though :(

The packaging was excellent. Raita quality can be improved. Overall, value for money :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi Biryani , it seems has lost all its charm and reputation of being one of the best Biryani options in Bangalore over the period of time.

Though they have advanced technologically, but the quality of food has gone down drastically.
The essence of biryani seems to be nowhere found in its biryani.

My pick from its menu used to be Zeera Samba and Hyderabadi style Chicken and Muttion Biryani earlier.
But now when we ordered from here, it was a utter disappointment and a personal loss of face for me as I suggested it to my team mates.

The biryani rice lacked the chicken / mutton flavored juice and the portioning was not up to the mark.

I would never order nor recommend this biryani to any one in future.

My rating
Food 2/5
Service 3/5
Overall 2/5

thefoodietales.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good biriyani varieties must try this zebra and shaadi biriyani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very poor quality. I will never try again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not up to mark. Have been here multiple time. Everytime i just hoped that I ll have a better experience. I have been dissapointed all the time. Food quality is poor. Mutton biryani in particular didnt look fresh. Experience was disastrous.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i was a great fan.. but when i ordered last time it was a great surprise that they have changed the rice quality.....it was the worst biryani i ever had ...rice quality was a disaster
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered their Gosht Hyderabadi Biryani 3 plates, and the parcel was delivered an hour late, presumably the delivery guy got lost and was not able to locate our ofice. Strange as our office is in one of the primest office spaces in Whitefield.

Anyways the biryani was very tasty and so not rating them so low due to their pathetic delivery time lines.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's biryani was yet another stop in my quest to eat the best Chicken Biryani that Bangalore has to offer.

It was moderately surprising that I haven't ever noticed this chain of restaurants despite their decent presence across the city.

So, on a weekday for lunch I tried their chicken combo which had chicken biryani, mirch ka salan, onion raitha, chicken starters and a gravy (from as much as i can remember). Their chicken biryani was fairly good. It's definitely worth trying and value for money if you're looking to try a different option for your work lunch.

Will I try them again? Yes.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Have ordered recently from this place ..
Gosht Hyderabadi Biryani was average, & too less portion, Gosht biryani had 3 small pieces of mutton ( all bones, lessssss Gosht ). They served biryani with raita, salan and one small portion of kheer.
If you are a Biriyani lover like me, this place may disappoint you.

But must say the way d food was packed was awesome and loved it. Had made online order on their website and they called within 5mins confirming the order. Delivered in 15mins. Service was great.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Quite nice Biryanis, Ammi Biryani and the parcel that they provide is very nice for office lunches and if you want to order a couple of biryanis, the best part is that they provide a bit of sweet and that gets you a satisfactory ending.
The price also is quite decent for someone who wants to have biryani a couple of times in the week.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered a Gosht Hyderabadi Biriyani which came with 3 pcs of mutton, biriyani (basmati), raita, mirchi ka salan & meetha (kheer). The bill was Rs 201/- all inclusive.

The mutton biryani was one of the best I had in Bangalore till date. Rice was rightly spiced and the meat just fell off the bones. I didn't like the mirchi ka salan but that does not mean that you won't. I was expecting the salan to have some pepper which was missing and actually tasted a bit odd. Kheer was ok and raita quantity was pretty less.

The packaging was excellent. I am thinking about ordering the same as office lunch someday.

Final Verdict:

Taste: 9/10
Value for money: 8/10
Packaging (for home delivery/take away): 9/10
Delivery Speed: 10/10 (less than 40 mins to Kadugodi)

Suggestions:
1. Update your menu at zomato
2. Add some mouth freshner in your package
3. Increase raita quantity
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Awesome packaging and taste.. only issue was with the delivery executive who sounded rude and was not willing to come to my place to deliver it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Today my cook didn't come and I was very hungry. I and my flat mates didn't know how to cook, except for Maggi or boiling eggs. But that would not have been enough after a day of toiling hard at our workplace. So, we opened Zomato and like Mozart in disguise, this restaurant came up in the search results. We thought it was a little expensive for a usual weekday dinner, but when we ate it, we were really glad to have ordered from it. It had good supplements in terms of Raitha, Salan and Sweet, each things better than the rest. It was really a wonderful experience to have this Biryani place in delivery distance from our house. The delivery was prompt and we paid using our useless Sodexo meal coupons. So, all in all, it was a remarkably nice experience and I am going to sleep a happy and content man. Way to to Ammi's and way to go Zomato for bringing all of us together.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Great place to have wonderful biriyani. Specializes mostly in Hyderabadi Biriyani and provides great taste to all its dishes. The tender chicken in the biriyani is so juicy, soft and tasty. Wil make one to come here again.

Prices too are nominal here. This place is good for a quick lunch.. Well, there is waiting period to get served. The ambiance is not that great and it looks like a fast food joint. The place is small and crowded with usually very little leg room. You might need to wait quite some time to get a seat inside.

They even have take aways and home delivery. Sodexo meal passes are also accepted and this is very good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The Never-On-Time restaurant.
The food :
I always order their Veg Executive Biryani because it is just the right amount of food I eat and I love the way they cook it. The Biryani is always good.  The restaurant : Their delivery is always delayed. Now, I have developed the habit of ordering food from them 1.5-2 hours before my lunch time.They even sent me Egg Biryani once and told me that they'll replace it.They took 3 hours to replace it with a veg one.I was even advised to eat the egg biryani and told me it is as good as Veg. Seriously?I do not know what issues they have with the delivery system but a restaurant  of this repute and good food has lost a lot of customers at my work and home. Even when I pay extra for additional Raita, I seldom get it. And these issues keep on recurring.

The Biryani Monster in me will never stop ordering from this restaurant ever but things like these always upset me and make the experience not worth cherishing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: very unprofessional experience. they took around 3 hours to deliver my order and on top of that no one was picking up the call from the restaurant. not going to order from this restaurant ever again and would never suggest anyone.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: ordered food for my office colleagues last week - the service was quick. Chicken Hyderabadi had balanced Flavours and was not very spicy. Very conveniently packed. Like Pizza in a Biryani...Nice
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
After 2 years, I order from Ammis again. And guess what? The service still sucks. Problems I faced: 
1. Delay in delivery. Last time they delayed by 4 hours, this time 1.5 hours. Yay! Improvement
2. Guess what? The regular and the executive biriyani comes in the same box, 100rs extra for some air please. 
3. Customer care is of no use as they could not come up with a good solution. 

Waste of time | Waste of money 
Yay Ammis! Way to go!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I am not a biryani connoisseur like some who try every biryani outlet in the city - still for a biryani joint, I would say this is average kind of biryani. Both the chicken Hyderabadi biryani and Andhra biryani are ok. More on the dry side for me on delivery. It was better when picked up early evening parcel for eating enroute in car. There are friends who love the food here..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Was delivered cold tasteless Biryani. Chicken was not fresh. You need to improve your packaging to deliver warm food. Also delivery time is on the higher side. Very disappointed.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biryani quality was quite okay but did not actually like the package..raita as well ..it was just a plain watery curd and package looks cheap
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have tasted worst biryani in banglote.... There is no taste or spicy it's like vegetable rice ...pls guys do some changes

We order chicken biryani only .........
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have mainly ordered from this store. The packing material gives it a low quality feel. The taste of biryaanis has gone down. The chicken keema ordered last time was also not that good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's biryani is a ubiquitous brand in Bangalore but I hadn't been to one before tonight. We ordered a chicken tikka biryani and an achari aloo roll (for the lack of availability of other veg options). The biryani was good in quantity and the taste was really good. I think Ammi's is known more for take-away and rightly so as the ambiance is just average. But the food is really good and on the spicier side. If you like spicy biryani, Ammi's biryani is a good option.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have always been behind a good biriyani place . Meghna's food is highly favored . So , thought of trying Ammi's biriyani , as heard from few that its good .
So , ordered a hyderabadi Biriyani with achari aloo( was toooo achari :p) , curd ( complementary) .
The food was good  , tasteful .
Price is moderate - not too low and not too high .
Quantity is good.
Had a home delivery so cannot comment on the ambience and the atmosphere around the place .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered egg biryani and hattrick chicken biryani. Both were below average and quantity was very less. Delivery was very late. Waste of money.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered Hyderabadi chicken biryani, the delivery was on time. The taste was okay but the quantity was very less. Had to sleep with half stomach.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst Biryani ever I had, I was recommended by a Freind to try their Egg Biryani, Later I found Egg shell in Biryani and there was Ambiguity in the portion size, As a Customer I called up the call center and was Diverted to Customer Satisfaction (Dissatisfaction) ManagerðŸ˜…Mr Mani, this Gentleman calls me back after checking everything and promises me he will go to highest level to check this incident and will give me 25% discount on next order on order above 300INR, ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…I kept on laughing why somebody will F**k himself again after paying 300bucks, I understand people can mess up but there's no need to keep such promises which can make customers more Angry. Any ways lesson learned Never order Ammis Biryani even if after Armageddon it's the last outlet serving on Planet Earth.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I am glad that the foodies who have rated this place have done justice.
The taste is just about average.
The quality is just ok and is the quantity.
Overall a little over priced and not so clean ambience are huge call outs.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Please don't visit till u have no options around and ur craving to have biriyani is killing u .
Quality , Quantity , taste nothing will impres u . In a city where u have options like Paradise , Meghna , Mani , hyderabadi house i made a fool of myself by visiting here . Big No !!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Mostly order from here for delivery. They have 3 different types of briyanis. The briyanis are tasty and have the correct amount of spice for my taste. The portion is more than enough for one person. The packing is also pretty good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Based on review, I thought to give it a try as I do always!
But tough luck today in terms of my selection.
It was Chicken Hyderabadi Biryani, name matters a lot. While ordering itself, your mouth will fill with waters but here is the real story.
Packing was really good, I opened the pack, waooooo, flavoured Biryani rice, muahhhh.
But WTF with chicken. It was not at all from Biryani. They kept chicken pieces from some other menu, like chicken curry or something else. Here I lost my faith in #Ammi. Sorry for such review but you know Truth is the real pain.
No more experiment with youðŸ˜šðŸ˜™ðŸ˜‘Neha Verma
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I've always had great experience with all branches of Ammi's biryani I've ordered from. Their packing is just great. Delivery in time and very courteous staff. The same taste is maintained. Their aachari alu is the best. The caramelized onions on top of Biryani is perfect.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Been there for the first time today and it's going to be the last time. Ordered a Paneer Kalimirch half and they gave me Literally 3 pieces of paneer. The quality and quality were truly pathetic. Apart from this, the last thing you need to hear from the person serving you when you confront them about the quantity is a condescending statement by the guy serving you. "Do you know how much paneer costs these days ? "
Service was bad, quality and quantity was bad.
Hope they work on this.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered hyderabadi chicken Biryani in bulk for a party on 19th of July 2016. 5 out of 18 boxes had stale Biryani which could not be eaten. It was an embarrassing situation in front of my guests who left with a bad impression about Ammi's Biryani. When I Complained they refused to accept their mistake or reimburse the money. Will never order from here again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Really terrible food. I had ordered 2 biryanis. The mutton biryani looked like plain rice with three chewy pieces of mutton. There was so masala or gravy whatsoever. The overall taste was really bad.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered through foodpanda, they took 2 hours to deliver  the order , taste was okay, very less quantity ,
worst experience.packing is good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The Haleem was the worst I ever had in my life, seriously it shouldn't be called Haleem, it should be called 'pressure cooked wheat and chicken'.

To make things worse it costs Rs. 139 for some reason and the quantity given is abysmally little.

Skip this place and do a favour on your taste buds and your stomach.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
If you are looking for some super spicy biriyanis, ammis is the place. You can say the taste is andhra style. Biriyani portions are gigantic. But they are served with raita, curry and kheer. Other dishes are purely side dishes though and you cannot say they were extraordinary. Their home delivery service is awesome and you love the way food is packed to avoid spillage.
I have carried biriyani parceled from ammis when I'm in a journey as their packing is best. Yeah, the taste is too spicy to me, but I love the kheer.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
So, we received the family packs of Chicken, mutton and vegetable biryani at our office for lunch. The biryanis were too good especially the mutton and yes, we also ordered for Chatpata chicken which too did justice to its name although being a tad bit heavier on the sweeter part. Nevertheless, my taste buds seemed happy!

The major disappointment were the desserts. The phirni had too much of rose essence and totally diverted from how an actual phirni should taste like. Gulaab jamuns were not great at all.

So I guess, the only sad part would be the dessert otherwise the 4 family boxes are enough to for 8-10 people.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had made a home delivery order. I had ordered Egg Biryani, Chicken Seekh Kabab, Aam Panna and Gulab Jamun with Cheesy Rabri.
The quality of food was good. The curd given along with the Biryani had gone bad - it smelt and tasted foul. Aam panna was okish - it seemed like the bottled ones and not fresh. The sweet was good. Chicken Seekh Kabab was very good.
The time taken to deliver the food was over 1 hour even though my house is 4kms from this place.
Apart from this, one can go with their Biryanis
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: As usual delicious food and yummy biryani. The mint chutney with the biryani is to die for !! Loved the seekh kabab ! The Guntur kabab was relishing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One of the best place for non veg biryani.but one thing veg biryani over here is bad,and thebdelivery is very fast,i used to get my food delivered within 10min.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had heard a lot about their biryani so decided to order from here. Tried the veg biryani. The taste was below average. It felt like masala rice. Cant comment sbout tye non veg biryanis as I am a vegetarian.There are better options available around Indiranagar for gr8 veg buryanis.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This review m gonna write and rate on the basis of a home delivery experience from Indira Nagar branch of Ammi's Biriyani. What could have been better on a lazy Sunday evening when u thinking of pain to go ofc very next morning and don't wanna cook anything for dinner and all of sudden u got a discount offer from one of your favorite Biriyani serving place :)

Bang avail the offer forget everything else and wait desperately for some amazing Biriyani from Ammi's which is what I did exactly. Food came to me before time in a hot box. Aroma of coriander leafs, fried onions and Nice long grains of Basmati rice were quiet enough to water my mouth with the show stopper soft juicy, tender and well cooked gosht.
Ammi's Biryani
Luv u Ammi's Biriyani thanks for making my evening.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst service . Very rigid with their rules . Can't deliver a order for Rs 130 even if it's about 2 km.. will never think of ordering a briyani from here
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have only ordered food from here - delivery is super fast and packing is excellent. Having said that, I think it's the only place where I prefer the veg biryani over chicken / mutton, possibly because meat pieces are very few. Overall the food is decent, not great. Do not order their beverages.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This place is defiantly low rated but I liked biryanis over here ,although not a biryani fan:-). Restaurant is clean. Ambiance is defiantly foodie . flavors are good too. I love to visit this place with my family .....will come again :-) great job
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered home delivery from this place for the first time today through Swiggy. I was so so impressed by the packaging I cannot tell you. I had ordered for a executive chicken biryani it came in what looked like a fully enclosed luxury sweet box. Inside was the chicken biriyani and Raitha in separate plastic boxes and a spoon tissue and a tooth pick in a small packet. And all this for just 130 bucks. I believe whatever you do small or big do it well and this was what I consider exceptionally good. I really appreciate the amount of effort put into it. The biryani was good too. This is one of the best home delivery experiences that I have ever had. Thank you. All the best to the owner I hope you go a long way. People like you deserve to do well. :-)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
These guys serve decent Biryani. The kebabs are not that great. The Hyderabadi Biryani is the classic you should order if you visit this joint.

anupamadolekar.wordpress.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Jab hungry, Kuch acha khao!

A place has always scored 5 in my list for its lightning fast delivery. You order, sit back. Before you relax, have your Biriyanis delivered at your door step. They bring Biriyani hot n neatly packed. I never used an extra plate or spoon. Perfect for eat n throw. Biriyani has always been good n tasty. Raitha won't be great though. Salan n sweet are kinda okay. I love their chicken kebab boneless. I however do not like their other kebab varieties. They would be too oily to eat. Their executive combo Biriyanis are a real bet for the value. Can give it a try.

Have also tried dine in. The place would be empty always. They're more focused on door deliveries. Good choice for biriyani lovers those who're looking for a change.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammis biriyani is quite nice although I don't much favor the spices and masala they use. It may be my personal preference of taste but I don't enjoy it as much. The party pack unfortunately contained very little chicken and a lot more rice. Not a bad place to try out and the pricing is also moderate.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Today , I Had biryani here, fully oily, not preferable, food taste also not satisfied..better to avoid food here.ðŸ˜Œ
No parking,
No wash room,
Cost wise also not satisfied l..ðŸ˜
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: If you're craving for spicy biryani, then call up Ammi's. Delivery is super fast. It always comes in about 30 minutes. Their packing is superb and the portion size is decent too.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Taste: 3.5/5 VFM: 4/5

Had ordered a biryani via foodpanda. The guy was courteous enough to ask for an apology for the delay caused not because of his fault. The food was neatly packed with separate sections wrapped to avoid any spillage. Courtesy promotion codes, the food also came at a huge discount - hence the high value for money rating.

The biryani was decent. Not amazing, not so bad, good amount of chicken and almost stayed hot even after travelling a lot. Good service, decent food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Well I have spent a lot of my time in hyderabad so my definition of biryani usually differs from what people serve here.
Apart from the quantity , nothing to feel good about this place. If you live nearby and lack options, go for it otherwise I wouldnt recommend it to you.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Sitting place is very limited...I ordered one chicken biriyani which was too spicy and oily too.One of my friend ordered executive biriyani,he found the amount is not sufficient for 1 what they provided....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: On seeing the reviews i decided to order mutton biryani.. It was so dry and only 3 pieces in the whole biryani and priced at 225. Was a waste of money ! Will never order again from here ..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had their chicken biryani home delivered and I must say it was quite filling and lip smacking. The prices aren't too steep and ideal if youu want to give treat to your buddies without having to adjust your other expenses. I tried their chicken biryani, matka phirni and achari aloo and I loved them all. Even the delivery was sooner than expected which added to my happiness. Overall a great experience and hopefully this will continue in the future as well.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had always opted for Home delivery from Ammi's Biriyani. Their packing and delivery is immaculate. They serve Andhra style Biriyani, so the taste is on the spicier side. The Regular Chicken biriyani always comes up with two moderately sized pieces of chicken. Along with the biriyani, they serve Raita, pickle and what a surprise, a small serving of dessert. Out of curiosity, I had ordered Guntur kebab once - it turned out to be a bit of a dissapointment. It was nothing but chicken pieces(with bone), in semi-gravy. Not recommended! But the Biriyani is surely worth a try.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Delicious and reasonably priced biryani with well cooked meat delivered within 15 minutes! Very well packaged as well. What more could you want?
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: ordered only delivery of their biryanis.the packaging was very convenient.the biryani and the kebabs were very flavourful.i love their matka firni.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Review based on home delivery.We use to order for home delivery almost every week.We tried various combos and kabebs.The parcel was very good and highly professional.Biriyani and kebebs was of OK kind and not great compared to other biriyani places but considering home delivery,no complaints. But recently they started to cut down the quantity.Previously 1 biriyani was sufficient for two people but now 1 was not sufficient for one person.Along with that they cut down dessert,gravy,raitha that used to come with combo packs.So we stopped ordering from Ammi's.

Quantity - 3/5
Service - 4/5
VFM - 2.5/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
What do u want on a day you are not in a mood to cook?? Ammis Biryani to the rescue... Hot, Tasty, Clean & well packed food. 
Flavorsome Biryani with raita & Baingan ... finishing touches with sweet .. what more can one ask for.. Tasty Food Value for Money.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst biryani in town.Their dish doesnt even qualify to be called a biryani. Even their appetizers were dry and with no flavors. Certainly a place to avoid
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biryani was good and the quantity was sufficient...but ordered for delivery and it took them 1hour and 30 minutes.... Was not even hungry by then..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered for home delivery ... One biryani is sufficient for 2-3 people ... Reasonably priced , value for money... It can be tried when one is in the mood for biryani.. The rice was well cooked basmati and had all the right flavours ...Recommended !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: They have an outlet at work - hygienic, quicj and hot! The acchari aloo is amazingly spicy. And the best bit - we split one plate by 2! Thanks
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Below expectations! Kabab was tasteless and biryani was more sort of fried rice!
The chicken in the biryani were also too small as compared to biryanis of other places!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: All sweet and simple. Their biriyani almost feels like it came out of a microwave. Their chairs will easily disappoint your back and the prices will do The same to your purse. Nothing out of the ordinary here!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Flavor was there but too much garam masala in all dishes. This is not cool. Everybody talk about ammis biriyani's taste, I had twice at ammis and disappointed; twice. Not going there again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biryani is too good.it is delicious but less quantity compared to the price .there is no large space and only a limited person can fit in that space.as a whole experience is not upto the mark.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Holiday on a weekday and u feel like ordering something or a take out..

You hear about this place and sure enuff think of ordering our very own biryani..

first off, the quality of a classic mutton biryani can be easily judged by the way mutton is tenderized and glad ammis biryaani didnt disappoint us in that..

The quantity can be more as a box of 1 mutton biryani is not for the heavy eaters..

The packaging and delivery is prompt and appreciable..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Well if you are surprised then this rating given by me is purely in consideration with its unusual popularity.

Unusual because, their is nothing about this place which I liked even a tad bit.

First of all, there are not enough chairs and tables to sit and eat in peace. And this is the problem in almost all their outlets.

The staff is also not anywhere near cooperating and are have absolutely no clue which box of parcel packet contains what or whether which one's ven/non-veg etc.

I dont understand the hype about it. Probably because its just about everywhere like a CCD outlet.

Also for the money they charge the taste is also not that great. Its best not to parcel, as the cold food makes it even worse.

I would suggest any restaurant with descent reputation would serve you better biryani than here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very hospitable people ! And I love the timing they deliver the food in! Soft spoken people and thank God they understand English !!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
HORRIBLE !

I have ordered for a vegetarian biryani and they delivered a chicken biryani with a huge piece of meat in it. Being a hard core vegetarian from a brahmin family, i was totally disgusted and it has really hurt my religious sentiments. 

I hope their management takes this seriously and makes sure it doesnt happen to other customers.

one thing is sure that i would never order anything from ammis anymore.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered chicken biryani from Ammi's biryani . Everything from packing to delivery to quantity was good.Delivery is on time, packaging is perfect.You get curd, salan and sweet along with the biryani.

But taste was not that great. The biryani feels very dry and does not seems authentic. I will try other things next time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is always prefered as a take away destination for biriyani as it spreaded over every corner of the city !! some friends and I ordered biriyanis including chicken halim in a late sunday afternoon with in 15 mins they delivered the things , its the best part i suppose . The chicken Hyderabadi biriyani was awesome as it serves Raita along with curry , after a long while had some good biriyani in the Garden city as my friend describes " yaha to biriyani khichdi ke barabar haai " lol !!!! we mistakenly orderd the chicken HAlim but it was quite good as i never tasted before . Thanks to the retaurant fellows at last !!!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Good place for chicken .
Get a feeling of the typical Muslim after marriage non veg stuff.
Pretty clean and decent place if your wanting good chicken Biriyani :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: the executive chicken biriyani was OK in taste nothing special but I would prefer any day biriyani pot. the price is reasonable but the amount of rice that you get is very less. the pieces ate also small. in executive biriyani you get a choice of chicken kofta or chicken kabab or soft drinks. I made. the wrong cjpuce by choosing kabab and payed. the price for it. it was chicken masalla and not a kabab. if you have ever eaten kabab you will know for sure that it isn't kabab. the pieces are decent in size.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I visited the place few days back for a take away order. I was actually looking for an Executive Biryani but was told that was not available, don't know why? Then has to go for the Mutton Hyderabadi Biryani. The biryani was good, the mutton pieces was tender as well, but still feel something was missing. But nevertheless i enjoyed the biryani as I was in a mood to have Biryani that evening and will definitely go back again and recommend others.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: My God!!! Horrible delivery experience. You won't believe guys I waited for my lunch almost for 3 hours. My brother wasn't well and I specially mentioned as soon as possible and I was at work and I placed at 2.00p.m. first of all they sent wrong parcel and when we asked for replacement delivery boy told he will be back in 30mins. After that for 2 hours I called up CC and followed up. And they were giving me false info saying boy tried reaching but we didn't pick up. Such a big lie. Though we are regular customer they are doing one or the other mistake in delivery. This is not the for first time , it had happened 4-5 times. They commit mistake in every order. Before sending they won't check at all. And over that full false information. I really wanna suggest you guys don't go for this. Food might be tasty but dare to order only if you are ready to have your LUNCH AS DINNER. Very poor delivery experience. I hated it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Yesterday I ordered ammis vegetable biryani and paneer butter masala ....but quality was not good ..biryani was like previous day biryani and there was not vegetable ...and subzi was also not tasty ...it was sour and there was no salt ...and for that price quantity price was more ....sorry to say if you deliver the food like this you will loose customer ...and people forget the taste of ammis biryani ðŸ˜’ðŸ˜”
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pretty good Biryani and very good packaging, the taste is good and prices are decent. Once ordered it takes little extra time to get delivered but it's all worth it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A nice and small place to have biryani, I would not call it authentic hyderabadi biryani but it tastes good. Though the portion served is less but this place is not that expensive.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Home Delivery order # 161470, Bill#207613 ordered on 17th September 2016 at my residence. The order had Executive Chicken Biryani and Chicken Tikka. While tikka tasted just fine, the Biryani box was very distasteful of a Biryani. It was just a box full of burnt onions, some white rice and 2 piece of chicken. I had also requested that i dont want biryani with chicken leg piece on it. Oddly enough, the biryani delivered was with leg piece and very bitter of burnt onions. No flavour, no taste of the regular Ammis Biryani that I had known till this date.  Not to mention, there was no complimentary raita (a must with biryani)  too! Very dissapointing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is the most horrible biryani that I had ever eaten.if they call this Hyderabad I biryani they actually don't know what they are talking about. The chicken in the biryani was horrible.overall these people screwed my dinner
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I never had such a waste biryani ever. I am a veggie and this was first time I wasted food. Not recommend to have biryani from here. Please add more veggies to biryani and work on taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
nice place for biryani, on bg road good for take away  the biryani,

taste is awesome..

great keep it up
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered executive chicken biriyani from Ammi's. Quantity was a li'l less and the taste was okay. Nothing different or special. Had heard quite a lot about their food chain. So had high expectations than what I got.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani ! Bangalore's home franchise, developing and making good name in their style of foods .
Ordered Egg biryani and Hatrick combo .
Hatrick combo contained masala rice ,masala chicken and ommlete .
Waited for around 15 min for the order and finally order was on table .yet no much crowd was there .
Ambience was normal and average .
Taste was yumm and Good .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: These guys are very careless . They send Biryani , without any spoon to eat and when you call them , they divert the call to an unknown number . Please don't order from www,ammis,in (actually its a link) you will not get any spoon . This has happened with my friend also .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: some of my colleges recommend me to try Biryani out here. So I went there for my lunch today. The ambiance was OK. The biryani was good but less in quantity. The service was pretty fast. I would like to visit this place again for having Biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I visited this place yesterday afternoon with my friends to have a quick bite......!!!! We ordered biryani, side dishes and rolls!!!! I was amazed to see the quality, quantity and taste of the food....!!!! It was truly awesome man.....!!!! At last we had the dessert matka phirni which was phenomenal....!!!!! I would recommend this place to everyone to at least visit once......!!!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I would now give them a single rating.

Have been ordering from their website "ammis.in", they have reduced their packaging quality and DRASTICALLY reduced their quantity.

Pathetic food and delivery service .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered thalaserry biriyani, matka phirni. Packing was good.biriyani was not good at all.It did not taste like kerala biriyani at all. Chicken in the biriyani was giving a bad smell.Matka phirni was awesome. Please use fresh chicken pieces not rotten one's .Who are humans not wild animals to eat anything.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have been coming to eat here since past 3 months and I must say I like their food and service. A variety of dishes I have tried and I have found everything tasty. Rolls are best. Their new Hat-trick biryani is a whole package and that too extremely light on pocket. Executive egg biryani is my second favourite. I like their food. Must visit
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammis biryani has lately become the GOTO place for my biryani cravings. To be honest, I had a weird experience with them 1.5 years back, but got a SMS regarding one of the Andhra biryanis. I took the bait with the discount and it was superb. Spice level was perfect and chicken was fresh. It is important that chicken pieces are juicy. Good to see this shining out amongst biryani joints
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered 5 Chicken biryani, packaging are very good but briyani was pathetic i will never suggest to go any one this place.
The price is very high but food is lower then foot path. Online they given nice presentation & cheat-with customer & making money i want this feedback goes to who is running the organisation. Because whatever effect for me it should not effect for other customer. They give chicken briyani chicken is no taste chicken is very bad entire food is very very bad i want give massage no one should not eat  Ammi's Biryani food
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Executive biryani is very low in quantity. Taste is bad. Not recommended. They have stopped giving sweet and gravy from biryani. They don't consider feedback also
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Only for take away, they don't have dining area... Their Biryani is good can try once nothing great about this place it's only a take away counter or you can order for home delivery.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We've always ordered Home Delivery and not once had any complaints :) The food's always here on time & consistently yummy! Customer service execs are very friendly and always helpful. The Mutton Biryani is a family favorite & one of the best dishes on the menu. Ammi's Biryani - Great Biryani ... !! ;)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered Hyderabadi sabz biryani. The food was really good. The quantity is enough for 2 people. Achari aloo is not that great. Its not worth it. Matka phirni tastes really great , but the quantity is really less. On ordering through food panda ( home delivery), great deal of discount can obtained. Over all a great place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had ordered for the veg biryani but the taste was not great. It tastes like a fried rice and i could hardly find any vegetables. There wasn't enough flavor. Also the raita was very sour.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Actually i am fond of Ammi's biryani. But the worst experience i had this week. I had a mutton biryani by paying Rs. 265. The first thing is i like only the dum biryani, but still Ammi's so i agreed to have even Hyderabadi biryani. But the taste is worst. After getting the name and fame, they forget to give good quality. It is not as expected as before.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Two words : Total shit.... !! 

No Idea what 'genre' of biryani they serve. It falls something between a fried rice and a decent enough biryani. The chicken pieces are nowhere close to what biryani pieces should be. Just pondering on how it's still surviving out there.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I place an order at 9:08PM on a rainy night. I get a response that the order will be delivered before 10:03PM. I call at 9:36PM to reconfirm and Iâ€™m informed that the food is ready and packed and will be out for delivery in 10 minutes. I call back at 10:04PM and Iâ€™m informed that the delivery boy will be at my doorstep in 10 minutes.

At 10:30PM I get a call from someone at the restaurant that they canâ€™t deliver my order.

Thanks Ammis for the great support! Or lack of it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Whenever I want a home delivery and I am having biriyani craving, the only option that comes to my mind which would also be pocket friendly is ammi's biriyani. I've tried almost all the dishes, and I would say there is no compromise in quality. I just wish they'd deliver faster when it comes to home delivery. Namrata Halder you should definitely try it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have tried the take away option a while ago and the options available at that time were limited. I remember it was dinner time on a weekday. 

with it's unique packing concept and some lip smacking Biryani's all they need is to provide more options to pick from the menu. The rates are reasonable and not much dine in experience. Most of the outlets look similar to Pizza take away places. Unfortunately, there are too many biryani options and some of the older ones will have to reinvent themselves to stay in the game.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
ordered a Chicken biryani, packaging was good :)

----------
Dear Zomato, Please don't force 140 letters reviews, sometimes less conveys the best message.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered from here and the delivery was super fast. The food was packed really well and tasted real good too
The chicken biriyani was delicious
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
pathetic delivery service in Bangalore.... food was served cold and as the roll were made of maida.. i was not even able to chew it properly.... 

will never think of ordering again....

though Mumbai outlet were good and serve you hot even when you order.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's vends out from HCL's Bangalore jigani campus, on three ocassion i tried briyani and each time i saw lot of oil. They actually pack in in container . Not sure if this is case with their other outlets, but out here it's always oily (heard from others too).
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst biriyani and they took 2 hours to deliver. Will never order again from Ammys. Chicken was hard and not at all tasty... Masala was missing in the biriyani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had Hyderabad biriyani from here

Tasted good
Quantity was good
Price is slightly higher range

Service is good
Located opposite to Gopalan mall
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Average Biryani. Less quantity. No raita / curd with the Biryani. The kebab was average too. Took more than an hour to deliver. Overall, not a good experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered home delivery. the delivery experience was very good and i dint had sufficient change but the delivery boy happily accepted less amount... That shows the importance given to customer not the money.. biriyani tastes yummm!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Mediocre food but arrogant delivery boys. You need to ensure that you have exact change in hand or else these guys are capable of robbing you stating that they'll adjust next time. When I told him that I'll adjust next time, he had the guts to say that he's not the owner and jeered as well. Terrible terrible customer experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Yes, the food tastes delicious here and the restaurant's ambience, service, prices everything is good. Just that the amount of biryani served will make you laugh. It will hardly be sufficient for a primary school kid!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We ordered the chicken biryani which was pretty standard fare. What has really left a bad taste in the mouth was the failure to return the 150 rupees change that was due. The delivery boy took the money saying he would be back with the change and never came back. Repeated calls to the call center only gave lip service assurance that our money will be returned asap but sad to say, that was not the case. It is not the question of 150 bucks but the principle of the matter. I will not be ordering from there again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: After opening my first order from Ammis: executive chicken biryani I was a bit taken aback by the quantity given. My disappointment started to grow exponentially as I went on eating because the taste was so good and I did't want it to get over. But it did very soon. There were two chicken pieces which were extremely well cooked. The rice was also very tasty. It was quite worth the money except for the fact that one plate won't fill you and two might be too much. Overall all it was a satisfactory experience and dragged me to their outlet before the week got over.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered a Veg Family pack today, got a pepsi 600ml, raita, kheer and achari aloo
Taste: 4 Appreciated by all as not too spicy or too mild, though I find a little lacking in flavor. The raita for some was a little sour. For me it was good. The kheer v good as usual.

Delivery: 1
Took more than 95minutes for delivery! A 200% deviation from the 45mins SLA. Apart from hiring location knowledgeable individuals, there should be an effort to actually notedown/ remember the address and not call for almost every turn.

Quality: Good, masala in biryani was a bit oily, but rest all were good in quality. Food was warm but not hot, so not really complaining here as this is a delivery issue
3.5

Price: I got a 20% discount probably because I had ordered a week before.

Packing: Good 4
Quantity: Good 4.5 as promised for 3-4 individuals
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Tried Ammi's Biriyani twice on home delivery basis. One thing they lack is punctuality. They literally messed up my dinner plans big time.
The quality is not upto the mark as well. Not recommended at all. Have gone thru some of the reviews and see that my thought process have been echoed all over. Just goes to show they never change!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
3 for the reasonable food...
But the rest got lost due to poor customer management by the staff..
you ppl have to improve!
Pls try
So that there's more footfall.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have ordered chicken biriyani twice for home delivery. The biriyani was good as compared to other places available for home delivery in Bengaluru. I also had the guntur chicken. I didn't like that so much.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst experience ever! They won't apply discount codes. Even cold beverages are served hot. Uninterested staff. The place is neat and tidy bcz no one ever goes there.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Love Ammi's Biriyani one of the best and unique tastes which mouth waters every body they be North or South Indians would love to try their biriyani. I would have gone for 5-Star rating but the reason I pulled my self to 4.5 was that because of the kebabs, I hoped the dry kebab but was served with fry type but what ever the taste of that kebabs was also great and their home delivery is worth mentioning and the package they deliver is definitely one of the best in the city, most importantly prices are all affordable to each and every individual also their service serving and way treat their customers is also great.Good work Ammi's most likely to order food again ASAP keep up the good work....
Anybody looking for Unique and Good Biriyani Ammi's is your spot.. Enjoy food time guys...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Dabba briyani.
The rice and chicken is so dry that I nearly drank 1ltr of water to swallow the briyani.
Briyani looks like preservative and there is no freshness'
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Slightly dry but okay biryani. Try their executive chicken biryani. Avoid the kababs. They just don't taste like kababs. Service is decent...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Yuck! Pathetic food. Please avoid wasting even a single ruppee on this pathetic place. Tried their biryani, kabab & tawa chicken. All equally bad and inedible
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I love the ammis zeera samba biriyani varities - it ideal for a quick take away , specially when I have a biriyani craving! its perfectly spicy and delicious! the service is also quite fast at the counters ... keep up the good work Ammis!!! :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammis biryani has the best Mutton Biryani that I ever had. The aroma and the masalas blended are just perfect. The rolls and the mini meals have been a perfect arson on their menu. The delivery is very quick and their packaging is so good that one need not worry abt anything just open the pack and u have all in it.. Great taste and value for money !!!! People who love biryanis must try them !!!!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Eaten here 2-3 times ... Feels hygienic ... Biryani is really good .... The kebabs are the just right...not too spicy....the service is good and they are friendly...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered a Hyderabadi Murgh Biriyani and one Executive Biriyani.. Both tasted different and classic. Perfect quantity and the chicken pieces were nicely cooked with the right taste. The semi gravy Guntoor Kabab was tasty with right amount of spices..

Final summation: A Pohela Boishak spent well!! (Bengali New Year)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: It's definitely a place for Biryani lovers. It's Hyderabadi Dum Biryani is authentic and a must have. The ambiance is alright though this place is slightly small but it's organized and clean. The other good thing about them is their menu which has limited options sticking to the kind of food they serve. This immediately means that it's a kind of speciality restaurant which is confident about the kind of food they serve. The service is prompt and informed which can definitely help you decide your order. Yo to Ammis Biryani:)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Bad place to be at to fulfill your biryani cravings.Came here through recommendations from friends who regularly ate at other branches of Ammi's. Ordered a couple of biryani combos. The biryani didn't seem fresh and the sides were also gut wrenching. The quantity is also not appreciable. We jus wanted to leave this place asap and the worst part was they didn't accept credit/debit card.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not that good, but expensive. So its always good to go and get some good biriyani from some other places which sells good tasty and for sure cheaper than ammis such as ambur, meghna etc
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had visited this place last year. Most of the biryanis that they serve are very low on spices bordering on the bland. The only biryani which does pack a punch is the shadi biryani, both chicken and mutton. Sometimes the mutton is very chewy. Not a great place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered biryani for colleagues at office. On the phone I was suggested to go in for family packs as the number was over 12 people. After repeatedly insisting that in office we had no plates or bowls I was assured that the food would be comfortable to eat as it would be served in trays and bowls. I was in for a shock when my order was delivered with biryanis in plastic boxes and the raitha and sweet dish in aluminium foil bags. Didn't care how the biryani tasted as the embarrassment of serving and the mess it was making was far more. Wish you guys were more professional and don't mislead the customers when placing an order.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
i recently visited this place for dinner as i live in a p.g thats why its not possible for me to eat p.g food so i decided to have my dinner at Ammi's Biryani.
I ordered Mutton zeera samba biryani + chicken kabab +soft drink and for desserts kashmeeri meetha.
food was good services are quite well from their side.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Well not the best biryani in town but does give u a moghal-ish tatse. The varieties displayed on the menu is NEVER available especially the combos. All u can order is hyderabadi biryani and if u get lucky zeera samba biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very poor service
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: My hubby  order ammis biryani whenever i do not cook...i really like the ammis biryani it has awsm taste and nice packing  :) but side dishes are  not upto expections  my hubby had orderd last friday asusal briyani was tasty but salan and raita it doesn't taste like the way it has to be maintain the same taste because we have ordred ammis biryani most of the time and easliy can find out the taste difference
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biriyani quality was very low. The rice used was not basmati. It tasted and looked more like heavily oiled rice, with two pieces od chicken, which again sadly looked in bad shape. I am not so sure whether the meat was fresh or not.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Basically worth if you are searching for delivery options. Pocket friendly. Mutton &Chicken Biriyani is good but the starters and curries better be avoided. Takes little time to deliver but the portion of Biriyani was enough. Ammi's Biriyani has improved themselves significantly since they have evolved.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The Executive veg biriyani was incredibly good and the taste was awesome. Would highly recommend for vegetarians.No smell and also the restaurant was clean.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The worst biryani experience i have ever had....I went to the restaurant very hungry at 2.30pm... it took 10 mins to take the bill.....  I am the 1st one standing in front of the  sales guy.....there was a technical issue itseems( y do u use old systems)...  i ordered 2 executive biryanis because the name is good and i thought it will be good and sat there..  here it goes the most damn f*** biryani.... got biryani in the Tiffin plastic plate with raitha in it.... as if they are serving for free.... then the rice was like ration shop rice provided by government.... chicken two pieces were dry and pieces is like i give those pieces to my dog.... quantity is very less i can make whole rice in one hand.... worst taste no good smell salt  very oily...  gravy is not given.... worst experience i have ever had... Even small roadside hotel will provide good biryani...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I found this hotel while looking for best biryani. I ordered it for home delivery but i dint expected the worst biryani i ever had in bangalore i can say. I don't know if they neglect the home deliveries but it was the worst experience. Good bye to Ammi's biryani forever....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Been here recently all by myself provided their is no other choice....all I can say is it doesn't meet its basic purpose of Dum ki biryani. It is very much dry n oily n rice is undercooked. Pieces are soo dry dat u need to keep on chewing them. Mutkha pharni is good. Price is not worthy n Overall very much disappointed with food n service in view of hype created around it. Guys come on u need bring a whole lot of changes to ur culinary skills.. Al d best
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i had ordered it through home delivery..i ordered a mutton sheekh kabab and it was stinking very badly that we had to throw it in the garbage ..it was the worst ever.. i doubt it was mutton.. you must be fooling people..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Better for home delivery. On of the better commercial biryani outlets. Dont expect speciality taste. They seem to keep rice a bit undercooked but adds crunch. Side dishes are marinated well.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had a very disappointing experience... The taste was OK but the quantity was very less...price charged are high according to taste and quantity...the quantity was very less
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic place to have food. My first experience is worst. after placing the order have waited to 1 hour without any response. when i called them to check on the order, there comes the highlight order was not even placed. What they claim as 45 min delivery or your food is free is all cheating the customer. they were ready to provide the food with 20% discount BUT not for what i have ordered. it will be their choice. reason behind is sunday. Oh god, great to know that these bunch of jokers have found out today is sunday. my initial call was at 12:15 PM. I am not sure whether we have to place the order a day prior. Pathetic guys NOT FIT FOR ONLINE SERVICE and WORST CUSTOMER SUPPORT. NEVER TRUST THIS GUYS. Ad in the papers are just to cheat the customer.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The food is good, but if you go for home delivery, do expect unprofessional behavior. It sometime can reach a level of harassment by multiple calls by delivery guys ,specially when you don't know the local language.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
It's always been a life saver..
Hostel food sucks then please remember late night service of ammi's biryani.
It's served hot and tastey,
Service its bit slow but still managed. Their chicken biryani taste good
That is must try.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hi guys!!! Never ever try biryani from so called "Ammi's biryani"..the quality of food is so so bad..I had ordered one chicken biryani and they have me a spoiled one..I felt like vomiting it..I had never experiended such a pathetic biryani in my life time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi"s Biryani..Pre cook& Reheat???

Im least bothered about these kind of biryani joints as im a pure vegeterian and these joints cater more to the taste buds of non vegeterians but my friend insisted me to come once and taste their authentic biryanis. It's located exactly opposite to gopalan cinemas on bannerghatta road, The place is neat and well maintained and there is a bunch of students enjoying their biryani..I thought of ordering 1 among the 4 available in vegeterian biryani menu, But to my utter disappointment, only dum biryani veg is available..These biryani's are not freshly prepared, they are pree cooked and juss reheated in microwave before they arrive on your table, we visit restaurants for tasty and freshly cooked food but not to taste instant and pre cooked food with preservatives, Never ever visit this place again in my life.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The first time I tried Ammis was at this place. There was a party at home the next day and I ordered substantial. To be precise I ordered 6 Veg Biryanis and 2 Mutton Biryanis. I paid the amount on delivery at home. I understood there is a discount that was not passed. The staff made a cool Rs750/ at my expense and they did not give the bill.

Guys the Biryani is good but you cannot trust these people. They employ thieves. Now I am wondering if they use Beef instead mutton??
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Chicken Hyderabadi Biryani and Mutton Executive Biryani tasted well and the portion was just enough for the prices charged, although no Chutney was provided with Chicken Sheekh Kebab. Correct printed bill was not provided. Outlet was maintained well and the kitchen looked hygienic but electric generator in the back during power cut created a lot of nuisance.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Waste of money..you order something and you get something..plus they can make your ears bleed with their loud generator
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's biryani is reasonable in price but that is the only thing positive here,The rice they use for biryani is normal,not even biryani basmati rice, they have something called as executive biryani which is not even good. i mean the rice used is pathetic and chicken piece provided is bad.  please avoid if you looking for some good taste. only good thing here is the price is on the lower side.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
We had Chicken as well as Mutton biriyani. They served very well but biriyani was not good especially mutton biriyani.
Not value for money comparing to other biriyani outlets.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Here the amount of food is really bad ....
According to price its not even 1/4th of hunger that goes off.... Yaa but in terms of taste itz nice... OK kind of
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: simply waste of money and time, cost is more quantity is less, even quality is also not that much good, better go for some other small hotel and have, my suggestion is don't prefer ammis biryani, its not worthy for your money.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This place is particularly not that good if you are a huge biriyani fan. The apparent packaging may look very polished and well served but the food fails to fill its purpose. The meat is not that fresh, the rice is a bit blunt in comparision to that which is used in biriyanis. The taste is average and nothing near what I have had come across. There are other better options available than this.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's was one of the first biryani houses we used to order from while in IIM campus, and thus the place set the benchmarks for Bangalore Biryani. What we didnt realize until much later was that there were several other biryani places nearby which were much better than Ammi's, be it the quality of the rice, the freshness of the meat and even the taste and quantity of condiments that come along with them. The only pro of Ammi's was their packaging, which came in ready-to-eat box with all the stuff neatly compartmentalized; a boon for hostel students. But then, who minds eating in paper plates without spoons if the food itself is better.
Overall, the place is avoidable until and unless convenience is the prime factor.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Well. Of all I liked only chicken hyderabadi dumm briyani. Being hyderabadi myself I would say they are almost close the authentic hyderabadi biryani. Cheers guys and hope you maintain the taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst Biryani ever with rotten vegetables & frozen chicken.......Say no no 2 Ammi's Biryani...........
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I've ordered from Ammi's before. Their food is usually good. But last week when I ordered sabzji biryani from Ammi's, I was really taken aback. Not only was the order delivered to me after 1.5 hrs, the food was cold and the biryani rice had shrunk and tasted like raw rice. I refused to pay the delivery guy the amount because of their much touted "45 minutes or free" guarantee. He started giving excuses like the place is new to him, the address was not proper etc etc. I called up the outlet and all I received was a "sorry sir". I'm not sure what to do with the sorry, maybe make a poster out of it and hang it in my drawing room.

If you cannot deliver on your promise, don't make one !
1.5 just because of this delivery/marketing fiasco, and the awful food..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Well Ammi's Biriyani has become a general weekend regularities for me. Their biriyani may not be a shooting star in the league but is surely above the par level. But the most appreiable aspect of them is their service, especially when you order from home their delivery time is superb. Food wise its better than a daily level biriyani provider.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have ordered just a plate of biryani from this restaurant, the taste and the curry was awesome, it can make you full in just one plate.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: One word for this place "horrible".......one more word "disastrous"..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I am a frequent customer of Ammis Biriyani and I should say the Kagadasapura outlet is a total waste. They are a bunch of Liars! They never have the Keema biriyani in stock and even if they have they would just deny it inspite of their customer care agent confirming that there is stock and taking an order for the same. I am not sure why there is this kind of biased behavior among their own outlets. Any time you call to check the availability of Kheema biriyani the only answer you get is "Out of Stock".
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I just love their Zeera Samba mutton biriyani...simple great. Good quantity and quality as well.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered biryani for dinner. Heard such a lot about this place. What a disappointment! It's an excuse of a biryani....it was nothing but biryani....no flavours...no subtle nuances....no delicious spices popping out every now and then to surprise your taste buds...just the same monotonous spicy taste that is so typical of commercial restaurants...like an industrial taste..like mass produced..not for the love of food..but to fit in with the bills. ...pls clean up your act if you want customers to come back for more!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not good...!! Too bad for biryani!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biriyani is not good. Expected to be something but turn out to be bad food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I remember I reached this joint after a hectic interview in a company nearby (where I wasn't selected of course) and was fuming with anger and hunger! And Ammi's Biryani appeared out of nowhere and appeased my hunger and by Jove! I can tell you folks, these guys have some secret formula. For their biryani is something I will taste on my lips for a long time. Staff was cordial and well behaved. Kudos to their team and thanks for the meal!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
So finally after seeing ammis outlet at every nooks and corner of the city we planned it to give it a try.We had to face disappointment. We ordered both veg and non-veg.
In Non-veg we ordered Hyderabadi Chicken briyani, Cost - 180,they give you good enough quantity to fully satisfy one person.Along with it they give a sweet dish kheer,which is just about average.And a bowl of tomato curry,which we tried to figer out,what was it,along side curd.It tasetd like normal fried long basmati rice,with lot of cinnamon.
