The Veg briyani was better than the non veg,when compared to the price.It was reasonable priced.
I would not suggest to go their with huge expectation.
The service was prompt within 40min,and was hot enough.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammiâ€™s biriyani is not Tum biriyani and it is cold stored biriyani.
They prepare Biryani at common kitchen at Bommanahalli early in the morning 5.00 to 8.00 am and biriyaniâ€™s were packed in the parcel containers and supply to all the outlets in the Bangalore. In each outlet they store the packed biryani in the freezer. At restaurant, when you place the biriyani or any food order , biryani will pre heated in the microwave oven and then severed to you. You are not getting biriyani from vessel (Anda), Thus not called as a Tum biriyani. Even same method is applied for all the food serveed by Ammiâ€™s.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Never ever place any order with ammis biryani...poor service and rude behaviour...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Zomato should give option for negative remarks. This is one of the worst food place to have. Very bad management. Bad franchise.

Biriyani is not proper. More like flavored rice.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
They should change their name to HOPELESS BIRYANI!!
Low quality chicken was used ..and extremely spicy ..ended up with a stomach upset :((
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani : We tried both BTM & Koramangala outlets. The former was near to my house. So we gave them benefit of doubt and tried it 3 or 4 times before calling quits.

We had both Chicken as well as Mutton biryanis. Their packaging is impressive and the good part ends there. Their so-called Biryani is not an authentic Biryani in my opinion. It tastes more like flavoured rice without taste. I have had better & authentic Biryanis in BTM itself - forget about entire Bangalore.

I tried their Kababs that were decent, but way too low in quantity.

Not going back anytime soon.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Well here is an example of restaurent which is able to survive 6 years with opening branches just because of publicity and no quality.
To serve biryani,one should have sense of biryani, the curry served here is strangely a tomato curry which doesnt go well with the biryani,they could have tried a mirchi ka salan like other major biryani restaurents do.
Secondly, they have a centralized kitchen, you will get biryani prepared in morning , heated and given to you.
First time i heard that you dont serve onions with biryani since you dont have availbility as it is centralized.

A total thumbs down to ammis birayni, sort it out before the market throws you out.

For biryani lovers, try manis dum biryani , its an excellent alternative
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
We often order Murg Hyderabadi Biryani ( Family pack ). Whenever we place order, specifically we ask for extra raita.. Even mention to get us cold-drink, other than Pepsi. All the time call center confirms with our order. But delivery is always different. How can they provide a small pack of raita, when its a family pack? I am annoyed with their service.. Ammi's Biryani service center does not stick to, what we order for.
My Order no. - 167094
Bill no. - 436019
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not that great...expensive too
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Always got it delivered !! has always been good :)
trust me :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
hi I went to one of your outlet in devrachikanahalli main rd. supervisor who took my order and told me our biryani is fresh.
on this confidence I ordered 2 cb hyderabadi and guntur kebab.
when I saw the person preparing my order in kitchen I saw him taking biryani from refrigeration and then microwaving....
after reaching home opened all parcels and saw the kebabs were chicken pieces with gravy. the meaning of kebab is changed.
the biryani pieces were stinking with frozen smell.
I think owner only wants to make money making fool of customer nothing else.
enjoy making money....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: they serve yummy biryanis and very good quantity for price paid. the quality of rice is excellent. the kheer they serve is a fantastic treat after a spicy biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: NO COMMENT
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Dear Team at Ammis,

1. Your biryani is wonderful, I for years always though Hyderabad for Biryani or no where else. You guys are proving me wrong. I honestly think you guys are doing a good job and should keep up the good work.

2. Your portions can be up'd a little bit, a good sized eater like me, felt insufficient....

3. Salan needs to worked just a little bit..nothin dramatic just a tad bit
3.a. thicken your raita a bit as well

4. Over all good job, good service and prompt response on the helpline, for once some one in 3 years could spell my building name...thumbs up and a happy dance.....

I ordered twice today and yes it comes from my heart....Burp and good luck

From a farmer to a start up

Regards,

Happy farmer
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Biryani's at Ammi;s. Not worth it.
Different flavours biryani.. Taste is bad.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Really great experience with online order, followed by pathetic quality of biryani delivered.
(31MAY2013)
Horrible biryani, I almost got stomach upset.
I hope it was isolated situation, but not going to order from here any more.
No ratings please.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Tried many Biryani's.

We (me and my colleague) went there for having the Biryani as we keep seeing their two wheeler moving around. So, ordered two Chicken Biryani.

Ambiance :- Good. You wont feel that you are sitting very near to a busy road. Just opposite to Gopalan Mall.

Food :- It is tasty. If you are hungry, I do not think a single biryani will fill your stomach. The quantity is less compared to other Biryanis in this area. I think they are not cooking/making biryanis from there. They shift to a plate from a different container. May be they may not be having cooks/no provision to cook there?

I would say, visit when you have very low appetite. Or order few other dishes as well.

Hope they improve the quantity like the quality they provide.
Chicken pieces were tender and tasty.

Worth a try :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had the Hyderabad Murg and was decent, not as good as compared to Birinz. But must say the food was packed was awesome and loved it. Had made online order on their website and they called within 5mins confirming the order. Delivered in 15mins. Service was great. Should try other Biriyanis too in their menu.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Punch Line:
Good Quantity, Very Hot Masala Curry, Well Packed Delivery of Order, Need to work on the curry's taste a bit more.

This place is nearby and we happen to order a lot from here. The Biryani is prepared good but is too spicy. Also the Chutney or Curry that is given is not so good at one gets at other places. It tastes a bit sour and I usually avoid it.

It's worth a try and see for yourself if you like it.

Overall: 2.5 / 5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Recently I visited one of their outlets at Bannerghata Road and my experience was bad.If I be very honest the 'Biriyanis' are average in taste but the serving presentation is nice. There is nothing extra-ordinary, even their claim to serve 'Authentic Hyderabadi Kachchi Biriyani' is false. The cutlery provided to me was dirty. When I ordered 'Chicken Boneless Kebab' they gave me 'Chicken Pepper Fry'.The price rates are alright. The staff is really well behaved and groomed. A real good place to visit when you don't have any other place to go.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not impressed with briyani and their service. It's average!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Average ambience.. Average food ... average taste.. Briyani looks like made few days back..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
good place. must try once.
I find the veg. biryani quite good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The biryani is fabulous.

the delivery was done on time.

Was highly disappointed by the kabab though.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Finally got the taste of real Hyderabad biriyani in Bangalore.... finally my search is over.. AMMI'S Biriyani rocks.... My rating - 4/5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I ordered Biryani from this place for the first time and was quite surprised with the excellent service that I got. After I placed the order I got an SMS with the complete order, the bill amount together with the name of the person who will deliver it and his contact number and the food was delivered within 10 mins. Packing was also quite cool.

Excellent Service guys, keep up the good work!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: ammi biryani is the worst biryani i ate in bangalore.the price is high with worst quality of birayani. road side biryani is best than ur biryani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I love Hydrebadi cuisine and I had to try and order from here. I had ordered a family pack of Mutton Biryani and Chicken Pepper Fry. To my utter dismay the Chicken Pepper Fry was a meager 50gms of dices boneless chicken in masala. The biryani was good but did not live up to my expectation. Its a two out of five for me...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This is like a boon for bachelors near bannerghatta road. The packaging is top class. The whole package is a plastic thali plate. Biryani in middle, Salan and Curd on top. A small place for keeping bones a spoon, saunf for after food and a toothpick to go with it !

Coming to the biryani, when I used to order back in 2009 the biryani was not that great. Not spicy at all, but decent. I stopped ordering from here as I had found other good places nearby. I ordered again recently, and the biryani has improved a lot ! Its spicy and really tasty. Must try :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I read bad reviews before about this JP nagar joint (bannerghatta road) .. still expected it to be good. On a sunday evening, they said only one chicken biriyani and kebab is available! At 9 pm Sunday... rest of all the items are finished :D. Then they took 20 minutes to pack damn cool looking biriyani packets (pathetic taste!) ... in the description, they said .. it will include one leg piece and one thight ;-) piece of chicken ... ultimately with 2 packs of biriyani we got total 4 pieces of crap pieces ....:( Bill amount around Rs 360 (that's what i thought!) ... they said no no with taxes it's Rs 430 !!!!I said - give me a bill... the guy in counter typed a bill with Rs 360 ... and wrote IN HAND the rest of Rs 430 :D Crap experience ... no wonder people give such a horrible rating ... asking people to be aware and not go there ... it's a piece of shit!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered a Hyderabadi Ghosht Biryani and a kebab from them yesterday. A great call Center, greeted by a wonderful lady voice but the biryani was tasting like plastic and the kebabs were burnt..  Guys if you are listening all the bells as whistles are fine, but you screwup your simplest of simple menu with burnt food, instead of the biryani's disappearing your customers will
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I love their biriyani in comparison to Meghana or anywhere else. I think their service is exceptional, and it's great that they have home delivery.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I love the biryani here specially the Murg Hyderabadi Biryani and Murg Harimirch Biryani. Its made in true andhra style and are really spicy and yummy. I like the way they pack into a very travel friendly box when you take away or get it delivered at home. It makes for hassle free eating devoid of washing or cleaning plates. The portions are really nice and pieces are good unlike some places where they give you bad pieces. Really good worth for the money that we pay. Two thumbs up for this place!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have tasted biryanis at big restaurants and five star hotels but for me Ammi's Biryani is the best biryani i have eaten.Especially Mutton Shadi and Paneer Soya. Both taste simply out of this world. Long live Ammi's Biryani! Keep up the good work in serving great biryanis to the public. Ammi's Biryani is the best! If you want to eat delicious biryani then you should opt for this place only.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Totally out of the world.... All cold stored and heated in a micro.. All centralized food preparation , reheated in the outlet. Nothing more i can say but just one thing...Please DONOT go here. I am already feeling uneasiness..Waste of money. Worst food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Yes, terrible, unpleasant, formidable and what not. This place is no good. Few highlights:1. Cold Biriyani with no great taste.2. Warm packaged drinking water.3. Cold water in the finger bowl for rinsing oil dripping fingers. And, the lemon piece in that, keep fishing for that and you are lucky if you find one.Verdict : Visit this place if you wanna walk out frowning and fuming!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I am or rather I should say I was a regular customer of Ammi's Biryani and last Sunday i.e 13.04.2014 I ordered Chicken combo from HRBR outlet at 1:12 pm which was delivered after 4:30 pm. No one called me to inform about the delay. I called more than 15-20 times. Everytime I was told by the staff they will call back in 5 min and that 5 min never ended.I took the manager's number and called him to hear back an apology and that he would check and call back ASAP. After 10 min I had to call him to realize that the phone was made unreachable. Mr Naredra was the Manager.After waiting endlessly at last the delivery boy came just before 5 pm and I refused to pay the amount as per the norms that if the order is not delivered in one hour, its free of cost. The delivery boy pleaded that it will be deducted from his salary and at the end I had to pay for the terrible service as well.What a day.I just have to tell that they lost one customer and I will make sure the terrible service is spread to everyone I know.Giving poor rating and not awful as rest of the times, they have served on time. I wish the customer service skills were better and Managers would take the pain to call back and inform instead of hiding.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had tried ammi's at BEL road and never made me try them again. Years later home delivery from jalahalli cross branch proved me wrong. The speaker on call was quick n sweet enough to take down n give me enough info. The chicken biryani was spicy enough for this andhra  palate. Delivered within 30 mins and packing was impressive. Well packed in small neat containers and desert was something i din expect. Thumbs up from me n would surely return.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered a chicken biryani from RT nagar branch and I found the BILL inside the food container. I laughed and threw it away. Then I saw 2 cockroaches in the food. I took it back and threw it in front of them. But unfortunately there is no department of food sanitation in this country so I can't try and shut it down.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had been looking forward to visit this place, as i had passed by this location many times on my way to work, and so i did, on the night of 29th December 2010.I expected the place to have some of the best biriyanis, as they mainly specialize and serve only biriyanis and a few kebabs..:pbut i was shocked to taste some of the worst food that i have had my entire life...I visited the place with one of my friend, we both ordered a chicken biriyani each and a plate of chicken kebab, the service was quite prompt(guess everything was ready and the food was just heated as this place mainly deals in home deliveries) the portions looked quite filling, but the main deal starts when u taste a spoonful of the biriyani. The rice was quite dry and there was hardly any chicken in the biriyani. It lacked the basics of flavour, salt and even spice, frankly it was one of the really bad things i had ever eaten.Then things got worse when the kebabs had arrived, in front of us were lying 4 small morsels of what was once called a kebab. The taste was more pathetic, i felt they were made in the morning itself and they had also forgotten to reheat it. I would suggest them to either close down, or change their approach to the way things are done, or else they would have to close shop for good. And I would suggest that nobody goes there and neither places any order from there, you would be better off eating and any other small Mess or darshini than to waste your time, money and ruin your health by eating at such a place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: If you want to try out having some nice biryani then no doubt there are better options than this place. So think again ...Their home delivery service is not up-to the mark, and they are good at spamming your in-box.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: first time its good ,,, but when i ordered next time ... its really baddddd...i started hating biriyani...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A great option if you want express delivery and are hungry at 12 pm :) I've found the taste of the biriyani and quantity satisfactory. However, some menu items like Gosht zeera sambha biriyani and kabab items are never available in belandur. Plus quantity of boneless kabab is a bit less.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I wonder what will happen to me if there was no biryani.I just got in to Ammis yesterday. I would say, Biryani was fine if not very good. But what I loved the most was the service. In any regular outlet, you would not tip, but I was compelled to tip it for the excellent service.I eat spicier food, so I may expect a spicy variant of biryani :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i used to order food from different different restaurant in marathalli among all ammi biryani is one of the best in delivery of food.always in time and taste wise authentic .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Today I ordered from Ammi's biryani for the first time through their call centre and I experienced the worst home delivery service ever.They said it would take 70 minutes for the food to be delivered and it took 2 hours to do the same. In between I had to call their call centre 6-7 times. I ordered lunch and was served evening snacks. They did not even had the courtesy to call me in between if the order was getting delayed. Moreover, I feel that 70 min itself is too long to deliver food within 2.5 KM. The food was delivered cold, but the biryani tasted good.I have never experienced such inefficiency in home delivery.I will give 3 stars for the food but 1 star for the service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered for two chicken biryani's from ammi's biryani corner, marathahalli & they had given me a one day old spoiled biryani. It was stinking when i opened the box to eat. It was my last pathetic experience with ammi's & also they are masters in late delivery. Not at all recommended.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Food Â– (1/10)We had  (Dine in) Chicken Biryani (1/10)Mutton Biryani(1/10)Murg Kabab(5/10)Gosht Kabab(3/10)I have had ammiÂ’s biryani earlier it was great . Right now biryani it just coloured rice with pieces of meat.The only thing that is still good about the place is the sweet accompaniment.Decor - Comfortable seating, simple yet good decor (7/10)Service - Waiters need to be a lot more attentive ,takes quite an effort to get their attention . (0/10)Wallet- priced well.Overall Â– They were great , hope they improve. Ammi's has created a brand name hope they dont waste it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had been to their outlets before and for a place which specializes in biriyani they have had always fallen short of my expectations.With today visit they have hit an absolute low.Two of us visited their outlet for lunch ,our order was pretty non complicated ,a chicken and a mutton biriyani.1.The biriyani was almost cold ,maybe lightly warmed in a micro oven2.The rice looked dry and in need of some serious fix 3.They have added some almost raw masala paste(probably ginger garlic) to pep it up.The chicken was coated with same masala after being boiled and one can almost scoop out the same from the chicken. I am a die hard biriyani fan and it is difficult to displease me with a biriyani , but they have even managed to do that :-)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i am surprised by few negative blogs about the resturant, i had been with 4 friends and i feel the place is clean,service is excellent and the biryani is outstanding...it costed me Rs 100 for a chicken biryani which had 2 good pieces ,high quality basmathi rice..accomplishments like raita,brinjal curry and sweet ...what else more to expect....totally satisfied..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: An average biryani place serving average food.  The food doesn't disappoint and is  worth  visiting  once in a while. Been to the place  a couple of times and was satisfied with the service and the food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: DO NOT VISIT AMMIS BIRYANI...I FOUND A STAPLER PIN IN THE CHICKEN KABAB AND COMPLAINED TO THE CASHIER IMMEDIATELY. THE CASHIER WAS SO MEAN THAT HE DIDN'T EVEN BOTHER TO GIVE A REPLACEMENT AND TO MAKE THINGS WORSE HE EVEN CHARGED FOR THE DISH WITH STAPLER PIN! PATHETIC CUSTOMER SERVICE. DO NOT VISIT THIS PLACE!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Did I say it has got good value for money? No it hasnÂ’tÂ…If you wish to buy a nice pashmina swalÂ…you look for discounted price of a swal and not of a street side handkerchiefÂ… Basically AmmiÂ’s Biryani is no BiryaniÂ…So all what you pay in the name of Â“BiryaniÂ” is something that can only fill up your stomach. These guys came out with a deal in SnapdealÂ… Chicken Kabab + Chicken Biryani + Coke worth Rs 150/- Â… Good! But then after reading the reviews here I understood that eating here is going to become an assignmentÂ…and thank God! The package had a Coke and that cannot be screwed upÂ… Yesterday evening I went thereÂ…Kabab: I ordered for a boneless oneÂ…they delivered one with boneÂ…upon questioning they replied Â“Not AvailableÂ”Â…well it was 8:45 evening! The quality was no better than what you get on street side @Rs15-20/100grms!Biryani: Same horrible qualityÂ…the worst I have ever had in my lifetime! Even those you get in local Bars are better than what you get hereÂ…Coke: Even they managed to screw this up as wellÂ… Shamelessly they served me a warm Coke!Need I mention anything else? I wish I had donated the same amount to a child welfare society!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: well i was a bit sceptical entering ammi's since i'm a vegan and all my friends freak out chicken biryani's and wat not .,.,.,.i  wondered how the food will go down wit me ,,,now now after few trips to ammi's i'm an addict of the veg biryani their and most of our free periods  are filled in with ammi's biryani............
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: IÂ’m a big eater and that make my diet go haywire. Since I found this yummy joint here there is no looking back...I diet str4ictly and binge on weekends here ...true to its name...good food with great taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is with reference to my visit to Ammi's Biriyani Outlet,74-12 LIC Colony, Sector 11, Koodihalli Village, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore.Today,7th Sep 2013,I visited the above outlet of Ammi's Biriyani and this complaint is on the basis of the bitter experience from same.We ordered for Mutton combo Biriyani(260) and Gosht Hyderabadi Biriyani (200). First when the bill came, we were charged for one more Pepsi(40), which comes free with the combo. Later, the cost of pepsi was discounted based on the discussion with the waiter.We visited the outlet ,based on the offer in which they mentioned free biryani for orders between 4 pm-6.30 pm along with any two biriyanis.We ordered for two biryanis which costed total of Rs 485, but we were not given the free biriyani. We spoke to the store manager, Narayanan about the same and other staff and mentioned that we were not happy about same. He spoke to someone, whom he mentions as his manager and came back to us stating that this offer was only from Mon-Fri and today was Saturday and this offer is not valid, which really disappointed us from a reputed firm.We went through the advertisement  which was placed there,wherein nowhere it was mentioned that the offer was valid only during weekdays.We asked to write and confirm on the bill which they refused. Now,I am looking forward for a compensation from the company considering the fact that I wasted coming from M.G Road to Jeevan Bhima Nagar in car,which includes the petrol charge and also value of my time, as the company promotes false commitments and offers to customers.Kindly note there was no * mentioning conditions apply.Details of BillTIN no .29470614588Type:DinningOrder no 145657Bill no 220198Date 07/09/2013Table no 6Expecting the reply asap.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Okayish Biriyani, but you won't mind having a plate when you're hungry and lazy at the same time. They do deliver at your door, however the delivery is not very prompt. I have ordered more than twice, and they have managed to take more than an hour every time. The Chicken Kebab they serve is not really a Kebab but some chicken chunks in thick greenish gravy, which actually goes decently well with the Biriyani.The best part is that it is very cheap. I wouldn't expect city's best Biriyani at this price. Definitely worth a try, but not really for the Biriyani purists.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I decided to give Ammi's biryani a try today. I ordered a of Hyderabadi Gosht Biryani and Hyderabadi Keema biryani. The guy quickly called me up and told me that they don't have any of the fancy items on the menu but just 1 type of Hyderabadi Gosht Biryani.So I decided to order one family pack of the Hyderabadi Gosht Biryani.The guy took 1 hour 30 minutes to reach my home. And charged me Rs 534Despite being the family pack, the guy packed only 1 portion of Raita, Gravy and sweet. The taste of biryani was between bad and average. the rice was burnt, the mutton was hard and chewy and with no marination or spice.All in all it was a long wait and a horrible experience ... will never order again from these guys.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Horrible biryani and curry..

I had the biryani last week in my Paying guest accomodation near to this venue.

First time , I am trying this biryani.

Reasons- 

Biryani flavours are not in proportion and loads of oil floated with oil. Felt like had 500gms of empty ch

Raitha has a terrible stink and onions & curds were not fresh enough.

Gravy for sides are terrible, it tasted burnt with more hint of garlic and nothing else not a bite of onions or tomatoes.. soaked with oil OF COURSE
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I found 2 cockroaches in my food !!!! Besides the bill. I have photos if you like to see !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Tried their family pack and it was good. quantity was very good and the taste was good,nothing to complain.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had ordered biryani in December and I think it would be my last order from here. Biryani was tasteless rice were over cooked and of bad quality. There was hardly any chicken in the biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Visited this place several times for dining takeaway and for home delivery. Product was mostly good - except once when they home delivered a spoiled product it was replaced after much arguing with the manager. The biryani itself is good with its innovative tray which accommodates tissue& toothpicks and more impressively a cup for bones!!! My favourite recently has been...
More
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Akin to most Take-away/Delivery oriented restaurants they had an average ambience. Moreover the Biryani is sometimes dry for taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Not a ideal place for Briyani lovers.. These guys take the Briyani from one Box (may be freezer) keep it in the oven and then serve to the table.. You will not make out this initially but can find this within 5 mins since the taste turns different...
Briyani will have to served hot from the vessel and thats the speciality of any Briyani.. Ammis group have failed to know this main logic... I hope they soon correct themselves to sustain in this market..
Instead of paying hefty Rs.190/- to them  we have lot of other places in Blore who are serving exellent bryani at the same price and ofcourse with great ambience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic place to have food. My first experience is worst. after placing the order have waited to 1 hour without any response. when i called them to check on the order there comes the highlight order was not even placed. What they claim as 45 min delivery or your food is free is all cheating the customer. they were ready to provide the food with 20% discount BUT not for what i have ordered. NOT sure what happened to their claim in papers. it will be their choice. reason behind is sunday. Oh god great to know that these bunch of jokers have found out today is sunday. my initial call was at 12:15 PM. I am not sure whether we have to place the order a day prior. Pathetic guys NOT FIT FOR ONLINE SERVICE and WORST CUSTOMER SUPPORT. NEVER TRUST THIS GUYS. Ad in the papers are just to cheat the customer.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biryanis are good. Can have here. Need little improvisation. Kebab is good. Ambiance is like some local hotel . Can work on the ambiance too.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good veg biriyani. Liked the way the food was packed and delivered before time. Food was fresh and hot. The quantity was perfect ðŸ‘ŒðŸ½. The raitha was sufficient and fresh too.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nice packaging, good delivery, looks hygeinic but biryani taste not as good as Behrouz, Nagas,Biryani kitchen etc. Better options available at little premium.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered an Executive Veg Biriyani from Food Panda from this outlet.

Major attraction is the packing provided. Biriyani was not bad for the price paid and the quantity provided is also decent.

The speed of delivery is good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani ,........ Chicken Biryani not bad not good it's average ,... Need to improve your quality of food ..... .. .. . . .
. .

.
.....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I don't know why this biriyani even exists??
I wish Zomatoe had 0 star option!! Everything is bad about this AMMI'S biriyani, the price, the staff ,the taste....
The worst of the worst. I wish Karnataka high court puts ban of this Ammi's biriyani.
Never ever go to this place. NEVER EVER.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had delivery of biryani and chichken curry.
Biryani was okay okay but the curry is tooo bad to have
not impressed with their tasta and quantity
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had biryanis ordered at my friend's place this weekend - The Home delivery was quick , the food was delivered in 25 minutes and the quality of the food is quite acceptable. The Chicken Hyderabadi Biryani had good flavours and not too much of spices. A biryani that kids also can eat. Nice packing. One can order them once in a while!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic... The delivery was delay by 15 mins giving stating that delivery boy met with an accident and came back to get fresh biryani.. However the biryani that I got was cold on top of it as always there was no extra raita.. everytime thay forget..ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜‘
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Yesterday I ordered from Ammi's Biryani.... Biryani was good as usual but the service was pathetic... It came almost after 1 and half hours and they didn't send msg also of delivery person number so that we can contact twice I had to call to it restaurant to track down my order.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Great ambiance, courteous staffs.. But no great food.
Average Biryani.. Highly hyped .
Guys please work on your Biryani, it can be improved to much higher level
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The place is elegantly done up.. Nice interiors and friendly staff...
However the biryani-tried both chicken and mutton biryani doesn't live up to the hype of the name...have tasted better.
Tried the shaadi ki biryani too... Other dampener...
Serious ground work recommended on the taste factor to be done guys... For the branding and reach you have for yourself please relaunch with a better chef
Parking limited
Meal for 2 costs Rs 400/-
Please avoid
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had a really bad experience with ammis biryani. Had ordered food for a party - first my husband got inaccurate info/ help about quantities - as a result we over ordered by large margins.

But the worst was the chicken biryani was bad - it was smelling even a cple hours after we received it! We were severely embarrassed in front of our guests, and had to throw away all packets (we had ordered 31 packets of biryani!)

When we complained to the folks, we were told that the food has to be xo aimed within an hour of ordering!!!

Very very disappointed
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Bad! I ordered online and they took almost 3 hrs for delivery! Improve your online services.
Or better avoid taking orders if you are not able to take care of the delivery
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ideal place to visit,If you are feeling too hungry or want to avoid waiting time at restaurant. Food serve here is very fast. The executive chicken biryani is good for Rs 130. Sometime just enjoy the food instead of cribbing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very sober biryani...nating special as of...just another biryani taste..packaging is neat and clean..delivery is on time as of another biryani joints...my fav s kulhar firni..must try it s..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We generally order or get a take away from here. Ambience not that good but the biryani tastes like every other ammis biryani that is present in other outlets in bangalore
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: They provide good home delivery of biriyani. Packaging is good. Food is standard. I have had this for many times as mess food is not good in iisc campus. You can order, won't regret.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The chiken biryani was pathetic and stinking sour . Never expected this for 200 rs of biryani from such a renowned food chain. Never going to order again from ammi's
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I cancelled the order because they didn't deliver my order at estimated time .. I placed order at 1:42 pm and I waited for it up to 3:30 pm, I didn't get so cancelled ..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Its a nice biryani place but a very sober style...!!!! I prefer ds at some times not a definitely bad place to try..!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

sakhiravoordiaries.wordpress.com
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Most horrible experience one can have !!!, Initially delivery time itself was 1 hour late and post that also person didn't deliver on time... came with a delay of 30mins from the delivery time and that too incorrect order.... One cannot call back to 3945 7777 after 11:00P.M..... Delivery boy said to correct the order and again got call after 30mins saying we cannot deliver the order.... Now 12:00 midnight better to cook !!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's Biriani comes in a beautiful box containing the Biryani along with Raita and Curry. The delivery is on time and clean. Food are packed in a spill proof container. However, the presentation doesn't match upto the taste. The box of food we got delivered had Biriyani, which tested being cooked by a novice than an expert chef. It's hard to make out which style of Biriyani it was. It lacked the aroma and taste of spices, with the chicken pieces being overcooked to feel like a hard rock. The Raita had very bad quality Curd, which cannot be ingested. However, the food were better in quality and quantity during dine-in than delivery. They have very small place for dine-in though, which is by the side of the road, easy to locate with adequate parking facility on the service road.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammis biriyani.. Was one of my favorite before.
Hoping it would be the same..I ordered a mutton biriyani and gulab jamoon last afternoon ... And I was disappointed for the following reasons
1. The food arrived late by 30 minutes.
2.Food portions were small for the price paid
3.The pieces were soaked in a gravy which was overpowered by the pungent dry spice mixture..
4.I was looking for a the jeera samba option but not available .
5.Raita was very watery.
6.The gravy in the meat was more than the rice served.. I hardly found any rice..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: BIG NO FOR HOME DELIVERY. i returned my order after waiting for 75 mins, hope they use that money to improve there service. This guys took 45 mins to travel 3kms on a highway. Seeing 2.0 rating i should had guessed it, my mistake. Will never recommend it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered chicken biryani. Average taste, will not recommend anyone to order.
An extra 0.5 rating for the packaging. 
Do not get attracted with the discount options as the food is average, try other options in this area serving much better biryani.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good in many ways, quantity and quality is at par with the best, but please extend your delivery reach towards HAL quartress and surrounding areas
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I am giving 1 star because I cannot give less than that. I wished to give a 0 point. I placed an order at 9:11 today and the order was supposed to be delivered at 10:16. I received the order at 11:24.
The restaurant kept on giving me the number of delivery boy which was switched off or not reachable most of the times.
The food was delivered completely cold as frozen.
Highly disappointed in the restaurant.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I just ordered chicken thallasery biryani from here which was worth 199 but the quantity was so not worthy of the money. Delivery time was about 15 mins as i stay nearby but i am seriously disappointed at the quantity. You get 3 pieces of chicken but the quantity of rice for 199 bucks was way too less. On the contrary Biryani was tasty, less spicy. But seriously I don't think I'd order from this place again. Maybe I'll go to the outlet and check if they provide the same quantity.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered Hyderabad biryani, it was good in taste. Not really spicy. Also, I had dum chicken chettinad as starter. The food was nicely packed. Only thing which I didn't like was raitha, it dint seem the curd was fresh.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
have ordered from this place..3 biryanis.
the biryani was too bad..
veg biryani was the only thing we could eat as the other two non veg biryani tatsed realy bad ..some weird oil taste..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The chicken sheekh kebab is just too good here. We usually take parcels from here and everyone loves it. Its just amazingly delicious and im never tired of eating them. The service is fast so we dont get to wait much.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very poor. The biryani was vert very poor. The rice were so cold that you could have felt the crunch of the rice.ordered tge first time and Really disappointed
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
If you want to know how the worst Biryani tastes.. This is the place to go!!
Last time I had Ammis Biryani almost 3-4 yrs back, it was one of the worst Biryani which I had at that time!! Recently, thought of trying it again, thinking they would have changed... But it turned out to be worse than earlier experience!!
Had Spicy Andhra Biryani.. I think they don't know the meaning of spicy! Payed 200 bucks for just 2 small piece of chicken, and 100gms of white rice!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Taste was really good. But the quantity was little less . worth for the pay and service time was really good. Just increase the quantity if possible :-P
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Wish I could give zero star. Had ordered two murg hyderabadi biriyani and was really disappointed to see the quantity.It's like half plate and they are charging rs200 for this. The taste was not at all good and the biriyani had only one small piece chicken . ll never order from ammi's again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have ordered from here through food panda. Their customer service is quite good, you get a message from them with the estimated time of delivery and the delivery is quite prompt. The biriyani is decent and comes in nice packaging. Had ordered some sweet also which seemed to be stale.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have ordered from this place a couple of times now. One can hardly complain about their packing and delivery time. The Biryani was not very good but was decent. The quantity could have been more for the price.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I have ordered from Ammi's Biryani quite a few times just for the reason that delivery doesn't take much time compared to some other placed listed on Swiggy.

But the chicken biryani is just average, given the hype this place has for its biryanis. Though the packaging of food is good and they have a decent service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Went here to the Marathlli branch with one of my visiting friend from Hyd, which is the place for biryanis. We wanted to try this against his exp of real hyd biryanis and I must tell you that Ammiâ€™s did not disappoint. I had the Veg stuff and he the chicken bith were done splendidly. The only thing we were not comfortable with was the ambience, the light was not working in many places, the tables were not cleaned and the place looked a mess. I can understand that it is more of a takeaway place. Full marks to theor biryani though.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Best thing I like about Ammi's Biriyani is best food delivered to you in a nice concept box packing.
This cold Friday night I have called them to deliver me a gosht hyderabadi Biriyani and they delivered to me before time. The aroma of Biriyani just blown me away the very moment I opened the box. Nice flakes of fried onions with cilantro leafs on nicely marinated and colored basmati rice is sufficient enough to water your mouth. Then comes the show stopper gosht pieces, I was amused to see 5 pieces of big sized meat in the plate. Nicely cooked soft tender and smelling really amazing piece of meat. The meat reminds me meat dishes from my hometown and that feeling is really amazing. Pretty much satisfied with the food and will rate a 4 for them for overall experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Never ever order from this place where everything is stale and smelly. They started the chain but now seems lost in the crowd. Avoid anything from here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
We ordered online using zomato's online service last night. The delivery was super fast and the taste was amazing. Got a cash back of 20% using Paytm wallet.
I love it when biryani is not too spicy and it doesn't stuff U because U end up drinking lot of water. That was the best thing, the biryani was light good in quantity and had amazing amount of fried onions. The side gravy and minty dahi was also great.
Overall one of good places to have authentic biryani.
Service was also great..!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had a mutton and chicken biryani few days back.  The quantity and packing was classy.  However, the quality of food was far from satisfactory.  The accompaniments were also not great....brinjal curry and white chutney !  Don't know how white chutney was paired.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Please do not go for Ammis Biriyani....very very worst food i have ever had....very poor service....Once i ordered for home delivery...they delivered after 2 hrs & Payasam served with food was already spoilt and lost its edibility.Do not prefer AMMIS...had   very bad experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic delivery. They are completely irresponsible.... They will delay the order for no reason... for me they gave the reason the phone is not reachable. Pathetic excuse.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Taste is totally different from others & I loved it. But now in a days I'm not happy about taste & it's continue degrading.
Meanwhile you guys increased the price & we're getting less quantity.
Please back to your own track. I hope you guys short out the issue.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Wen i was a new bee to bangalore , i loved ammis biriyani n used to order often. But then the quality of the biriyani started degrading n stopped ordering from there completely . Today i felt to giv it a try again , but was really disappointed with the quality and n will never order from there again . The biriyani was just heated in the oven n wen it reached it was cold . the raita or chutney i cudnt touch it bcoz of it sourness.The chicken pieces in d biriyani was very bad .Overall it was a complete disaster !
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: When the cook doesn't come and you're forced to fend off on your own, Ammi's will sometimes come to your mind.The biryani quantity is ginormous but taste-wise is okay.You need a side dish to make up your taste buds but here the quantity is miniscule and you're left a bit frustrated.So all in all it evens out and you're left with a decent value for money meal.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered murgh executive biryani combo...came with murgh executive biryani.. aam panna n Guntur kabab... delivery was on time..the person was very polite..the food was packed properly.. no spillage.. they when informed me wen d food was goin to be late..thanks for that :)
Coming to the food..it was pretty average..the kabab was more like pieces of chicken picked up from the curry...the biryani had good pieces..the amount was ok compared to the price..enough for 1 person..aam panna was wonderful...over all an ok place fr affordable biryani..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: biryani was not bad, not spicy though, but taste was good. we went to the place.service was slow,he took soo long for billing too. Overall, a nice place to have a quick bite, they have this executive biryani which serves 1
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: once a upon a time i use like this resutrant in home delivery but this has become a waste restrurant.. i hav order 2biriyani s paid online and they didnt give the delivery.. whole night i was hungry and they ddnt even refund me the money.. so guys never trust this AMMI'S RESTRURANT.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had rated 3+ in my last review but have turned it down bcos of their reckless behavior.

Had ordered executive biriyani and Achari chicken at 7.30 pm and it reached my house at 9.30 pm after going to a wrong address. Food was not hot and it was complete waste of money. No one took responsibility and as a customer I have to pay the entire cost for eating something that wasn't worth. Feeling sick ðŸ˜¡

Wanted a quick dinner so went ahead with Ammis last night. Took an executive chicken biriyani (costed INR 112) through Zomato. Came Neatly packed and delivered by a last mile delivery service. Nothing much to rave about. Chicken pieces were nicely cooked and overall it was good but not great.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hyderabadi murg biriyani taste is average...don't expect too much...the sweet item they give with biriyani is nice but taste wise the biriyani is average....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst biriyani I have ever seen and tasted ... Total money got wasted ... Had to through the biriyanis into dustbin. Very bad very very bad rating should be in -ve
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
we had ordered hyderabad chicken biryani & executive chicken biryani at R.T nagar branch, it was getting very bad smell & it was expired already, so we returned back that order & was refunded.

BETTER  TAKE CARE
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Giving single star as there is no way to give zero.
Pathetic service and more than two hours to deliver to a place less than 5km away. Cold biryani delivered with sweet spilled over inside the box and that too without any curd/raita. Placed the order at 8:30.
After complaint to the store, they promised to replace the order which never arrived till night 11:30.
Never dare to order again!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The review is based on online order. 
We had ordered Executive chicken biryani combo that comes along with guntur chicken and some nimbu pani .  
I really appreciate that they delivered in like 30 mins when they had an ETA of 1 h  and the packaging of food was real good. 

I have already added the pics of the food, it was nothing special. If you have eaten biryani from other authentic places like me then you would definitely wont like ammi's biryani. Its not even close to authentic biryani , quantity was very less and pieces of chicken were tiny. Guntur chicken was just okay and nimbu pani was the only thing I liked , but you cant ever go wrong with nimbu pani right,
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biryani here is pretty average. Not spicy and normal quality. Their service at restaurant is not up to the mark. Prefer home delivery for eating.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I wish I could have given it a negative ranking..... I ordered for a veg side dish and I get a non veg instead and when I ask for the money back on the side dish they argue.... Worst service ever.....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have tried biriyanis from various restaurants but this restaurant serves biriyani of very inferior quality , i was poorer by fewer bucks i will not recommend any of my friends.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered in online , got it after 1.5 hrs !!!!! Taste is good but you cant wait till it arrive to your place. Package is not good , curry and raita all are open n leaked in the cover. Worst services ever I seen on delivery.... Only thing is taste is little good .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: For office party we were looking for some pocket friendly feast. And then someone suggested Ammi s Biryani. We ordered 7 portions of Murgh Hyderabad biryani along with sides including sheekh kebab and boneless chicken kebab. Biryani portion was enough for 1 people and other things like salan and sweet too was apt. Servicing and packing was minute. Overall good biryani with little more spicy as a cons.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We had ordered veg Hyderabadi and Chicken hyderabadi biryani along with chicken kabab... Tasted too good.... Packaging was impressive also the delivery was quick... Were also served with phirni along with biryani... I just wish there were more pieces of Chicken per plate of biryani ;)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place sucks,

Starts from here, when we went to counter to place our order, cashier acted as if she is busy in something. Actually she was talking some relative in the call.

After the oder, we sat for an 30mins to get our food served. All employees were free and they were simply talking.
 When we asked, they replied food is getting prepared. Once we get the order, here comes the actual story. food was bad, as if it was prepared in the morning just they just baked it again. 
and the quantity - they severed 1 biriyami to 2 ppl. and yes other items like boneless chicken, dry chicken were reasonable.
Food quality - 1.5
Food quantity - 1.0
Hospitality - 0.0
Definitely This is worst place for Dine in.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The ammis Biriyani have their own style and taste in the food or be it in their executive packaging. This place is definitely a big no for dine in, ambience was quite bad. But the jeera Biriyani both mutton and chicken stood out for me. If you love ambur style Biriyani then you should try their jeeragasamba Biriyani. The rest of the menu...........never mind.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Really bad service...takes atleast 2 hours to deliver an order...and after such a long wait you will get cold food with spilled curry. Management have no protocol or apologetic behaviour about there bad service.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had ordered chicken biriyani & guntur chicken. Biriyani was OK, but not worth the money considering quantity and taste. Guntur chicken was good and worth the money, but not hot/ spicy enough for guntur chicken...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst service,, Ordered Food and never received. No one is receiving calls. No help , not suggested  for any one who does not want to keep calling .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Big biriyani fan myself. Had heard a lot of good reviews about this restaurant chain. But this place is kind of a letdown. Having tried the biriyani out already once at one of its other branches and liked it, I gave it another go only to be disappointed this time. The spices had formed lumps and did not mix evenly in the rice making the already overspiced biriyani inedible. Raita was watery. The chicken pieces tasted ok compared to the biriyani, which was all we could get out of our money's worth, and the sweet. Hope the quality is not the same in the other branches.
Would definitely not recommend to others if they dont wanna ruin their tastebuds.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Don't order. We ordered food and it came after 2 hours. Called after 1 hour and got response that delivery boy has already left which he did not (talked to delivery guy). Food arrived further one hour later. I live 5 min from the hotel. The food was cold and taste was not good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Several times ordered food from here, it tastes good. Tried egg biryani and chicken hydrabadi biryani, Rice taste for both is same just they add chicken pieces in it.
Don't ever order aaloo bookhar, it tastes horrible. Reduced 3 star for delivery delay, every time I call customer care they gave same reason of technical prob is going on,delivery is very pathetic
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Never order anything from them. Their home delivery is pathetic. I had ordered one and a half hour ago,but still my order is not dispatched. It's just one chicken biryani for which they are taking so much time.

I made a mistake of ordering from them once again. Now it's been 2 and a half hours, my order hasn't been delivered. I guess they will not be delivering my order to me today. Their customer support is also not good. If you call them,they'll say they will sort this in few minutes but then after that they don't answer your call. They lack professionalism. I have learnt the lesson twice. I am never going to order online from them ever.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Orders home delivery from this place. Haleem and chicken biryani. They delivered after an hour. First of all, the quantity was meagre. Second of all, it was freakin rotten! It smelled so bad that I had to throw the entire thing away. I tried calling their customer care number, but could not connect because "all representatives were busy". Horrible experience!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Biryani is good , After drinks i used to order its biryani  from food panda with 50% off .I am waiting for the similar offer . Please give us some offer so that i can order again
9916607915
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Not a big fan of Biryani myself but wanted to try this as heard a lot about it.

The portion was good but it was tooo spicey to eat. Kababs were ok. Paneer birayaani was over spiced though already told them to keep mild spicey. Veg Biryani was ok.

Why they give combos when they don't want to keep the quality. Raita came with Biryani was horrible so is the salan. Really need to work on quality of food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Have ordered twice, no issue with delivery. However, it gives a bad aroma of cooked and heated before packing. Won't be on my list in future.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: My good experience outside. With my friend ordered vegetable Hyderabadi. Awesome briyani after longtime. Aam panna with combo was a good addition. Good recommend for veggies. Have to try in hotel for a better experience atleats once.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Taste of the Briyani good. Especially the kebab yummy. Quantity suffice. Delivery by time Nd decent experience all the way. Myself chicken and my friend veggie both ordered respective Briyani and both of them where good. Combo not so worthy.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We had this discount coupons through sodexo ..so we went out to try ammi's biryani .... It was not all good ... Even the service isnt good ... Overall no go for you folks ... As there are many far better places to have biryani arround this area...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Worst service and worst biryani. My wife had ordered the biryani and kabab from them two weeks ago.

The order was placed via food panda. The delivery took 2.5 hours in afternoon and that too after multiple arguments and repeated calls to their call centre and managers of Ammis biryani outlets. They kept on issuing different order no with different outlet for delivery and no one had any clue. It went from marathalli, varthur and back to Marathalli. It was test of patience for my kid who was waiting to taste the food.

Finally food arrives and guess what. Cold biryani with no taste and highly spiced. Kabab looked like coming from frozen chamber. Will never order and food from Ammi's biryani. Pathetic service, worst food and full of unprofessional staff.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I am 100% true biryani lover. I have tasted all possible special biryanis around my area. Ammis biryani was the worst of it. No taste at all. You won't even get a feel of eating biryani. This review is for their special biryani which I ordered, god knows how other biryanis tastes.
Cannot risk ordering again. I won't recommend anyone to go there or order from them.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I used to like their biryani.
But, of late they are not consistent in quality.
Sometimes its quite spicy and sometimes its ok.
Could be better if they make it little mild.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The Biryani is normal its not that great it tastes bad. For home delivery they took 2 hrs & all the things were cold & greeting wet overall experience with them is bad they don't have good customer service
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Worst environment with flies all over. My dish had some kind of small insects too. Starters quantity was very less and not worth the amount. The waiter took 20 minutes to deliver and didn't even bother to serve water first. Bad experience. Should never visit again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Good food.. Good order takers.. Specially Narendra, he always welcomed you with a smiling face and help you with fast delivery.. Also he will help you go to through the menu.. ?
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Terrible if ur ordering at home. They spend 20 min to take the order n after confirming that they have my address, say they won't deliver n have stopped covering my area. Why don't u just shut down Ammi's. Stop wasting people's time.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Im not gonna order from this place again in my life. Late delivery, no response, terrible horrible experience !!!

Plz be aware before you place an order next time !!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Being a Fan of Briyanis I used to try different varieties of Ammi's Biriyanis from different outlets. I found it quite tasty, and the service was decent and quick.  Will visit again for sure!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: They never deliver on time, with less quantity, poor quality of chicken and they are increasing the price on daily basis, it's absolutely not worth it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
So I don't get the point of this place. There are currently 65 reviews on Zomato for this place . And almost every one of it is rated 1 or 2.  And for good reason. !!

The outlet is 15 minutes from my place. I placed an order at 2PM. I got a message that it'll be delivered at 2.30PM. I wait another 1 hour for the food or the phone call. 
And at 3.50PM I get a call form the delivery guy that he's just left from the place and asking to confirm the address. 

And just like the other 65 reviews, I guess even I am going to get a reply from you guys that you regret the inconveniece caused. Extremely horrible service. !!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This place is really close to my house, I Love the biryani at this place, we get really tastyy chicken and mutton biryani at ammia biryani. And i suggest everyone to taste the biryani at this place
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: So so disappointed. Extremely dry and flavourless biryani. All this publicity raised my expectations but I was just left with a hungry, sad tummy. I can cook better biryani ?
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Being a super fan of Chicken Biryani, I tried my hands on Ammi's Biryani. Except the packaging, nothing was good in this. The rice was dry, and chicken pieces were hard and super dry which were not at all eatable. I started eating and could not eat more and at the end I had to throw away more than half of the biryani and chicken. It hurted me not for the money that I lost but for the food that I had to throw and specially for the chicken who died for me and whose sacrifice went in vain. :(
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Decent biriyani with a decent price. Seating place is limited. Service is good. But there are better options. Available in the area for Andhra biryanis.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very prompt home delivery in my opinion . The quality of the rice is pretty decent and the packaging is good , must try the chicken biryani combo .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Thanks to my roommate, I tried this biryani a couple of times when I was new in Bangalore. Of course, I didn't to try it again after those two attempts. 

Talking about the biryani, they don't seem to use basmati variety, rather it's a very ordinary quality rice. Chicken pieces were dry, nowhere close to what you get in a biryani, they weren't undercooked though. The rice lacked any biryani flavour and spices. We ordered for home delivery and fortunately (or rather unfortunately) they didn't do a blunder there. 

Advice - Don't go by the cover photograph they've put up in this page, this biryani is a definite miss if you're in Bangalore. All those marketing stints don't ensure a good biryani. I'm not sure if this is 1.0 or 2.0, but I don't want to try it once more just for that. I'm done with "Ammy's biryani"!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Impressed with their tag line( when hungry eat some thing good )
I ordered biryani here and was quite shocked with the quantity they provided as any primary school kid will still be hungry after having the biryani.

1.Its not a hyderabad biryani 
2.Its more of a home made biryani which you will get in most of your Muslim friends home.
3.The gravy and raitha for the biryani was so thin like water with no taste.
4.The rice and chicken pieces were cold and stale.

Bottom line :

Jab Hungry!

Kuch Accha Khao! (Definitely not in Ammi's !!)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Bad is what describes it in a word.
We ordered 2 veg. starters both of which looked and tasted like some cheap subjis (meaning main course accompaniment) from some 3rd grade eatery. Portion size was phatetic. Veg biryani was so-so, Raita, gravy etc given along with the biryani were all sorry excuses of whatever they were supposed to be. Doubt if we'll order again. If you forced us to think of any positives - packaging would be it. But then who cares about the packaging when the food inside is junk?!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Looking at all the promotions and ads for Ammi's biryani, I finally ordered chicken biryani for home delivery. The packaging also looked promising. However, the goods were useless. The chicken pieces were dry and so was the rice. More than that it was bland and flavorless. With so many biryani options in Bangalore, Ammis is a definite miss!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Anmis biryani is one of the widest grown restaurant chain in Bangalore. So I went to the marathalli centre without giving second thought. I took chicken biryani to be risk free.
However I found biryani rice was cold and stale. Chicken was found to be one day old. I could not finish the biryani and went out of restaurant to find other place to refresh my taste bud and mood.
I hope they will improve and keep the name of ammis biryani in near future
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Better to close this branch as they have served worst food many times as per the reviews below. Yesterday we ordered a combo + ordinay hyderabadi chicken biryani costing us Rs.433. After opening the pack i felt the chicken was smelling bad then seperated the chicken and tasted the rice which was awful in taste. Called the representative for complaint they say they will replace the food, where the one i paid was very bad how could i expect the replacement will be fine. Told that no need of replacement and this will be last order that i have made to Ammi's. Batch code was - 3FA-1. There is no minus rating for me to provide.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Acc. to me this is not a biriyani since i have tasted varieties of biriyanis across south india.Cannot be compared with Ambur or hyderabadi style biriyanis.Better trying with other biriyani spexialists.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Late delivery and bad ethics. The delivery boy promised to return the change in 15 min and we had to wait 2 hours and 5 phone calls to the store to get our money back.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
It was by far the worst Dinner/biryani experience I have had in my life. We had ordered 2 Executive Veg Biryani and one Chicken Family pack. We opened the Beg Biryani and it was competely spoiled with a bad odour coming from it. We called the store and got it replaced after a while we opened the Chicken biryani and even that turned out to be bad. We could not do anything as it was already well past 12 in the night.

One the money spent on the biryani turned out to be completely waste and on top of that the time wasted and the overall experience was pathetic.

If you cant serve good and healthy food dont open stores in every nook and corner of the city.

Ohh Crap I cant rate them ZERO here. so Giving them 1.0
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
i was a bit miss guided by the previous reviews...still i took a chance to oder biriyani....n it wasnt dat bad......
good packing...wid raita n one sweet...
rice was fine...
can gave sometime...ok ok....
nothng extraordinary...but not even very bad...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had a sodexo offer so came here even though It had bad reviews.. And ya those reviews are true,, very true.. It was a bad experience altogether.. Ambience was not good, AC was not working and there was a wash basin but no water supply. Comin to d food, Hyderbadi chicken briyani tasted avg, certainly not worth the money! Give it a miss!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We were hunting for a restaurant after a late night movie. Luckily this one was open. We didn't have much of options coz they were also wrapping up by then so we settled for whatever was available then i.e Hyderabadi chic biryani. Packed it. But wasn't very sure about it. But to our surprise it tasted great a lil spicy though but pretty good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very good biryani and reasonable rate ..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Somedays there biryani is good, other days it seems like rice mixed with boiled chicken. They have less staff and weekends they delay in home delivery. It's an average biryani .

Update: I increased there rating because they respond and least care about there customer views.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had Hyderabadi biryani two times.. 1st time a dine-in and 2nd time take-away, both the time I think that the quantity of the rice is a bit less. Thanks to ammi's that they accept sodexo coupons where on buying 2 I got another one for free, so that it satisfied for two person.
Hence if you are a foodie then with one plate is might not enough for you. And I think that ammi's will be looking to it and increase the quantity a bit more.
Rest all are good, starting from packaging for take away to quality in dine-in.
So if you want to have varieties of biryani at cheapest price do once check out this place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Truth is i struggle to provide feedback and here is why. Tried the hydrabadi mutton biryani, it was more like ghee rice, hardly a piece of flesh in the order and you had to dig through the whole aluminium plate to dig this one out. So you recognise the predicament, while the rice was good basmati and had nice smell. The flavour was average and mildly spiced.

The box is also contains watery raita, mirchi ka salan and kheer, Frankly was not palatable.

Its amazing how they have got it wrong, ammis spend a ton of money on the packaging, accompaniment and delivery..but miss out on the centre piece BIRYANI!! Thats why you guys are in the business??
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very bad service. Ordered 7up which was mentioned in the bill, but Pepsi was delivered. When i called them up, they said that they would replace it as soon as possible which didn't happen. It took 25 mins to deliver the order and for replacing (which didn't happen by the way)  i didn't get any info or call from any one of them. After i called again after an hour, they said that they were unaware of the such incident. I had a talk with one of their managers the last time such kind of situation happened, where i was assured that such scenario wouldn't arise in the future.  By the way, this was the fifth time such an incident occurred. NEVER GOING TO ORDER FROM THEM ANYMORE. PATHETIC.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is to biryani what dominoâ€™s is to pizza - piping hot delights in a cardboard box which arrives promptly. Visited their outlet in Marathahalli too, nothing much to write home about there, simple and fuss-free. Of course a place titled like this has a very limited menu. Their biriyani was satisfactory in taste and portions.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Your mileage may vary but I had some really bad experiences with this chain. My first experience with them was about 3years back in RT Nagar but sadly I seem to be forgetful, and I paid for it that's all I would say.
I got a biryani delivered to my home this time. The food comes promptly on time and the staff is very courteous, even the packaging and presentation is excellent but the biryani is best defined awful. It's so dry from the first spoon you want to throw it away, there is a lot of meat in it and that's the only reason you should buy it if you ever will. There is a small plate of Salad with it and some tomato curry both mediocre.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Got a Chicken Hyderabadi Biryani home deliver for lunch, Packing was awesome one of the best i have seen yet.
Taste wise it was fine the rice was well cooked the chicken was fresh and tender, But tastewise something missing was not getting that Hyderabadi wala dum some taste expert might suggest what is lacking.

But overall was happy :)
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The biriyani in Ammi in ok..just above average
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Orederd Ammi's egg biriyani today and must say the packaging was awesome..so the first impression goes fine. With curd,curry,sweet,biriyani properly,packed in..with napkins,spoon and toothpick....the biriyani also tasted good.....the only grudge I had was the late delivery(almost 1 hr) ,and the point to note is we live just nearby ammis..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not worth the money. Poor brand.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Service - Very Bad .. stay away
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Best Hyderabadi Mutton Biriyani in town. I always order the family pack online.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I ordered for Chicken Biryani Family Pack at 1:10 PM, order No. 20721, its 2:30 PM, the delivery is not yet done. I was told at the time of placing order that delivery will be done within 50 minutes. Is this your service? I need to eat for lunch or are you delivering for dinner? Very poor service. You must close your outlet and spare the customers.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place is just a overshow of branding. As obvious by the name, they serve biriyani and some side stuff.
I wont prefer about their biriyani, because what they serve in the name of biriyani, is NOT called biriyani, i better call it chicken curry mixed with rice. Seriously man, what pathetic biriyani it is, if you compare it with even the worst of the places which specialize in biriyani. They serve some non-needed sweet alongwith it which tastes good after shock of eating biriyani. Seriously guys, rather than concentrating on opening more outlets and serving decorated carton packs having pathetic food inside it, just re-engineer your biriyani recipe.
Until you want to eat rice-curry mixed on the name of biriyani for a good lunch mood, It is NOT RECOMMENDED.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Biriyani with a different taste. It was okay. Chicken boneless starters are also okay. overall nearby average.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Delicious food . Packaging is great and service is good .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Too costly and not worth it...
Biryani is sweet... and suxx..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very costly and sweet biriyani.....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Any spicy loves out there, this is a place you need to avoid at any cost. Biryani here is sweet (!!!!!) and pathetic. Some positives - cleanliness and service. This is a big NO for me.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Yesterday I ordered so called famous biryani of ammi's. And I was more than just disappointed, pathetic biryani.. Anyone in marathahallli location try biryani zone, its 100 times better than ammi's
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Decent Mutton Biryani. Consistent. I have tried it more than 2 times. Raita and Saalan are very badly made.
I wish they made better accomplishments
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The quantity of biryani served is dismal. They actually keep biryani prepared beforehand and microwave it before it ends on your table (The fellow actually removed a prepackaged pack of biryani from a fridge and heated it before getting it to us). So no hopes of freshness in the food. The pricing is also pretty steep considering the fact that the amount is so less to being with. The Murg biryani is pretty decent in terms of taste and the Subzi biryani leans towards the spicier side. Order only when you are outta food at home and feeling too lazy to go out.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Not recommended for biryani lovers.

The biryani available here is much below average when you compare with the other biryani's available in bangalore. Ordered a Murg hyderbadi biryani,firstly the pricing is on the higher side.
Do not get fooled by their menu card which reads 150/- for the chicken biryani,they charge another 35/- as tax.So a total of 185/- is simply not worth it.
The biryani itself is tasteless.The rice and chicken pieces are dry and the color itself looks awkward and it was dead cold,atleast they could have heated it before handing it over.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
tastier biriyani's are available in the city..... the biriyani here is just average...tastes artificial....
And dont even get me to the starters.. half of them tastes refrigerated and no flavor..... i suggest to keep this place as an last option if you are in a mood to eat a sumptuous dinner or lunch..

on the other hand.. their style of take aways are really good.. they pack it pizza like boxes which are ergonomically good and easy to take away and stays hot for long.. that is one positive aspect....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I'm not that good fan of biryani. However for our team celebration we have decided to order food from Ammi's. It was nicly packed. However only non veg biryani turned out to be good and veg biryani was not at all good. I hate it actually. Not sure how they have prepared it.

If you planning to have veg biryani.. its not the right place for sure.

Mutton & chicken biryani is fine. Moreover they wont accept credit cards that was also a big disappointment for me. Our bill was aronnd 8k and we had to pay cash. I think they should start accepting the credit cards for home delivery. It would a good trun out for them as well.

Over all it was fine.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: From outside, if you have high hopes they will be dashed. The setting is bad, the interiors no frills. I could still live with that, except, the biryani, was laughably bad. I ordered the chicken hyderabadi biryani. What i got was 3 small pieces of boned chicken, literally bite sized mixed with flavoured long grained rice. And too much of it. If you want biryani, go somwhere else. I am sure one can fix up a better meal at home after watching some youtube recipe. Of course, if u want rice and a flavoured one at that, go here.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Food and taste is okey types, quantity is very less.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Didn't really enjoy the Biryani or the Kababs. Biryani tastes good when it's consumed fresh, but I felt I was provided something that was heated over 8 hours. Ordered three different Biryanis for variety & the rice tasted same for all. Some much for its name & reputation buts falls short of taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
It was my first ever delivery experience with Ammi's. I heard a lot about it from my friends so decided to give it a try. Ordered chicken biryani and chicken kababs. Thumbs up for the speedy delivery in just 30 mins. Now lets come to the food. Biryani was of average quality and taste but kebabs were just pathetic. No taste at all. Also the curry which was provided was taken from a refrigerator it seems.
On an all, I did not find food that great keeping the price point in mind.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The packaging and the advertising is soooo good...but the biryani is superlatively pathetic, if you know how biryani should taste!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I tried today for the 1st time and found it awesome. Keema Biryani is worth trying. Service was good (The guy behind the counter had his smile intact for the whole time.)
This review is for Ammi's Biryani, Sarjapur Road.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Terrible place serving chicken that is not cooked!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Jab hungry call Ammi's....i love this place , Briyani is good and again completely different from other places, choice of the variety of briyani is also good, either have briyani with zeera samba rice or try the hyderabadi briyani with basmati rice. I got my hands onto Kheema Briyani too which is awesome though it is not available most of the time. The joint is small but they purely cater to take aways. Home Delivery is the best option.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: No comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's Biryani is good for delivery. Their packaging is very neat, in a pizza-like box with plastic fork, spoon and all inside. If you are ordering from workplace its very convenient because you dont have to go through the hassle of cutting silver foils and raita packets. Taste wise the Biryani is not spicy like Hyd or Andhra style biryani; it is mildly spiced and flavored, which is the way I like it. If you have eaten Biryani at Lazeez, that's the closest I can compare to explain the spice factor. The portions are not great, and if you are used to eating huge portions from places like Biryani zone or even Nandini, it may not fill your tummy. The complementary phirni is a nice touch which I like.
