Cost wise some may find it a little expensive, especially the starters and small portions of Biryani, but I dont mind it much coz of the packing!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Decent Biryani in awesome packing!

I was looking for Biryani home delivery and found this place on Zomato. The minimum order was 250rs for delivery near Kundanahalli gate . I was skeptical about the time of delivery and taste initially. But to my surprise they delivered in 30min. That's probably because I placed my order at 6:30pm.

The packing was brilliant done! I totally loved it. The box was like a pizza box with biryani and other 3 gravies (raita, payasam and biryani gravy) in 3 small separate cups. Coming to the taste, the biryani was OKish. The quantity was enough for one. I ordered a Murg kabab too but it turned out to nothing like I expected. It wasn't that great. So, try not order that.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
They create a lot of hype with the advertising and the name. One would think that you would get a decent biryani at least (we were not hoping for mouth watering biryanis) given the fact that it is just a takeaway / delivery joint. The quality of the biryani that was delivered was pathetic - a couple of pieces of chicken and mutton (in the respective biryanis) along with rather bland rice - very little or no masala in it. They really redefine the meaning of biryani. We tried this three times - difficult to point out which of the three times was worse.
To put it plainly, if they PAID ME money to eat it, I wouldn't.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This place has good biryani. The best part of this place is they have good delivery and very good packing.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Call centre is very good. Delive
ry is fast. Biryani is not at all good. No taste
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Food is good but found hair strands today in mutton biryani...not just 1 but 3...not sure if I would want to order from them again...........also the quantity has reduced
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nice foood and fast service....have home delivry also but the biryana not that expected if it spicy a litle bit thet it will be good to have.....
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
In order to savor Hyderabadi style Biryani Ammis is a decent option. But guess they have quality issues and not consistent on the taste. I prefer ordering from here only if i dont get it from Noons Biryani.
Ammis started a meal in a box concept with good packing box (AFAIK/IMHO). They have a centralised kitchen from where the food is distributed and hence one of the reasons that you might not get food that fresh.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Rating it totally on its home delivery and food quality. When i ordered the executive veg thali i was expecting rotis in it also.. but there was just white rice. But the combination of white rice.. dal makhni and shahi paneer tasted sooooo good.. it was a very sayisfying lunch for me.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: We used to like the biryani from Ammi's. Today i ordered chicken tikka biryani from here after a very long time. It has really disappointed me. Rice was overcooked and there was very little chicken in the biryani. Earlier there used to be a small box of sweet also but that is not there anymore. The standard and taste both have deteriorated. Rice quality is very very bad. It looks like ordinary sona masuri.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I don't understand why this place is rated low. Although everything is thing is great, i have tried chicken biryani, andhra chicken biryani and executive non-veg thali(butter chicken, dal makhni, rumali roti/rice).
My favourite was the andhra chicken biryani, although the chicken biryani was great, it was spicy and was loaded with chicken that gives you a blast of flavours each time you have a bite.
Taking about butter chicken, cocked to perfection, it was great.
For dal makhni what i can say is "delicious".
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This place has changed so much over the time. Lately the delivery service hasn't been good either and they have changed the side items for biryani which doesn't go very well along. Now , I've stopped ordering from here after I received biryani with spoiled chicken pieces.

Avoid this place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I used to love this place and order every other day. But now there quality in terms of delivery is very bad. Earlier they had biryani, brinjal curry , raitha and kheer. But as they got popular they removed all of those in the parcel and now just deliver biryani and some lame chutney. As u get popular you have to enhance the quality and not reduce it. Very unsatisfied with the way they changed their earlier menu and got profit minded . I rate this very low.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani at Bannerghetta road a small outlet and doesn't have much space to squeeze in but not very congested. The food good. I have ordered home delivery in past and the food comes neatly packed with a spoon, a fork, a napkin and even a toothpick.
Biryani is fragrant, medium spicy and flavourful.

Reducing 0.5 for very average quantity which was just sufficient for one, for lesser cost paradise offers more than double the quantity.

My report card for home delivery
Price â€“ 7/10
Taste â€“ 9/10
Service â€“ 8/10
Quantity â€“ 5/10
Value for money â€“ 7/10
Will I go back â€“ Maybe
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Had ordered food from here on a weekday.
Quantity is less compared to other biriyani outlets.
Mutton was not completely cooked and the flavors were very bland for a biriyani.
Accompaniments like Salan or Raitha are very minimal and tough to eat the bland rice separately.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The restaurant has the most horrible home delivery system. It has been more than 2 hours since i ordered my food and it still has not reached yet despite calling them more than 10 times. This place should close up. Suckiest restaurant ever!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered for home delivery. This means no marks for presentation. The packaging was apprpriate. I ordered a Hattrick Biryani, Aam Sharbat and Chicken Haleem. The Haleem had good consistency and just the right amount of chicken. But wasnt happy with the quantity. It was more like a sampler version. The Chicken biryani at 75 was a good deal though I would have preferred a boiled egg instead of an Omelette. Overall, value for money and dont have high expectations.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Worst delivery experience.
My home is not more than 400 mts from the store and they took more than 80 mins to arrive at my door step.
Hate this place.
Will never go or order for delivery.
2nd bad experience.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I get less quantity biryani yesterday,I given complaint finally I get one biryani free.thanks to ammi's biryani.all the best in the future .
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This was my 5Th order from this place they have always assured to deliver with in 30 minutes and yes hot biryani
Food - 5
Taste - 5
Value for money - 5
Service - 5
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
It was a very tired afternoon. We had to had some heavy. So thought to have Briyani. As always my favourite.
The taste was good.
The hospitality was not that much.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ordered Hyderabadi Biryani from this place, packaging was nicely done and delivery was quick too. Coming to the biryani, chicken pieces were not tender and had only two small pieces but rice quantity was good and had good taste.
Price is competetive with good players out there but biryani is below par.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Best outlet for a quick Biriyani!
Very good for last minute plans!
The Biriyani tastes good and fresh!
The main highlight is the packing of the food which is done excellently
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Biryani is good but not the best. Service and staff are friendly. Drawback: Too Expensive.
A "can go" place for a change. The sides with the biryani is thoughtfully put to balance the taste. Sufficient Quantity.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: In Bangalore or you say in downsouth biriani is such an indian cuisine which is taking race with all kind of ready and packaged foods. Those who likes less spicy food would like Ammi's chicken biriani too. Family pack is total disappointment.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A good option for quick lunch. The taste of Vegetable biryani was really good. But the price for the quantity they served was too much for that style of restaurant I felt. Not much choice for vegetarians in side dishes.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: A very gud option for a quick lunch. Service is average, don't expect much. The shaadi biryani is a must have, starters are a let down, mainly kababs.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Very very avergae on decor, but I liked the taste of the biriyani. Very good for the pocket and a good for the taste buds as well - must be a fav for college goers...only catch - max 12/16 people can sit together, so not a group place to hang out
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Not good biriyani.. Doesnt make you satisfied... Taste s not that good.. Service is okay with take away.. The chicken is also not that good at al
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: one of my friend said about ammis biryani that it is the largest biryani chain in bangalore.so, we went to have a good biryani.Though the place was small, we expected some nice taste.But the steward bought a bowl of biryani and a plate of sides we ordered.He dint keep plates and he was so reluctant to serve too.WTF.I never saw such an steward with such attitude. And coming to the taste and quantity, quantity was like scattered rice in a bowl with poor presentation.I dont want to comment on taste, u take watever u understand.We felt we wasted 500 bucks .Never again to ammis in bangalore.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: no comment
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Absolutely shameless people work here. They missed delivering one of the item. I called them, the lady over the phone assured me, it will be delivered in 15min. But nobody has turned up. I left poor service feedback. After a day another lady called me up, I explained her, how we felt bad waiting for the missing item. This lady told me that she would give me callback in 5 min. She never called me back. These are absolutely shameless people and do not fit into food service. Somebody should take food off when they starting eating to understand the customer pain point.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Pathetic delivery and rash answers when asked for delivery. I stay literally opposite to the outlet and have been ordering once a while from here. Generally they don't take more than 30 min and worst case 40 min, which is fine. But today I ordered around 2:10 Pm and at 3pm they called me asking for address and I said and didn't receive the parcel or a call till 3:15 Pm. I called back and inquired about the order and the guy told delivery boy called from this number and he is out for delivery. I asked still he didn't come and asked for his number if any. He said ask him when he comes for delivery. So pathetic and unacceptable. It's been more than an hour but still can't deliver to a location literally to opposite Â building.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have been ordering from here since a long time. I love the biriyani rice for its taste. The executive biriyani has the right amount for people who are not heavy eaters. The only issue is that i would prefer better chicken pieces in it. The piece that is given is extremely hard and not properly looked. And i would also like you start an executive mutton biriyani as well. Other than that, the delivery is extremely timely. If you are too hungry, ammi's will make sure you don't have to suffer for long.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Â The quality of the food has gone down significantly. I had ordered chicken hyderabadi biryani. The rice was stale and inedible. We had to completely discard the food. I will think twice before ordering again from Ammis.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Had ordered Mutton Hyderabadi Biriyani and Chicken guntur... Biriyani was pathetic! It was plain,dry and tasteless.There were barely any chicken pieces in the starter and lacked flavour. Was a complete waste of money! Never ordering from this place again!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Pathetic Service. I ordered a chicken executive biryani and sharbat e nimbu through Zomato. The delivery boy brought the whole package and sharbat bottle covered in oil, saying that he dropped it. Thinking it as human mistake and it happens.. I chose to ignore it. 
But, when I tasted biryani it wasn't fresh and looked like it was the last thing left in the restaurant which they somehow managed to send ðŸ˜‘. The worst part was sharbat a nimbu.. it tasted like plain tap water and some sugar was added for namesake to call it sharbat ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜£. 
Disgusting people, I just wanted to have a proper meal for my dinner, they made me to sleep hungry ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜£
Never ever gonna order from here again!!!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: My personal advice please dont order here. The only thing i can taste is clove and cassia bark powder. I ate it only because i don like wasting food.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
delivery is fast , but taste is not at all good . Parathas are made up of maida(All purpose flour) and difficult to chew . 

kindly specify that parathas are made up of maida in menu description.
Don't use too much food color.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The food in Ammi's Biryani is super Spicy non-vegetarian food is available here Biryani also too nice.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Just the right place for delicious Rolls & Classy Biryani!

WHY VISIT : You must visit it if you want to try awesome Rolls (Specialilty - Paneer Kalimirch Roll) AND Good Briyani
WHY NOT VISIT : Do not visit if you prefer Quantity over Quality in Biryani.

ORDER & DELIVERY TIME : Its fair, not very quick but not slow also.
INFRASTRUCTURE & LOGISTICS : They are still working on Infrastructure. So donot have high expectation from dine-in space or furniture.
FOOD : The tasty food makes up for the gap in infrastructure. You will certainly like the food if you are not looking at crazy quantity, Their per serve quantity is lesser but its very yummy!
STAFF& SERVICE : Staff is good & is flexible to your food-needs
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nice Biriyani. Spicy & tasty...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Ammi's Biryani at Bannerghetta road a small outlet and doesn't have much space to squeeze in but not very congested. The food good. I have ordered home delivery in past and the food comes neatly packed with a spoon, a fork, a napkin and even a toothpick.
Biryani is fragrant, medium spicy and flavourful.

Comment:
Easily visible from the main road, this very small place serves mainly biryani. Executive chicken biryani weighing 350 grams with 2 pieces, is good enough, with great packaging. 

Chicken Tikka boneless is 155 for large pack. Mutton Biryani 235, executive Chicken Biryani 129. That's good enough for me. Taste is not bad, but good. It's not awesome, but really good. They serve a very liquidised chutney, which should carry a rating of 0. For a fast, cheap, decent enough grub, I really like this... 4.5 out of 5, never 5

There must be around 5 tables with 4 plastic chairs each. The place must be the size of my home's living room- that small..! Nice humble boys serving, esp. Prakash... 

I have observed that most people get their items packed, and have them at home. They don't prefer to eat here, sitting on the table. So I guess they're famous for takeaways, and online ordering, especially for small families on tight budget, or for bachelors. If you want to carry them home, do remember to carry your own carry bag, or you will be charged Rs. 20 extra. 

On the menu what price you see, it's the same price you are charged. That's one thing I like very much. The price mentioned is all-inclusive, including taxes. So no extra charges. 

When I purchased food here, I met a British lady, a resident of the local area with her children. She ordered Biryani here, and said she's a regular here. She said it's less spicy here, and very tasty. Wow, then it must be really nice!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: There is no much dishes, only briyani will get many times
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Last option if no other Briyani restaurants are available. Biriyani is average only. Staffs don't respond to custom.r queries properly until you are close known face for them
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
As per its other twigs it also comes with minimal service, decor and ambience... As they have 30+ outlets in Bangalore they are following almost the same recipe for all outlets... Upright with locality... Serving personnel very caring and self-effacing for service... The platingâ€™s are not countless as always... but they use a very well-ordered and decent technique for packaging the takeaway food which I like the most... Their menu is almost nothing for the vegetarians... So not a good choice if you are in lover with veggies...

For ramzan they are running a new menu you can... But my favorite is always the combos... They are good at quantity and quality also... You will not feel like Hyderabad because they are using that much of spice as compared but you will enjoy your biryani because of their balanced recipe not too spicy not too bland. I will say an average biryani...You can try their haleemâ€¦

Bon Appetite @ Chef BB
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
THAT WAS THE LAST TIME I HAD BIRIYANI FROM AMMIS AND SURELY WOULD DISSUADE ANYONE FROM HAVING THE SAME.

Reason : 
I have been ordering Biriyani from Ammis for the last few years. Had no issues.
Taking this experience ahead, for the new years eve party with friends, i volunteered to arrange for biriyani.
I ordered 2 party packs of Chicken biryani and 1 family pack of Veg biriyani. Had requested delivery promptly at 6:00pm as requested.
We took the food and went to my friends place for the party.
At around 8:30pm, the children had the biriyani and said it did not taste like the regular ammi's biriyani. with so much of partying we did not pay much heed, until the adults sat for dinner. To my horror and that of the 15 hungry friends, both, the veg and chicken biriyani was spoilt. This was extremely embarasing. I logged in a response call with the number provided by SMS that i am unhappy with the delivery and got a sms saying that someone will call me the next day. They did, but other than the usual sorry, there was no remorse. I asked for a call to be arranged with someone senior. They said they would arrange a call back, which never happened. The next day again i called the call centre and had the same request . Again the same promise that someone would call back. Never happened.

THAT WAS THE LAST TIME I HAD BIRIYANI FROM AMMIS AND SURELY WOULD DISSUADE ANYONE FROM HAVING THE SAME.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I had a chance to visit Ammi's biryani last weekend. Its a nice quite place. Nice ambience and interiors. We ordered Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani. The taste is okay however I wish the quantity can be increased to satisfy the customers. At Rs.129 for an "executive meal" meagre quantity it feels like you are giving customers a raw deal and not...
More
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Decent biryani place. Definitely not the best biryani in town but you can expect decent value for money.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Visited the place for lunch with entire family.
ordered hyderabadi biryani (mutton & chicken) along with Jal jeera & later Kheer (Phirni)
Mutton biryani: It wasn't a Hyderabadi biryani the appearance was bad meat was al mostly blackened & taste was average.
upon asking the crew (staff) said this is Bangalore type hyderabadi taste...This surprised me a lot because Hyderabadi will remain same disregards of place.
Though chicken biryani was little better than the mutton but that wasn't to the mark.
The aroma of spices was missing the meat was not marinated properly etc.
Jal Jeera was not at all Jal Jeera
Kheer (phirni) was...I don't know what it was.
I don't recommend this place for North Indian people who are taste freak
Staff was very friendly.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Quick service and tasty biryani. Good sweet dish included. Packing good to take away.
Prices very reasonable.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
The executive chicken biriyani they offer is a true value for money.
Don't miss out to taste the makta phirni
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The food is good. But variety is less. Hope they have added much now. For a person loving biryani this place will be great. They give delivery also
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ordered Ammi's biryani today in order to try something new. the packaging was good quality was alright but the portions size was small.The order cam late as well
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Looking at all the promotions and ads for Ammi's biryani I finally ordered chicken biryani for home delivery. The packaging also looked promising. However the goods were useless. The chicken pieces were dry and so was the rice. More than that it was bland and flavorless. With so many biryani options in Bangalore Ammis is a definite miss!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: The extra long thin grain of rice covered with a golden hue and the succulent meat which melts in the mouth giving an unwanted feeling to the teeth make the refreshing aromas filling one with a fully satiating desire of fulfilling hungry bites is what Ammi's Biryani is all about. Alongwith the slices of onions and a bowl of dahi with the dahi masala to top it is a delicious and a warm meal. finally the complimentary saffron kheer put my belly in the cosy and comfortable heart of a mom.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi'z is chain in Bangalore famous for biriyani. Food quality is good and within budget. I felt chicken biriyani is good than mutton biriyani. You must give a try to Haleem. It is good.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Nice Biriyani at affordable price. They pack it in nice cardboard boxes like pizza chains do. Didn't like the executive biriyani though. the rice used doesn't give the fell of Biriyani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
A pretty good option if you want to order a decent biryani for delivery. They are all over the place in Bangalore. In Electronic City itself I have seen at least three branches - so I don't know where my food is coming from.
I have been trying them for close to a year (there are very few other places that do home delivery in this part of town). The food has been consistent for the most part - if you order late in the day (lunch or dinner) you are likely to get a little cold food and not as fresh as it should be - you know what they call the bottom of the pot variety. The Hyderabadi Biryani is good the Jeera Sambhar similarly so but the best has to be their Shaadi Biryani a.k.a. Virindhu Biryani. I must add that they are a little miserly with their raitha and salan. The rice pudding they give is OK but if you try their matka phirni - beware it is a little addictive.
The price is just right and the quick service is what makes you re-order again and again.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have visited this place couple of times last month. This restaurant is a very decent place. This is no fancy restaurant. The ambiance is regular & they serve very tasty biriyani at reasonable price. Service was very quick & they have lots of options to choose from. Will recommend this place to others.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
We had dinner here on 26th march .
They have many outlets in bangalore but I think outs was Richmond town outlet which seemed to be more of a take away. The place was clean and
we eat there itself.
Ordered 2 hyderabadi combos and soft drinks.....each combo had a good portion of hyderabadi chicken biryaani2 kabaabscurd and a rice kheer.
Absolutely yummy food which won't burn a hole in your pocket. Each combo costed us rs 250/-
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I usually order for team - dinner and we take their family packs its well worth it.. I love their packaging. Never had an issue with delivery/taste/quality.. would recommend it anyday
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
My experience has been just below average..may be The Yelahanka one outlet might be an issue..but whatever be the case my feedback on quality of food is not at all positive....and mix of rice and chicken was not the way Biryani is cooked...spices were not mixed peoperly..some portions were spicy some were very and some not at all

Will never order again at least from Yelahanka one outlet
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Hydrabadi biriyani and normal chicken biriyani was good. The volume is less. Kerala biriyani dosint taste as real kerala biriyani and the taste is also not so good. Very costly side dishes.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
I'm thoroughly dissapointed with this restaurant. I know some of the reviewers here like this place but maybe just my bad luck or misfortune I've lost my trust on these guys. I had ordered Executive Mutton Biryani two weeks ago and what came is not even fit quantity wise for a 10 year old. They gave about 100 grams of...
More
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Varieties of biryani available have ordered for home delivery many times. My gamily loves it. Value for money. Executive biryani is also a good option.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Tasty Varieties of Biryani. Most importantly good value for money. Side dishes served are quite ok. Quantity too is very good. Reliable and fast home delivery service
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Just love their Biryani! A 100% value for money. Plus their taste is fabulous!. It has many other side's and rolls also. Sides are okaish. The juices they give are not that good. But the only reason to go there is to enjoy the Biryani. They also provide home delivery. I have ordered it at least 20 times and except once Everytime I faced no problem.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Try their hyderabadi biryani its awesome. Also one can try executive biryani. Taste is good and places looks hygienic.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This experience was not that great and it mainly came from the biryani content. looked pretty much like a plain ricebath with some chicken pieces in it.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: try out this place...its not gonna disappoint you at all...rates r slightly high but the tastes makes it up for it..
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
This was the 1st olace where i fiund that even veg biryani can be a baste seller of the restaurant.

its a complete pack of food ..with biryani you will get sweets atem and rayata and curry.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Now I agree it is very reasonable to be expecting to have many vegetarian options for biryani which is a quintessential non vegetarian dish. But other than that I was slightly disappointed with the food too. Slightly too spicy for my taste. But other than that no other major complaints! The food was hygienically packed and the portions were quite generous.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Horrible biryani and curry..

I had the biryani last week in my Paying guest accomodation near to this venue.

First time  I am trying this biryani.

Reasons-

Biryani flavours are not in proportion and loads of oil floated with oil. Felt like had 500gms of empty ch

Raitha has a terrible stink and onions & curds were not fresh enough.

Gravy for sides are terrible it tasted burnt with more hint of garlic and nothing else not a bite of onions or tomatos.. soaked with oil OF COURSE...

HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: While its probably the most known biryani brand the taste just falls flat. Everything else is fine.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I have visited this place last year...I have tried their veg briyani which was very dry and very low on spices.Lot of scope of improvent in taste.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment:
Probably this is the biryani place with the maximum outlets throughout bangalore. Since they are open throughout the day great option for delivery anytime you want to try biryani from whichever location you are in bangalore.

While the delivery service is quite good the taste of biryani is definitely not the best. I don't think they use a high quality basmati rice. However the taste is very consistent - any day or any outlet.

Overall average.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I had visited this place last year. Most of the biryanis that they serve are very low on spices bordering on the bland. The only biryani which does pack a punch is the shadi biryani both chicken and mutton. Sometimes the mutton is very chewy. Not a great place
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: I love the biryani from this place. It is moist the rice is sticky but not too sticky and they are very fast. Great price for the food and service. Definitely a must eat for anyone looking for some biryani
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: After reading many ads in papers announcing opening of few outlets offering Banglore's famous biryanis we though of giving it a try. Though priced reasonably the fact that the biryanis are prepacked sealed and stored at outlets then heated before delivery put us off. The freshness is missing. Taste too just average. We are definitely not trying again as freshness in biryanis is the key factor. Why eat packed frozen and then reheated stuff when there are many places to get freshly prepared stuff in Mumbai.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's biriyani makes you feel like you ll get some home cooked biriyani. But it is not. Its a very typical frozen kind of food. Tastes ok. Priced well. Not for vegetarians. Keep expectations about home cooked food back and you ll be happy!
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Ammi's Biryani as the name suggests in primarily a place for Biryanis. They have a range of Biryanis for non-vegetarian people but very limited options in main course and starters for vegetarian. So I'd avoid if there are other options.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Late delivery and bad ethics. The delivery boy promised to return the change in 15 min and we had to wait 2 hours and 5 phone calls to the store to get our money back.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i had chicken biriyani there and it was just Ok at that price as there was no other option available on Harlur road at that time ...
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: Though the veg options are not that great, but I still like the executive biryani offered by the place.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: i have ordered this via food panda application, Quantity was and quality was good for price as 110 Rupees. Being single I had ordered biryani from them.In other restaurant biryani order will take 300 so i had to take this but this option is surely a good option if if you are ordering for 1 person.
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: This is a part of of a big chain of restaurants with their shops located at every nook & corner of Bangalore. In fact you can order on phone for home delivery which is catered by the nearest joint. They serve Hyderabadi style Biriyani which is lot spicy as compared to Kolkata Biriyani. They have very professional service personnel
Name: Ammi's Biryani

Comment: As per its other twigs it also comes with minimal service, decor and ambience... As they have 30+ outlets in Bangalore they are following almost the same recipe for all outlets... Upright with locality... Serving personnel very caring and self-effacing for service... The platingâ€™s are not countless as always... but they use a very well-ordered and decent technique for packaging...
Name: Ammi's Biryani
